title: BMI Calculator
description:
With this BMI Calculator you can calculate  and evaluate your Body Mass Index (BMI) based on the relevant information on body weight, height, age and sex.

Check your body stats to find your ideal weight, because overweight and obesity are risk factors for diseases such as hypertension, heart disease and diabetes. It can also be used to find your healthy weight if you want to lose weight or are on diet.

More information about BMI classification which is used by the BMI Calculator is available on the website of the World Health Organization (WHO).

Please leave a ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ-rating if you like our app!

Criticism, praise, problems with this app? Feel free to contact us via email: android@bmi.appovo.com

title: Weight Loss Tracker & BMI Calculator ‚Äì WeightFit
description:
This weight loss tracker will assist you in weight control and helps you to lose weight or reach your weight goal. The app also includes a BMI Calculator which calculates your BMI and your ideal weight. You can also define your own personal target weight.


Use the following features:
‚Ä¢ Track your daily weight
‚Ä¢ Integrated BMI Calculator
‚Ä¢ Analyze your weight history in various charts and visualizations to gain insights on the way to a better body image
‚Ä¢ Set a desired weight and follow your progress
‚Ä¢ Take a look on statistics about your weight, i.e. average weight, Body Mass Index (BMI), difference to the starting weight and even more.
‚Ä¢ Optional the app will remind you to track your weight in our diary
‚Ä¢ Input weights in the metric or imperial unit system
‚Ä¢ Sync your weight data with your Google Fit account


Track your weight and reach your desired weight because overweight and obesity are risk factors for diseases such as hypertension, heart disease and diabetes.


If you like our app, please leave a ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ-review!


If you have any feedback or suggestions, feel free to contact us via email: android@weightfit.appovo.com.

comments: This app has been wonderful for me. It calculates your BMI and even calculates when you'll get to your desired weight from the progress of your current weight loss. Would highly recommend for anyone looking to track their weight loss, it shows your current weight loss on a graph so it's exciting to see the line get lower and lower the more you get to your goal weight.

I love this as a rule, but I want the graph to show the startpoint. Line disappears off the left side of the graph for me and I want to see all the data at once for reference, or at least be able to scroll back if all the data won't fit as is. I flipped the app to landscape to see if that helped, but the graph in landscape is completely unreadable. Will go 5-stars if these issues are fixed.

This app has a very good weight progress graphic, BMI calculator is great. Statistics page is well presented, but its contents need work: - I was looking for weekly weight average (preferably with week by week history) or at least last 7 days running average. It could replace the all time average that is not very useful, e.g. I went from 178 to 135 in 8 month, so what does the 148 average tell me? - It would be nice to be able to export-import weight points history from/to a simple file - the data backup did not work so far - the Google Fit synchronization did not work so far

Easy, useful, organized. Have never had a problem with this app. I tried many weight tracking apps that I quickly deleted but finally found this app and I would never delete it. It's one of my favorite apps on my phone and I use it daily with satisfaction. I like its user friendly interface. I love that it includes a graph of your weight over periods of time, as well as a list of dates with weight loss/gain amount. I don't find the ads to ruin my experience, Please keep this app top quality.

Simple app. Simple and user friendly interface. Simple data entry. You need to enter exactly what you need to track your weight....and it lets you add historical data. Shows a simple graph. I wanted exactly this... nothing more, nothing less. Simple is beautiful. Edit: I have reduced my rating to 3 stars because this app has an Google Drive integration issue when it comes to backing up and restoring data. I always had backup turned on. I recently broke my old phone. So I switched to a new one which is much older and has an Android 5. However, all apps work on it including this one. I tried to recover my 3-month worth of data that I had painstakingly entered but the app could not restore anything. I checked my Google drive and there's nothing saved from this app. Even on the new phone, this app cannot create/save backups. I am using the age old Excel to keep track of my daily fitness. I guess humans are yet to get past the MS Excel era...

title: Weight Loss Coach - Reduce Body Fat & Lose Weight
description:
Lose weight easily! Just stick with the program, you will lose weight and your body will be more beautiful than ever before.

Features:
‚úì Weight Loss Coach that's powered by Artificial Intelligence.
‚úì Guaranteed Weight Loss in 35 days or less. (Up to 5 Kgs or 12 Pounds)

‚úì Supports both Kilogram & Pounds.


Looking for the Best App to Lose Weight?
Need a weight loss app? Want to lose weight fast? Want to reduce fat? Not satisfied weight loss apps that provide the same plan for everyone? Don't worry. Here is the best weight loss app to help you lose weight fast. You can track your weight loss progress in graphs.
This weight loss app is free and designed by experts, you can lose weight safe and fast with our weight loss plan.

Is it safe?
Yes! We tested on 70 Obese and 25 Overweight people around the World. Around 70% of them have lost over 5 Kgs or 12 Pounds and 20% have lost over 7 Kgs or 15 Pounds in 6 Weeks. The program is 100% safe. It will help you lose weight in less than 35 days!

Obesity occurs when a person's body mass index is 30 or greater. The excessive body fat increases the risk of serious health problems.

Yes. Based on our test results, we can guarantee that you will lose weight.

‚óé This diet app is only for losing weight. Not for gaining weight.

title: Weight Diary - Weight Loss Tracker, BMI, Body Fat
description:
‚ûú Do you need help to reach your target weight‚ùì
‚ûú Are you trying to lose weight or put on some muscles‚ùì
‚ûú Do you want to track your weight progress, BMI (Body Mass Index) and body fat‚ùì

Then this is the app for you: üëá

 üî• A simple weight tracker with ALL THE FEATURES YOU NEED to support you in your weight journey and keep you motivated to reach your goals üî• 

With this app you can:

üìâ Keep your body at glance by monitoring your progress in a beautiful chart.

üìù Continuously verify the success of your diet  with customisable weight journals which show only the information you care about.

ü§≥ Attach a photo to your recorded weight.

üë¨ Generate ‚ÄúBefore and After‚Äù photos of your body transformation. 

üîé Analyse your latest BMI, Body Fat percentage and Ideal Weight. 

üéØ Set a weight goal.

üíØ Receive customised feedback  on your progress.

üîî Set reminders to weight.

üíæ  Backup your data on the SD card or transfer them to your new phone via email. 

üìä  Create Excel spreadsheets to analyse your progress on PC or to share it with your doctor/dietitian via email.

‚öô Choose your preferred measurement unit (kg, cm/ lbs, inches/ stones, inches). 

üì≤ Create Monthly, Weekly and Daily ‚ÄúWeight Tracker cards‚Äù of your progress ready to share with your friends or social media followers (#weighttracker)


üëâ If you like our app üòç please support our work with a ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ-review!

üëâ For any feedback or issues, please email us üì© at contact@selantoapps.com or directly via the feedback screen within the app.



______________________________________________


üîÖ RememberüîÖ

Weight loss is a long term journey and a lifestyle change. Experts suggest that you should aim to lose no more than 1 kg (2.2 lbs) a week to keep your body from regaining the weight you have lost once you are ready to maintain. This app allows you to keep track of your BMI, body fat percentage and overall weight loss so you can monitor how much weight you are losing each weigh-in.

‚ùóNote about BMI, Body Fat and Ideal Weight ‚ùó

Please don‚Äôt leave a bad review if you find the app's calculations are incorrect. BMI, Body Fat % and Ideal Weight calculations within the app are estimations based on your inputted data and are based on commonly used scientific formulas (described in the app). These calculations have limitations as they are based on the average body type and do not take into account the differences. For more accurate results, please see an expert (such as a personal trainer) and then enter your correct measurements manually into the app.

comments: Just what I'm looking for - the option to enter weight in stones and lbs. Tried several apps which only gave me the option of lbs overall, which we don't tend to use in the UK, or kg, which I'm not used to. It would be 5* but I find the UI a bit tricky to navigate, but it's not too bad.
Great app! Finally one that is in stones and pounds instead of just pounds. I also like that you can add data to past dates, and export it to excel.

I am very much enjoying this app. I love the idea of being able to my picture to see the changes. I love love the idea of it keeping track of my water and reminds me of it. The app does what I need it to do. Great job.

I just wanted an app to track my weight loss .. it is a simple app which lets me do just that .. it calculates BMI and Bodyfat too ..and has before and after pics .. a very good, free app for body weight tracking
Really easy app to use. Over time however it starts to lag when new data is added.

title: BMI Calculator & Weight Loss Tracker

Calculate your Body Mass Index (BMI) based on the relevant information on body weight, height, age and sex.

Stay motivated by tracking your daily weight and analyze your progress in various charts and statistics. 

Also use the included handy calculators to determine your Waist-to-Height Ratio (WHtR), Body Fat Percentage and Calorie Consumption (BMR + PAL).

Included features:
‚Ä¢ BMI calculation - classified by sex and different age ranges
‚Ä¢ Local storage to track your daily weight‚Ä®‚Ä¢ Analyze your weight history in various charts and visualizations to gain insights on the way to a better body image‚Ä®‚Ä¢ Set a desired target weight and follow your progress

comments: Don't waste your money...I had the paid version on my phone for three months and when I changed phones none of the backed up data was able to be restored!

Easy to use, simple interface that really helps motivate with realistic goals. With the help of tracking my weight through this app daily, I've lost 3 stone in almost 6 months. Well, I did it by cutting out alcohol, eating well and plenty of walking. But this app helped me along the way by giving me clear inspiration each day.
easy to use and really informative. i lost 15 kgs in 6 months so i owe most of my success to this app!
It's perfect app!! I love it! It's simple and usefull

Very informative, very easy to use, very minimal ads, accurate data, this is the best app out there, it measures everything. I love it so much, this is the exact type of app I was looking for after I googled healthy weight, BMI etc. **Perfect for male and female ** TIP: If you wish to measure yourself and you don't know how too, use a sewing measuring tape and start at the number one and at your belly button, for your neck, start In the middle, wrap it around and mark where it wraps up too.

title: Monitor Your Weight
description:
Award Winning Weight Tracker App developed as a tool mainly to help motivate a person following a diet and/or exercise program to reach their desired target weight within a predefined period. 

* Winner of 7th Annual Best App Ever Awards under Health Category *
* Best App developed in Kuwait - Annual Informatics Awards * 

As the name indicates, you will be able to enter your weight on a regular basis and monitor your progress accordingly through means of statistics and graphs. You may also enter and track multiple profiles as well - monitor the progress of your family members, spouse, friends, colleagues - or simply create more than 1 profile for yourself to set partial targets until you reach your ultimate goal. 

This app will also suggest your ideal weight and recommend the amount of time needed to reach that target based on your current weight, height, body frame, gender and age. You may, of course, choose to alter the suggested targets based on your own plans. 

Main Features: 

- Weight tracker with option to track single or multiple profiles 
- Track various body measurements
- Option to synchronize your data between devices or to our server 
- Measurements may be represented in Kilos, Pounds, Stones, Meters or Feet 
- Calculates ideal weight based on age, height, gender and body frame 
- Full screen graph that shows your overall weight loss progress over time 
- BMI (Body Mass Index) calculated 
- Calculates daily calorie intake 
- Calculates percentage body fat 
- Total Weight Loss calculated 
- Remaining amount of weight calculated 
- Average Daily Loss calculated 
- Average Weekly Loss calculated 
- Overall progress calculated 
- Possibility to enter new weights at earlier dates 
- Displays an indicator to show the quality of your daily progress 
- PIN lock to secure your privacy 
- Multiple Language localization supporting over 15 languages 
- Possibility to export all your recorded data 
- Integration with digital scales: Withings, Aria, WiT

comments: Just starting using this app yesterday and thus far I'm enjoying it. Didn't want to rate it yet as it's too soon, however, don't want to keep seeing the message come up each time I open the app asking for a rating. Wish I could change the font color on the widget, but doesn't allow at this time. For now, I would rate it 3 1/2 stars if it allowed me to, but can only rate whole numbers. Looking forward to continue using it and updating my rating over the coming months. Thanks Team!

It's a good app in the main tho I think it's ability to measure body fat is doubtful as it has no real way of knowing how much or how little muscle we have. Ditto the bmi. It's also telling me to eat 2454 calories a day. Er... That is how I put weight on in the first place. I like the ability to record my losses or gains lol.

This app is fantastic. The way it shows your progress is extremely motivating. I have struggled with weight issues my whole life and on multiple occasions I've lost a combined 50 kg with this app. Back on it now, hopefully for the last time!

Very easy to use and d oes exactly whats needed when you are on a weightloss mission. Gives you a boost to see your progress. Shows you how many calories you can have in order to meet your target and shows through spreadsheets etc how you are shaping up! Excellent.

It's true that seeing your weight everyday can be challenging but at the weeks end to see you have actually loss weigh is very encouraging. I don't count calories but I do try to make good choices. Even on my birthday! Lol I like this approach and the app!

title: Weight Tracker
description:
Weight Tracker
This app offers a quick and simple way to track your weight and body fat percentage. It calculates your BMI (body mass index) and allows you to set a target weight to help motivate yourself.

Main Features

comments: This app has some good points: one being no adds. It's well laid out and easy to use. My biggest complaints are font size and white space. I was looking for a very simple app to record my weight loss journey. Others had way more unneeded extra stuff. I have loved using this app. I love watching the percentage of my goal go up and up!
Thanks for adding weekly avg loss data. Now its a complete weight tracker app. Clean, sober, easy and usfull.
Working great again, thank you. Back to 5 stars. Great app.
Really simple to use with a clean UI very good üëç

summary: Track your weight, check your BMI and evaluate the success of your diet.
recentChanges: Fixed PDF Export and more Improvements.
comments: Have been using the app for over two years and does exactly what I want. Was using the free version and had a problem with the database due to changing from imperial to metric units (and changing back again). Emailed support and they had fixed the database for me within 24 hours. Decided to purchase to remove the adds as a thank you. Great service.

The app itself is quite useful as a simple tracker, but the ads are obnoxious. Also, I swiched it at some point from kilograms to pounds, and it really messed up the conversion. (It converted my kg to lb - so 50 kg becomes 110lb - then called those kg, so that that was originally 50kg became 110kg, or 240lb. Didn't do the same when switching back, however. So my now 240lb converted back to 110kg. For my entire history.)

When I switched to a new phone today, I lost my entire log history. This app doesn't let u sign in with an email so it can save data. I tried exporting it, but the file I chose didn't have enough space. So I tried to export it somewhere else but it won't let me switch it to a different location. All my other app's data saved effortlessly because I just signed back in. Very frustrating.
I have never chosen a better app than this one. It simple yet can be complex. I like the color display. All the other features I don't need for now, but be able to activate them when needed.

It was fine until I changed the settings from lbs to kg & it converted the values incorrectly. When I switched back to lb, it doubled the original value which was in lb, so now all of my previous years of data are double what they should be.

comments: I just use it for basic weight tracking. The only thing I am not totally happy with is pretty minor: It uses some sort of bezier curve on the chart to make it look more fluid and smooth it out, but I think I would prefer straight lines between points.

I was looking for a super simple, easy-to-use app to track my weight, and this is perfect. Easy to put in the weight for the current or past dates, and the tracking is clear and easy. This is perfect for what I was looking for. Nothing fancy but looks great and simple.

Love this simple app, but I got a new phone and while I was able to beam the csv file from my old phone, I can't figure out how to import it to the app in the new phone, and I am unable to find support anywhere for the developers.. I'm not really keen on reentering every date since January 1 to now, 8 months later. Other than this, I love the app.

Super easy and simple as the name suggests. However, it lacks month wise breakdown and landscape orientation support to see the progres on a wider scale. Please include it in your next update. It's been around seven months since this app got updated last. Bdw, great job! :)

Great. I needed something to track pregnancy weight gain. Which is normal. But hard to find something that didn't react negatively to increase in weight. Perfect for those who want to simply keep track or might even need to gain weight.

title: Ideal Weight - BMI Calculator & Tracker
description:
Just do it --

That's what they tell you, but it isn't always that simple. It is with Ideal Weight(TM), the best daily weight tracker and BMI (Body Mass Index) calculator. 

The Tracker:

Ideal Weight lets you see the most important information at a glance. Use the slider to select your weight, and the tracker will calculate your BMI (weight range) using our signature Weight Wheel. The app will automatically save your data every time. It's that easy.

Our graphs show you exactly what you want to know in seconds. The monthly view helps you see the effects of recent diet choices on your weight, while the 3-month and yearly views let you monitor and track your progress over time. Ideal Weight is the easy and fast way to reach your weight loss goal, so you can control your weight faster and without stress.

Easy to start:
-Enter your gender, age and height
-Use the slider to select your current weight, and you're done

Easy to keep it going:
-Effortless -- the app saves the last weight you left the slider on, every time.
-3 colorful graphs -- 1 month, 3 months, 1 year
-Easily change your stats, like age, height, or preferred units

The Calculator:

Simple, flexible, and perfect for checking anyone's BMI at a moment's notice. The sliding scales are easy, quick and satisfying to use! Just tap between the calculator and the tracker at the top of the app. You can even use the calculator without onboarding for Tracker.

Great for families. Perfect for healthcare professionals.


New Year's resolution? Getting ready for a wedding? We can help you change your weight with no stress. You only need your current body weight to get started.

Download Ideal Weight, and take your first step toward your goals.

comments: Well made app to track the bmi and it's possible to track your weight. Good, simple, complete, free and honest :) I have been using this app for many years now to track my bmi and it keeps getting better! Thanks developers! :)

I don't like the new update. By that I mean I liked the sliding scale where you could find your exact height if you're in between an inch or something- you can't do that anymore it just rounds up or down. This app was super accurate before and now I feel I have to try and find one that will do this again- I hate that cause it took me so long to find this one to begin with. Please change that back!

Used this app earlier and now decided to install again. And now it doesn't work for me on Galaxy S3 Duos. It's just stucking on the main screen. I thought ttat it might be because of I had it on my phone already but it doesn't work on my wife's phone too. She didn't use it before and she have the same phone model. It's sad :(
This app helps me keep track of my right weight range for my height.

Not really happy with the recent changes. What happened to "obese," and even degrees of obesity? Everything is lumped into the descriptor "overweight," and unless the standard changed, that isn't helpful. And I don't know why, but I find it annoying that the calculator no longer reflects fractions of inches in height.

title: BMI Calculator
description:
What is BMI Calculator?
BMI Calculator is free app that allows you to monitor BMI and percentage of fat in your body.
Ideal weight - app calculates the ideal weight you should gain.
To calculate it app uses the D. R. Miller formula.
Body fat percentage is estimated from BMI by formula derived by Deurenberg and co-workers.
All measurements use information about your body: gender, age, height and weight.
App is designed for people of different ages and supports for both metric and imperial.
Track your BMI and stay healthy!

title: Body Measurement, Body Fat and Weight Loss Tracker
description:
Body Measurement and Weight Loss Tracker allows you to track and chart all of your most important body measurements including weight, waist, hips, thighs, biceps, body fat percentage and Body Mass Index (BMI). In addition to being a weight loss tracker this app allows you to  track any custom body measurements you can think of (shoulders, skeletal muscle %, body water % etc.) on your mobile device.  What‚Äôs more, you can instantly chart the changes in your body stats over time, and your data is automatically synced to the cloud if you login.  

The app also includes a built-in body fat calculator and will calculate lean body mass, body fat mass, waist-to-hips ratio and daily caloric needs as well.  

The app also integrates with Google Fit allowing you to import from or export weight measurements to Google Fit. The app will also import nutritional information from allowing you to see Calories Consumed, Calories Expended and Net Calories plotted against any measurement or calculated value.  This integration requires an in-app purchase. 

When using a weight loss tracker, it is important to monitor not only what and how much you eat, but also your weight and other indicators of health such as body fat percentage, waist, hips etc. Since body weight can fluctuate up to 5 lbs (2.3kg) per day, it is important to weigh yourself on a regular basis and at a consistent time every day.  This way, by looking at your body measurement chart, you will be able to assess your weight loss trend over time.  Some digital scales provide an estimate of body fat percentage, which you can save within Body Measurement Tracker to determine whether your weight loss is a result of a desirable loss in body fat.  Alternatively, by measuring waist, neck, height and hip circumferences the app‚Äôs body fat calculator will automatically calculate body fat and lean mass percentages and chart them over time.  If your lean body mass is calculated successfully, the app will also estimate your daily caloric need based on your stated activity level and sex.  

Body Measurement and Weight Loss Tracker is customizable allowing you to track any body measurement you can think of and ignore the ones you are not interested in.  The following measurements are included by default:

- Waist
- Weight
- Hips
- Body Fat Percentage
- Body Mass Index (BMI)
- Chest
- Upper Arms (biceps and triceps)
- Lower Arms (forearms)
- Upper Legs (thighs/quads and hamstrings)
- Lower Legs (calves)
- Height

Body Progress Photos
Keep tabs of how you look over time by taking an unlimited number of pictures of your body.  Just like the rest of your data, your body progress photos are automatically synced so they can be viewed across devices, so you never have to worry about losing them ever again.

Calculated Body Stats
The following body stats are automatically calculated, if you have recorded the required measurements:
Body Mass Index (BMI) - The BMI is the ratio of body mass to the square of the body height and is a very commonly used index to categorize a person as underweight, normal weight, overweight or obese.  Overweight and obese individuals are at greater risk for coronary artery disease, hypertension, type 2 diabetes, stroke and more.  
Body Fat Percentage - The body fat percentage is the total weight of fat divided by the total body weight.  It can be estimated many ways, but since the body fat calculator relies on the measurement of height, weight and body circumferences, the Navy Method for body fat estimation is used.  This method relies on waist, neck and height measurements for males and waist, neck, height and hip measurements for females.  
Waist to Hips Ratio - The waist to hips ratio is a useful indicator of overall health. 

Icons made by Kiranshastry from  www.flaticon.com

comments: It's free, so it gives skippable ads after you input data. Otherwise it's exactly what I was looking for to track my weight loss. You can choose which metrics you track and it gives a tend line, which helps make daily weighing data way more useful.

I started knew this would be an ad supported app. I also assumed there would be a way to pay for the "pro" version. Both were true. I almost always pay for the pro version if it's a good app. My dilemma was that there were too many ads to figure out whether this was something I wanted to use or not. If you're not willing to pay for the pro version, definitely pass on it then.

Being using this for months. Perfect for tracking progress across multiple areas. It helps prevent you getting caught up on one number and instead helps you attain an overall picture. Also helps making diet planning easier by providing the ideal calorie intake adjusted for your goals.
A useful app If you live with a healthy program and you wish to have all the details of your body and your progress under control. I've paid to avoid the ads.
Ok, it's a free app. But I'd be willing to pay for the features I want. I need to track my blood pressure with other things, and the BP entry has only 1 field!? There's 2 numbers! TWO!

This is the only app that simply calculates body fat based on waist/neck ratio. The only way I'd buy the premium version is if it integrates with Fitbit by automatically sending weight/BMI/body fat information

Just feels like this app has most of the relevant features. I give 5/5 since I haven't found another app that is this close to what I want!

brilliant app, has everything I need, and the ads don't bother me. if i could wish for one thing to be added though, I'd ask for a better way to see the comments in weight history. after a while of using the app it gets harder to go back and see when I had something interesting happen to my weight, and going thru day by day is tedious. maybe putting the comment info below the main data would be ok? if it wouldn't be too cluttery. what do you think? anyway, thank you for all of your hard work! ^^

title: BMI Calculator
description:
Easy to use and free BMI Calculator App (no ads). The Body Mass Index (BMI) is calculated with the standard formula also used by WHO. 

Please note that age and gender DO NOT affect BMI calculation.


What is BMI?

Body mass index or BMI, is used to determine whether you are in an ideal weight range for your height.

It gives you an idea of whether you‚Äôre "underweight", a "healthy weight", "overweight", or "obese" for your height. BMI is one type of tool to help health professionals assess the risk for chronic disease.¬†

BMI is a useful measurement for most people over 20 years. It is an estimate and should be considered as a rough guide only as it does not take into account age, gender, ethnicity or body composition. 


Top features of this free BMI Calculator App:

‚úÖ BMI Calculator
‚úÖ No ads
‚úÖ Easy to input height and weight 
‚úÖ BMI score
‚úÖ BMI classification
‚úÖ Healthy weight range

Support for
‚úÖ Metric (cm/kg) and Imperial system (feet+inch/lb)
‚úÖ Standard and New formula


BMI Calculator formula options

‚úÖ Standard BMI formula: 
For nearly 200 years now, medical professionals the world over have used the universally accepted Body Mass Index (BMI) to help assess the overall state of a person‚Äôs health.

‚úÖ New BMI formula: 
Experts have identified a flaw in the basic BMI formula and have recently come up with a new calculation which presents a more realistic result as it scales more accurately in relation to a person‚Äôs height.


BMI Calculator classification

üíô BMI of < 18.5
A BMI of less than 18.5 indicates that you are underweight, so you may need to put on some weight. You are recommended to ask your doctor or a dietitian for advice.

üíö BMI of 18.5‚Äì24.9
A BMI of 18.5‚Äì24.9 indicates that you are at a healthy weight for your height. By maintaining a healthy weight, you lower your risk of developing serious health problems.

üß° BMI of 25‚Äì29.9
A BMI of 25‚Äì29.9 indicates that you are slightly overweight. You may be advised to lose some weight for health reasons. You are recommended to talk to your doctor or a dietitian for advice.

‚ù§Ô∏è BMI of > 30
A BMI of over 30 indicates that you are heavily overweight. Your health may be at risk if you do not lose weight. You are recommended to talk to your doctor or a dietitian for advice.

More information about Body Mass Index classification which is used by our BMI Calculator App is available on the website of the World Health Organization (WHO).

üíß‚è∞ Also check out our famous Water Drink Reminder App Hydro Coach:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.codium.hydrocoach

comments: As a House Officer, this app is just perfect. No nonsense no bullshizz app. Gives you exactly what you want; the BMI and the class. Perfect. Put an unobtrusive donate link and I definitely will. Thank you guys. Seriously.

I like this app. Very quick and efficient in getting accurate BMI results. Two minor complaints though, #1: I wish there was a child section to measure children and adolescents from 2 - 19 years old. #2: I also wish there was a model to show what you look like if you gain or lose weight.

Simple, works and doesn't take up a lot of space on the phone. Even let's you choose between new and old BMI calculations. Everything I want in BMI app, plus it has no ads and I don't think it needs the internet. Thanks devs!
This is the most accurate and easy to use of all the available BMI apps!
I like the design and feel of the app, however I think it needs an age and body fat input

title: Weight tracker, BMI Calculator
description:
Whether you want to lose or even gain a bit of weight it is always complicated to track and monitor the evolution while understanding what are the things that work for you. You might have a goal that you want to reach or maybe you just want to get back to your initial weight after a pregnancy, so having the right tool can really help you efficiently get to your ideal weight.
With simplicity and user friendliness in mind we've created a weight monitoring and BMI(body mass index) calculator application that not only let's you add your daily measurements but also gives you the possibility to log your daily moods, remarks and even add pictures, making this a perfect weight diary.

To make it perfect and at the same time simple, we've included the following key features:

Weight Tracker & Monitor
 - daily weight register functionality
 - main screen calendar with great overview on the logged days
 - possibility to log your weight for previous dates - copy your previously saved data into the application
 - easy navigation between days - see your day to day progress
 - evolution chart with custom date range functionality - watch you weight loss progress
 - desired weight - follow and reach your health goals
 - custom units of measurement - choose from kg(kilograms), lbs(pounds) and st(stones)
 - custom notes on a daily basis - register calories, diets, ideas and more.
 - add pictures functionality - for before and after moments
 - main screen cards for current and desired weight - never forget your goals.
 - total lost weight card for selected period
 
 
BMI Calculator
 - simple yet very comprehensive body mass index diagram
 - BMI values for your day to day measurements
 - main screen card with current BMI
 - preview BMI ranges - from extremely underweight to morbid obesity


Other cool features
 - password protection - protect your data with a 4 digit PIN code
 - reminder - helps you remember to daily register your data
 - age and gender - for more accurate BMI calculations
 - custom units of measurement for height - choose from cm(centimeters) and ft(feet)
 - first day of week, choose between Monday and Sunday
 - data reset functionality - start over whenever you want

If you are already looking for an application similar to this, it means your are on the right track in getting a better & healthier life, so we can only wish you to:
Be happy and live healthy!

summary: A very simple to use weight monitor and BMI calculator.
recentChanges:
- general improvements - performance & visual
- small changes regarding some of the graphical assets
- fix data loss issues
comments: The app has some good points. I like the calendar that shows at a glance the days I entered weight. Unlike some apps, the fonts are small enough to display a lot of info on my cellphone. One negative is the graph: It displays no more than 30 days or one month; long range trends can't be viewed. The biggest negative are the adds: They don't just occupy a bar at the lower edge of the monitor; sometimes take total command of the app.
I've only used it for 3 days and will have to discover a lot about this app still, but l like the layout and it feels like it is easy to use.
Clean, simple and intuitive. Helps you keep track of your status both weight and bmi.

You'd be better off with some paper and a pen sellotaped to your phone, I've lost 9lb in ten days, the numbers I've entered show I've lost 9lb, yet it says 8.10lb, for some reason it can't do the math (yes I've switched it to 30 day.....which you have to do every time!) Very frustrating app

Useful for tracking weight and keeping notes without a lot of extra calorie counting stuff. HOWEVER. To be truly perfect, app needs to offer a way to track weight in longer than 30-day increments AND to be able to set the date range for the "Lost Weight" box. Most people don't care about seeing the 30-day or less change, weight loss is a much longer range activity! Right now I have to put the total loss since beginning of my tracking in the notes. And finally, it was ridiculous not to be able to type in my date of birth, instead having to scroll back over 20 years of monthly calendars!

comments: Basic weight/bmi tracker but excellent and I especially like that you can add dates prior to downloading the app.

This app does exactly what it says. I'm finding it to be very useful. Looking forward to when the weight graph is up and running. To the person who complained about setting her year of birth, it is very simple to do by just tapping on 2019 on the calendar and selecting the year as required.

This app keeps me up to date with my weigh ins, total weightloss, and it is easy to use.

What is BMI Calculator?
BMI Calculator is free app that allows you to Calculate BMI and whether it falls in normal category.

BMI Calculator formula options:

üîπ Standard BMI formula:
For all over the world this formula has been used for ages and universally accepted.
Earlier all medical professionals have used this formula to evaluate a person health parameters.


üîπNew BMI formula:
Recently new formula has been identified which shows more realistic result based on the height, the New BMI formula is more accurate than the basic standard formula.

BMR Calculator‚ùì
Basal metabolic rate (BMR) is the total number of calories that your body needs to perform basic, life-sustaining functions.
If you want to lose weight, it's helpful to calculate your BMR. You can either find the number using a formula designed by scientists, you can get it tested in a lab.

Ideal Weight Calculator‚ùì

title: BMI Calculator
description:
Easy-to-use and Interactive UI 
    1. Easy to input your weight and height with just quick finger movement
    2. Automatically Calculate 1) BMI, 2) difference from ideal weight and 3) BMI zone
       (i.e., Obess Class I/II/III, Overweight, Normal, Underweight)
    3. Interactively show results with beautiful animations

 Fully support BMI zones 
    1. Automatically calculate your BMI zone for the best weight loss
    2. Support all BMI weight zones (i.e., Obess Class I/II/III, Overweight, Normal, Underweight, Severely Underweight)
    3. Helpful for weight loss and weight control

Support both metric and imperial and automatic unit conversion
    1. Weight can be specified with kg and lb (pound)
    2. Height can be specified with cm and ft+in (feet + inch)
    3. Easily change units and support automatic unit conversion

 It‚Äôs ALL FREE
    1. Unlimited calculation and features

 How to use our BMI calculator app 
* Please adjust your WEIGHT and HEIGHT by moving red dots (macro-control) or clicking left/right arrows (micro-control)! Note that our app does not use age and gender since they DO NOT affect BMI calculation.

* According to National Heart, Lung and Blood Institute (NIH), normal range of BMI is 18.5 ~ 25. To maintain this level of BMI is very good for healthy life.
* Body Mass Index (BMI) is very important for your health and fitness. You can start managing your BMI now by using our BMI calculator.
* We'd appreciate your valuable feedback. Please, report bugs or request features to bluefish12390@gmail.com.

title: Body fat calculator + a four week fat loss plan
description:
This application  calculate your body fat percentage scientifically , and provide a fat loss plan that use intermittent fasting, along with fast walking.

Although fat loss is the goal that we want to achieve, a fat loss plan will never result in 100% loss from the fat tissue only, some of the total weight lost is also from muscle.

So a successful weight loss phase is one that will result in maximum loss of fat, and minimum loss of muscle.

Why it is important to lose the extra body fat ?
it's not just for aesthetic reasons, it is mainly for health benefits, as high body fat is associated with multiple problems that occur in the body.

knowing the body fat level alone is not enough, but pairing that information with the body mass index and the waist to hip ratio makes the result obtained more complete.


The app provides a test based on a conversion formula from BMI , and multiple topics ( calories count, more accurate measurement methods , comparison of body types ...) that are related to weight loss:


 The test takes as input your Sex , Age , Weight and Height ; these values are used to calculate your BMI , which in turn is used to calculate your body fat percentage.
The user must also provide waist and hip circumference to provide values for the waist to hip ratio.
The result panel will show the three indicators calculated, as well as the limits and healthy ranges associated with each value according to the WHO.

  
From the test result panel , you can generate your weight loss plan;
After selecting the weight that you will aim to lose during this four week period ( from 5 kg /10 lbs up to 10 kg / 23 lbs ).

A message will appear after every selection to advise you if :
 The weight loss goal is too much for your body type,
 Or
 It is a manageable goal .


The weight loss protocol proposed is based on two things : Time restricted eating , and long distance walking.
So you are basically feeding your body during a short eating window (typically 6 to 8 hours) , and burning fat stores to fuel the body for the rest of the day.
This weight loss plan expects the user to learn from his or her experience during this program and adjusts the fasting duration or the walking duration accordingly. 

you can enter the progress made in the form of weight (lbs or kg) lost during each week, that will be converted to percentage dropped from your initial body fat level. At the end, you can compare your end result with what the app predicts, since weight loss is not just numbers, it's also your own experience with your body .


Units supported :

Kg : kilogram
lb   : pound
cm : centimeters
ft '    : feet
in "   : inches

Symbols used :

BMI   :   Body Mass Index
WHR :   Waist to Hip Ratio
BFL   :   Body Fat Level
WHO :   World Health Organisation

description:

FEATURES OF BMI.

-----------------

 - add your picture to your profile

--------------------------

comments: In general, a really good app with lots of functionality. It would be nice if the font stood out more. I feel like I'm always squinting at the screen. Also, entering numbers with scroll selectors is like threading a needle every time. WW has a option to tap on the number and type the data. If you could add this I'd be so appreciative! It would also be nice to be able to 'like' replies in Community and to reply to people by name.

I've been having trouble with the app with the new upgrade. When I try to enter info on a new food or add a recipe, I get a blank screen. This is a pain and hope it fixed soon. I reported it on 10/23, but haven't heard anything back. I tried to take a picture of the screen to show you, but it won't allow me

You have to pay for Pro to get access to key functionality like recipe builder. Pro is heavily advertised but it isn't made clear only US brands & restaurants are supported so UK members get no benefit from this being unlocked. Being able to post in the community is also unlocked but there is no tagging functionality so it's almost impossible to have a conversation with someone. You also can't search for other members. In databse pre populated veg is by cups not by item unless added manually .
I love this program however, the update 2 days ago messed up typing on the community boards. You can't see what u type. Others are having the same issue too. Help!!!
The text is much too light to read! Too many steps to find a food. Should be more like the app lose it. But please, make the text darker.

title: BMI Calculator - Weight Loss & BMR Calculator
description:
BMI Calculator - Weight Loss & BMR Calculator is the app which allows user to calculate their Body Mass Index and BMR Index in one app. It provides the accurate measurement based on the weight and height provided by user along with age.

BMI - The body mass index (BMI) calculates your body fat based on your weight and height.

BMR - Basal Metabolic Rate is the number of calories your body need when it is at complete rest, with no exercise.

MAIN FEATURES:
‚Ä¢ Imperial and metric measurement units are supported.
‚Ä¢ Record your BMI & BMR history to track back anytime.
‚Ä¢ Store History data with BMI or BMR Index along with age, weight and height in chronological order.
‚Ä¢ Ideal app for weight loss program if you want to gain or lose weight.
‚Ä¢ BMI measurement support for 7 years and older.
‚Ä¢ BMR calculation is based on Mifflin and St Jeor as well as Harris-Benedict equation.
‚Ä¢ BMR Calculator calculates the calories you need to consume in a day.
‚Ä¢ No internet connection required for calculation.
‚Ä¢ Free to use.

USAGE:
‚Ä¢ BMI Calculator
‚Ä¢ Body Mass Index Calculator
‚Ä¢ Standard BMI Calculator
‚Ä¢ BMR Calculator
‚Ä¢ Fitness Tracker & Weight Loss Program

title: Weight Track Assistant - Free weight tracker
description:
Do you want the ideal weight? Check it easily with the app. It's an useful tool to help you track weight daily and archive your weight goal. Whether you want to lose weight or gain weight, tracking your progress is very important. When you log your weight, it will calculate your Body Mass Index (BMI), body fat percentage, BMR and let you know if you are underweight, in good weight or overweight. In addition that you can track you weight three times a day to get the accurate weight. Then you can set your goal and record daily weight. And your weight will be displayed by a weight chart, so you can instinctively check the change of your daily weight and the degree of achievement for your goal.

In addition, to prevent the loss of body weight records, increasing the cloud sync feature. When you use an application more than thirty days, the weight recorded over thirty, the application will open cloud storage feature.

- Very user friendly UI.
- Real time BMI/Body Fat Percentage/BMR/Waist to hip ratio(WHR) value.
- Track weight three times a day.
- Detail weight statistics
- Daily weight track and weight goal setting
- Weight chart to view your weight progress
- Cloud synchronization function to prevent data loss
- Imperial and metrics units.

title: Obesity Calculator
description:
For effective weight loss the first step is that you should know  BMI, extra body weight, excess waist circumference, extra level of Body Fat against normal value of our body. Thus you can compare the progress of weight loss over a time. 

       Second, we should now our daily calorie need. 
       Third, thereafter we should know healthy component of our meal (how much protein, fat & sugar we need to fulfil requirement of the  body.

Unique feature of this app:

This application helps to provide you all information at one platform, when you enter your height, weight, waist circumference and your daily activity level. 

Indian commonly uses both unit of measurement (metric & imperial) in day to day life. Height in feet (imperial unit) & weight in Kg (metric unit). This is unique App as it calculates irrespective of units you enter.

‚ÄúBMI calculator for Adult‚Äù also displays result as your ideal body weight as well as excess body weight.

‚ÄúBMI calculator for Child‚Äù displays result in both percentile & BMI units.

‚ÄúBody Fat‚Äù calculator displays results as ideal body fat as well as excess body fat.

‚ÄúCalorie calculator‚Äù display results of daily calorie need once you select activity level & your weight goal. 

‚ÄúDiet calculator‚Äù displays the result in term of how much of this calorie should be from protein, fat & carbohydrates. To get this much calorie, how much (amount) you need to eat, is also displayed by this calculator. So it guides about the amount of healthy food you should consume. 

 ‚ÄúAll in One Calculator‚Äù display all three result of BMI, Body Fat & Calorie at one screen. Once you enter parameter like weight & height in first calculator, remaining calculators automatically read these parameters to display result thus its very user friendly app. 

This app generates your report in PDF format and you can save it for future reference .

You can also share your report in PDF with family or friends  & encourage them.

title: Casual dieting-weight manager-
description:
New weight-management app with very popular cute illustrations from Japan!

This is a must-see for everybody who has ever tried a weight-management app without being able to actually stick with it!
The cute rabbit and Pisuke will casually support your diet this time!

[Characteristics]

1.- Cute graphs!
The illustrations that show up change depending on your weight's increase or decrease.
You can use the illustrations that appear on the graphs as stickers for the journal integrated within the app.
This ensures you won't feel depressed even if you gain some weight!

2.- Very complete journal function!
Not only you can keep a journal of your weight and body fat, but you can also write what you ate along with daily happenings!
Over 100 different stickers that you can choose to use depending on your daily mood!
The more you use the app, the more stickers you get, so that you can continue to enjoy keeping a daily record!

3.- You can use the stickers as wallpapers!
You can download the stickers that you used on the journal as wallpapers!
5 backgrounds available to choose from as well!
Keep writing on your journal to complete your wallpaper!

4.- Ideal for those who:
- want to go on a diet
- are looking for a healthy way to manage their weight
- just had a rebound after a diet
- always give up after dieting for a while
- find that regular journal apps are not enough
- are looking for cute wallpapers
- love cute illustrations
- like Kanahei

descriptionHTML:
New weight-management app with very popular cute illustrations from Japan!

This is a must-see for everybody who has ever tried a weight-management app without being able to actually stick with it!
The cute rabbit and Pisuke will casually support your diet this time!

[Characteristics]

1.- Cute graphs!
The illustrations that show up change depending on your weight's increase or decrease.
You can use the illustrations that appear on the graphs as stickers for the journal integrated within the app.
This ensures you won't feel depressed even if you gain some weight!

2.- Very complete journal function!
Not only you can keep a journal of your weight and body fat, but you can also write what you ate along with daily happenings!
Over 100 different stickers that you can choose to use depending on your daily mood!
The more you use the app, the more stickers you get, so that you can continue to enjoy keeping a daily record!

3.- You can use the stickers as wallpapers!
You can download the stickers that you used on the journal as wallpapers!
5 backgrounds available to choose from as well!
Keep writing on your journal to complete your wallpaper!

4.- Ideal for those who:
- want to go on a diet
- are looking for a healthy way to manage their weight
- just had a rebound after a diet
- always give up after dieting for a while
- find that regular journal apps are not enough
- are looking for cute wallpapers
- love cute illustrations
- like Kanahei
- use the LINE sticker series "Pisuke & Rabbit" a lot!

[A request from the app]
We would appreciate it if you would contact us regarding any malfunction of the app via the "Contact" option available within the "Others" menu in the app. If you report errors in your review, we may not be able to further inspect the issue. We appreciate your cooperation in helping us to improve our service!
summary: New weight-management app with very popular cute illustrations from Japan!
recentChanges:
‚òÖWhat's New‚òÖ

comments: I really enjoy using this app. It's so much fun to use and the cute little stickers brighten my mood while keeping myself on track with my diet. It's not one of those apps that have everything from calorie counters to diet suggestions but it works great for me since all I need is somewhere to keep a list of the meals I have in a day and write "notes to self" to keep me focused on my goal. Excellent app!

this app is super cute!! it makes me happy seeing all the patterns and stickers as I write what I ate. sadly it doesnt have any calorie counting features or finding different foods or anything fancy like that. it's a cute note app where you can log your weight and fat percentage. it also has a calendar. so, if you're willing to overlook the missing features, then get it lol wholesome lil diet app :3

It really is a well-designed and very usefull app. But somehow my diary entries are not being saved. Is there any way you could fix this? I'd be really happy. Apart from this, I can highly recommend this app for anyone who wants to stay on track with their weight!

Really sweet little app! I know some people would like it to track activity etc as well but I chose it because it's purely for tracking your weight. Simple and straight forward! Not many ads but only 76p to remove them anyway. I love it, it makes me smile üòä.

Pretty good app! It's cute and I love the passcode protect. Maybe encourages potential dangerous ideas with "disappointed" stickers when you gain weight. But I love this app, the graph is helpful and so is the diary

recentChanges: We've added support for the 0378 Bluetooth scale!
comments: I've been using this app for a while now. It's pretty good for weight tracking, but I have a few issues with it. 1) I find that the weight does not upload unless the app is open. And every now and then the scale doesn't send the results even while the app is open. 2) I dislike that you can't change how the "Year" and "Total" views look. Currently, both are depicted by smoother lines - likely the average per month - than the "Week" and "Month" view. Other apps find a way to graph 365/366 points.

This app works great with my scale. Even if I don't open it for a few days when I do it loads all the days on the scale at once making it easy to track progress. I've noticed I can switch my scale goals at any times. It is kind of a long process to add another person to the scale, but really easy to keep everyone's profile separately.

Useless, parisitic app that used to be great. Now it forces me to give my location info to sync with my scale,. And the screen to update my goal weight is broken (missing enter/okay button). Disappointing, but then again, the way most apps are designed these days, I guess I'll just have to get used to disappointment.

Was a little tricky to set up initially and I didn't really like that. But having used this for several months it has been very reliable in sinking and it just uses a simple web views so I can actually take a look at all the bars and graphs on my desktop as well.
May as well just manually enter your data. Bluetooth integration persistently fails. Works just often enough to demonstrate that it **can** work, but doesn't. DO NOT BUY THIS SCALE!

title: Noom: Health & Weight
description:
Any program can tell you to eat less and move more. 

Noom is different.

Noom‚Äôs proven psychology-based approach identifies your deep-rooted thoughts and  triggers, and builds a custom game plan to help you form healthy habits, faster. 

Featured in the New York Times, Women‚Äôs Health, Shape, Forbes, ABC and more, we've already helped over 45 million people worldwide build health habits and achieve their health goals. 

People who use Noom lose an average of 18 pounds in just 16 weeks!
78% keep the weight off for over a year. 

Learn how to navigate your environment, challenge your thoughts, master your triggers, and overcome any barrier that might come your way.
Whether it's emotional eating, cravings at mid-day, difficulty with social eating, or a sweet tooth, Noom's scientifically backed-solution will help you create a plan to overcome any obstacle and practice healthier habits until you've mastered them!

What you get: 
- Scientifically-proven psychology approach  to ‚Äútrick‚Äù your body into building healthy habits, faster
- Flexible coaching designed to help you set and achieve your short- and long-term goals, and provide you with as much daily support and accountability you need -- you decide!
- Personalized feedback from your coach based on your in-app activity and progress
- Tools to track your weight, food, exercise, blood pressure, and blood sugar all in one place
- Interactive content with over 250+ new articles, including choose-your-own adventure style guides to apply our #PsychTricks into your daily life, seamlessly 
- Smarter technology to identify your challenges in real time and keep you on track 
- Custom meal + workout Plans available to take your progress to the next level
- Our most comprehensive food database, with over half a million new and updated food logging options and barcodes to make your experience even better
- An award-winning, battery-friendly pedometer to count your steps 

Our team of doctors, psychologists, nutritionists, and personal trainers have created a new course that takes the most effective behavior change research and techniques and delivers them to you in daily bite-size articles and interactive challenges to teach you the skills you need to improve your health. 

Sign up today to turn your healthy thoughts into healthy actions with Noom!

Noom, Inc.
229 W 28th St, Floor 9,
New York, NY 10001
comments: Noom puts the "fun" in "functional" plus it's easy to use! This app has short, informative articles that always make me chuckle. I lost weight right away during the 14-day trial, now I'm signed up for the next three months! This isn't like any other wellness app... you gotta try it for yourself to see just what I love about Noom. Totally worth it!!

Originally thought I was getting my money's worth. But now they removed their built-in pedometer (which is the only device/app I was using) and they also removed the GPS tracking for when you do a workout and you want to know the distance you went (walk, hike, bike, etc). Very disappointed. I can't even accurately track my exercice anymore with this latest update they did! How am I supposed to figure out the distance I just hiked in order to punch it in manually? Ridiculous update.

I absolutely love Noom! I've never had so much fun and success loosing weight! I love the tracking calories and seeing how many I have left, all the information they give you every day and the fun way they explain it, the coach, the group interaction! This is for me. I'm going to sign up my daughter too. I've only lost 9 pounds so far, but I know I'll stick with it and loose the rest ( unlike other diets) because I'm really enjoying it and learning so much. I love Noom!

I absolutely love this! You learn how to eat better, and eat less. Noom helps you to be accountable for everything from nutrition to fitness! It is also motivational and you have a personal coach to help you along the way. You set realistic long term and short term goals for yourself. One thing that surprised me was I've always been a healthy eater, but with noom I realized I was eating way too dense. So far Ive lost 5 lbs and its the first week! If you put in the work, youll see results!

So far mostly ok. Two main complaints: 1. Step tracking. Originally I set it up to sync with Fitbit and adjust goals daily, but it wasn't working so I tried to remove the link to Fitbit but now it only lets me choose a different app. I just want to log steps manually. 2. Why do they have you add on a meal plan and exercise plan but NOT have those integrated into the app? If I'd known in advance these would be just emailed to me and not really part of the program I wouldn't have gotten them.

comments: I give this app 5 stars for fulfilling it's intended purpose better than any other similar app! It doesn't make me dread it like all the other ones. Workouts are quick and easy but still leave you sweating and feeling like you got a good workout. This, combined with a clean diet, has made me lose 5 pounds in 1.5 weeks. Two things I would love to see added, is the ability to control rest times and set times, as well as weight tracking.

App gives you good intense workouts every day. There's about 5 different plans to pick from. Each one turning up the heat. These workouts are short & sweet & don't mess around. Would give 5 stars however I believe I should be able to see how many minutes each work out takes & I should be able to see a rough estimate of how many calories burned during each work out but it adds up the calories burnt & time from each work out together instead.

I really like the exercises. You can turn off the music and audio if you want. Just a couple downsides, there's no way to reset a course, you can take it again but it'll always tell you've completed the course. The Feedback option on the menu doesn't do anything, like at all, kinda suspicious....

I am on day 13 and it has helped me so much with being consistent, which is my main problem. I really feel a difference in my body and my energy. It was a struggle at first and as it gets tougher I can actually keep up. I can do way more than I did when I started and it just helps me stay motivated. Definitely recommend for anybody trying to be a bit more healthy.

I like how it gradually builds up to more intensive exercises. Great for keeping track, and just getting you moving. Especially now that we're spending more time at home, it's great to open the app, and spend 5-15mins going through the exercises.

title: Body Fat Calculator
description:
STAY HEALTHY AND LOOK GREAT WITH THIS BODY FAT CALCULATOR!

The most accurate body fat percentage calculator with very interactive results which include your fitness level, your healthy weight range based on your lean body mass (LBM) and how much fat you should lose or gain in order to be in the healthy weight range.


Unlike BMI calculators which can be very inaccurate especially if you have big muscle mass, this calculator gives results based on your body fat percentage and they are not affected by your body weight.

Features:
‚Ä¢ 5 most accurate formulas: 
-    1. Jackson/Pollock 3 site skin fold caliper method.
-    2. Jackson/Pollock 4 site skinfold caliper method.
-    3. Jackson/Pollock 7 site skinfold caliper method.
-    4. Durnin/Womersley 4 site skinfold caliper method.
-    5. Tape Measure method used by the U.S. Navy.
‚Ä¢ Progress chart for keeping track.
‚Ä¢ Instructions.
‚Ä¢ Settings menu where you can choose to save automatically age, height and weight.
‚Ä¢ Body Fat Percentage Calculator.
‚Ä¢ Lean Body Mass Calculator.
‚Ä¢ Body Fat Weight Calculator.
‚Ä¢ Fitness level: Underfat, Healthy, Overfat, Obese.
‚Ä¢ Healthy / Ideal Weight Calculator.
‚Ä¢ How much fat you should lose or gain.

title: Weight Calendar
description:
Weight Calendar - BMI & Weight Loss Tracker is a free application and easy to use. Keep those pounds in check the fun way! Thanks to our 3in1 solution, it has never been so easy and FUN to lose weight! 
Our weight tracker/calendar and BMI app gives you the much needed support and nudge in the right direction. Day by day, monitor your weight by scrolling the measuring tape to input your weight values. 
Next to tracking your weight loss progress, our weight calendar - bmi & weight loss tracker app gives you correct BMI values, based on your height and weight ratio as well as your ideal weight range. 
Our weight calendar - bmi & weight loss tracker application allows you to input weight values for past days! 
Thanks to its red/green data, it‚Äôs never been so easy to visually keep track of your daily weight loss progress.

Unable to adjust the weight. This app also only shows the current month. Not user friendly.
Its great to track progress because I am one of those people that steps on the scale everyday it works for meü§∑
Easy to use for what it does.

I would give the app a 5 star if there were two things fixed. One: when you set your daily weight and hit the plus, it almost always changes your weight by an ounce or two. Two: I can see numbers above my daily weight and have an idea of what they represent, but maybe if there was a small blurp of how to use in the menu, it'd be of some assistance.

title: My Weight Tracker, BMI
description:
Monitor your weight using an efficient interactive chart ! " My weight tracker " will help you to achieve your ideal weight. You will easily see the weight loss and the gain on the chart.

/!\ It is strongly recommended to make regular backups by email. This will avoid you to losing your datas in case of mishandling or crash of your device!

The app show automatically your BMI and your Body Fat %.

On the chart, you can display :
- BMI zone
- Body Fat % zone
- Weight goal
- Moving average
- Trend curve

On the chart you can also :
- see weight
- see note
- see rate (food & sport)
- see the difference between two points
- Zoom (X and Y)
- Scroll
- Take a screenshot
- Return to initial view by double tap
- ...

The home page show you : 
- Chart
- Last weight
- BMI
- Fat Body %
- Weight goal
- Trend
- Time-to-goal estimate
- Weight to loose or gain to achieve the goal

A widget is available in this version. This will provide you on the essential informations (Last weight, BMI, Fat Body %, weight goal, trend, time-to-goal estimate, and weight to loose or gain to achieve the goal).

The weight log, will show you : 
- the loss or the gain between two month or two weight
- the whole informations on the weight : BMI, Body Fat %, note and rate (sport and diet)

You can export and import your datas (by email or on your sd card) in order to share them on your different devices. You can also make a backup on your sd card.

"My weight tracker" is also suitable for pregnant women, but the BMI and Body Fat % are not adequate.

v3.0 :
- More datas available like the size of your waist, hip etc.
- New widgets with the choosen datas
- Change the BMI and body fat %
- See all your datas on only one screen and with several graph
- View your datas on a calendar
- Import / export with a csv file

v2.x :
- Adding icone for the sport and food histogram
- The scale of the curve and the scale bar are editable (Display optimized for smartphone or tablet in high definition)
- Visualization of the objective advancement 
- Add of histogramm for the rate (food & sport)
- Auto-zoom on the whole chart (Chart preferences)
v2.0 :
- Add weight with comment and rating (sport and food)
- Colored curve based on ratings
- Screenshot
- Add password
- Help (under construction)
- Settings on the page "Add" and "History"


You like our app ? You want to participate to its improvement ?
So contact us and be among the first to get the new release by becoming a beta-tester !

comments: Very simple, quick to use. Can put your weight visible on your home screen if you want for extra motivation.

Looks good with plenty of options but for some reason following a recent update on my P20 Pro when I go to make a new entry it just closes the app. Very frustrating as it was just what I was looking for. Fix this and it'll get 5 stars.
It's a pity! I've used this app for awhile and it was very good in the past. Now, it's almost impossible to enter data smoothly. It seems ads are 'choking' it up! It is no longer stable. Oh dear!

Used to be excellent, simple display containing all the relevant information. Now it just keeps crashing even after being deleted and reinstalled. No longer fit for purpose. If it can be made stable again, it will be 5 stars.
I tried many of them. This is one of the best. Helping nt me manage my weight. But there is some more space to improve it. 5 stars in advance as a "thank you" for a good app!

title: BMI Calculator App: Body Mass Index & Ideal Body
description:
"BMI Calculator App: Body Mass Index & Ideal Body" is a medical BMI mobile calculator application to calculate body mass index (BMI). Body mass index (BMI) is a simple index of weight-for-height calculator. Body mass index (BMI) is commonly used to classify normal weight, underweight, overweight, and obesity in adults. Body mass index (BMI) is significantly correlated with body fat calculation. "BMI Calculator App: Body Mass Index & Ideal Body" will also calculate your ideal body weight (IBW).

Why should you choose "BMI Calculator App: Body Mass Index & Ideal Body"?
üî∏ Simple and very easy to use BMI mobile app.
üî∏ Accurate and precise calculation.
üî∏ There are several measurement units for both weight and height.
üî∏ Interpretation of your body mass index (BMI) result or weight categorisation.
üî∏ Ideal body weight calculator.
üî∏ Find your ideal body mass index and plan your daily energy expenditure.
üî∏ It is totally free. Download now!

"BMI Calculator App: Body Mass Index & Ideal Body" will also interpret your body mass index (BMI) result. If you are underweight, then your immune system can be impaired. On the other hand, overweight or obese is highly associated with non-communicable diseases, such as hypertension, diabetes mellitus, or coronary heart disease. You can easily assess your weight calculator status with this "BMI Calculators Pro: Body Mass Index & Ideal Body" application. This app also able to determine your ideal body weight (IBW). The calculation of ideal body weight (IBW) depends on your height and gender. "BMI Calculator App: Body Mass Index & Ideal Body" have five most commonly used formulas to calculate ideal body weight (IBW). 

For more info contact us at:
www.imedical-apps.com

title: Simple BMI Calculator - Ideal Body Weight
description:
The BMI (Body Mass Index) calculator can help you determine your weight status, whether normal, underweight, severely underweight, overweight, obese, and severely obese.

This online BMI calculator can be used by men and women, boys and girls.

In addition to BMI numbers and weight status, this calculator has advantages over similar applications, namely providing a normal weight range and IDEAL BODY WEIGHT. So this BMI calculator is very useful to help you do a weight loss program, or vice versa weight gain program.

The BMI calculator uses scientific formulas to calculate ideal body weight based on scientific journals.

title: BMI Calculator
description:
With this app, you will be able to calculate your Body Mass Index (BMI) and know what your physical condition is or if you have to improve it in order to have a good health. This BMI calculator will allows you to monitor your waist-to-height ratio, your body fat percentage and your weight loss percentage all in once.

It is really easy to handle the app and very useful to get an idea of weight control. When you introduce all the information that the calculator requests you, it provides you the ideal weight that you have to achieve for been in a good healthcare and allows you to keep track of your weight daily.

Monitoring your body mass index regularly can give you a good idea about your condition. The information that the app provides you is based on your age, your height and your weight. All the answers are calculated with pieces of information that you provides. For example, the app can estimate if you are underweight, in good weight, overweight or obesity according to the information introduced.

This app can help you decide if you need to make changes in your diet for been in a better health, gain weight or lose weight, but you have to take all the aspects of your physical condition under consideration in order to do a good changes and also have a consult with your doctor if you have any doubts about your health because this information is partial and the diets and exercise that you need to follow may depends on many different aspects.

What do you can discover with this BMI Calculator app? Firstly, your body mass index that considers both, the body weight and the height. Secondly, the waist-to height ratio that it is defined as the waist circumference divided by the height. It indicates you the abdominal obesity. In third place, you can calculate your body fat percentage that works for knowing the weight of fat divided by the total weight. Last but not least, the weight loss percentage.

title: BMI / Fat / Weight Calculator
description:
Are you in right weight? check it now.

It is a free app that will allow you to calculate your Body mass index, Body fat % and Ideal body weight based on your input values. To calculate these things app uses the scientific formula derived by the great researchers. All these calculations needs these parameter like Age, Gender, Height and Weight. The body mass index (BMI) is a statistic developed by Adolphe Quetelet. Ideal body weight given by D.R. Miller.

‚ñ∫ Body mass index: 

An approximate measure of whether someone is over- or underweight, calculated by dividing their weight in kilograms by the square of their height in metres.

‚ñ∫ Ideal body weight:

The Ideal Weight Calculator computes the ideal body weight as well as a healthy body weight range based on height, gender, and age.

‚ñ∫ Body fat percentage:

The body fat percentage is a measure of fitness level, since it is the only body measurement which directly calculates a person's relative body composition without regard to height or weight. 

Track your body weight and stay fit.

THIS APP IS NOT INTENDED TO DIAGNOSE, EXAMINE, TREAT OR MANAGE MEDICAL CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND.

comments: This calculator runs on the assumption that you have a mostly sedentary lifestyle and low-to-average muscle mass. Because it doesn't ask for body measurements or general activity level, I couldn't give it 5 stars because it is NOT accurate for everyone. However, having tried a few of the other body fat calculator apps, I can say that this is one of the best free lightweight apps of its kind currently available.

Total nonsense - maybe even unsafe, as recommendations are based on insufficient data. Musle mass and water MUST be measured to even estimate bodyfat. For example: I'm 6'3", 208lbs,13.5% bodyfat (per most accurate calculation using submersion test), but this app indicated 28.6% BF - more than 2x the correct amount, and it recommended a 171lb bodyweight! That would require < 0% BF and/or extreme loss of muscle. Just stupid!!! My wife had similar results, so no there is gender or athletic correlation to explain gross errors.
This app is very useful and and its measurement is correct I say by my experience this app is very good for maintaining and your fat and maintain your health health is wealth
Too many ads/doesn't ask enough information - no measurements of body parts, etc. Don't waste your time!
Love it so easy to use and keep me on track of my goal with fat percent I loss with idea weight along with the bmi.

title: The Secret of Weight
description:
The Secret of Weight (TSOW) is a simple and practical calorie counter based on photos. With this fun and playful application, you can either maintain your weight, slim down or even gain weight; it‚Äôs all up to you!

We all have heard about calories before! Why use this app then? Is it easy to navigate? How do we add up our calories?

The Secret of Weight explains everything! The number of calories you can spend each day. What happens if you go over your budget? How to rectify when you overindulge... Most importantly, the application simplifies calorie counting for you, as you can select what you had to eat using food pictures in the app!

How does it work?

- There is a daily calorie budget which you can spend without getting fat. You can spend your money as you wish! You can eat all kinds of food and as long as you stay within your budget you will not gain weight! This is THE big Secret of Weight.

Okay, but how does it all work?

- Throughout the day, you can add the food you're having and select the portions you're having by using the food pictures. A small gauge shows you how many calories you have left to spend for that given day.
- If you eat more than the budget, you‚Äôll gain weight: a chart shows you, in real time, how many grams you gain when you overindulge.
- If you eat less than your estimated budget, you‚Äôll lose weight: a chart indicates, in real time, how many grams you have lost.

The new thing about this concept is to make you see how losing weight does not necessarily mean banishing forbidden foods from your diet! You will also precisely learn how many calories you will need to eat or not in order to gain or lose a kilo.

Contents:
- Caloric gauge and dashboard.
- Food catalogue:
    1661 photos of food
    1934 foods represented
- Possibility to add food to your cart, using or not photos.
- Possible to save your own recipes with or without photos.
- You can add food items to "Favorites".
- Food shopping (it is possible to check your basket for the last 10 days).
- Customized Settings.
- Help topics.
- Small character as your coach ("Flo").
- Possibility to customize the dashboard by changing the color of the gauge and the character (by pressing one or the other).

No fees, no additional paying options. The only product that we present is the book, The Secret of Weight (available on Amazon), which, if you buy it, will tell you more about the Secret of Weight method!

We invite you to test this wonderful tool for yourself!

The application‚Äôs limited options help us focus on the simple, basic things. You will quickly get to know all the options (but it will still take a few minutes to understand the basic idea). With the help of explanatory texts, you will catch on and before you know it you'll start managing your weight all on your own! Keep it simple, think simple, and lose weight easily!

No fees, no additional paying options. The only product that we present is the book, The Secret of Weight (available on Amazon), which, if you buy it, will tell you more about the Secret of Weight method!

We invite you to test this wonderful tool for yourself!

The application‚Äôs limited options help us focus on the simple, basic things. You will quickly get to know all the options (but it will still take a few minutes to understand the basic idea). With the help of explanatory texts, you will catch on and before you know it you'll start managing your weight all on your own! Keep it simple, think simple, and lose weight easily!
