title: BMI Calculator
description:
üî∂ Body Mass Index (BMI) Calculator for everyone. üî∂

Body Mass Index (BMI) is a measurement of a person‚Äôs weight with respect to their height. It is more of an indicator than a direct measurement of a person‚Äôs total body fat. 
BMI, more often than not, correlates with total body fat. This means that as the BMI score increases, so does a person‚Äôs total body fat. 
The WHO defines an adult who has a BMI between 25 and 29.9 as overweight - an adult who has a BMI of 30 or higher is considered obese - a BMI below 18.5 is considered underweight, and between 18.5 to 24.9 a healthy weight. 
BMI is used to assess a person‚Äôs health risks associated with obesity and overweight or underweight. 

BMI Calculator  is one of the tools that are used to calculate healthy risk. Other factors such as blood pressure, cholesterol level, blood sugar level, family history of heart disease, age, gender, waist circumference, level of physical activity, menopause status, smoking status, etc. are also taken into consideration while assessing health risk. 

 Features: 
‚Ä¢ Calculate BMI for both men and women.
‚Ä¢ Height, weight in many units: height in centimeter, meter, feet+inch; weight in kilogram, pound. 
‚Ä¢ Show your category of body shape (underweight/normal/overweight/pre-obese/obese/very obese).
‚Ä¢ Show your ideal weight, the best weight in many units (kilogram/pound).
‚Ä¢ Save your information related to BMI and tracking your weight the whole time. 
‚Ä¢ Show trend of your weight's change. 
‚Ä¢ Add a note to show your moment each time.
‚Ä¢ Statistical graph of BMI, weight' changes the whole time. 
‚Ä¢ Offer many exercises to improve your body shape.
‚Ä¢ Offer the reminder to help you remember to calculate BMI and do the exercises every day.

üëè I hope you love and enjoy this application.

title: Calorie Counter by Lose It! for Diet & Weight Loss
description:
Lose It! is a calorie counter & food diary diet app that helps you stick to your diet and achieve weight loss that fits! Simply download the app, set your goals and track your diet, food and exercises to lose weight. Easily track macro, carb and calorie intake with Lose It! calorie counter & food diary app!

Since our launch in 2008 we have been featured in The Wall Street Journal, The Today Show, Men‚Äôs Health, Women‚Äôs Health, CNET, Buzzfeed, CNN, Shape, Good Morning America, and more.

‚Ä¢ 80+ million pounds of weight lost by our members (and counting)
‚Ä¢ 27+ million searchable food items in our comprehensive international food library database 
‚Ä¢ 40+ million users who have started their weight loss journey with Lose It!
‚Ä¢ 25+ macro nutrient, carb, calorie and health goals to choose from
‚Ä¢ 3 days of calorie and diet tracking is all it takes to see a result in weight loss

Stay on track of your diet and calorie intake with Lose It! Calorie Counter. Whether it be a keto diet, vegan diet or anything in between, Lose It! will help you find weight loss that fits by tracking your macro, carb and calorie intake to reach your weight loss and health goals. Stop making excuses ‚Äì start losing weight with Lose It!

HOW THE LOSE IT! CALORIE COUNTER & FOOD DIARY APP HELPS YOUR WEIGHT LOSS JOURNEY

Lose It! isn‚Äôt your average calorie counter and food & diary app. Lose It! uses the proven principles of calorie counting and tracking to help you succeed. To get started, input your profile details and we‚Äôll calculate the daily calorie budget best for you. Next, easily track your food, weight, and activity and get ready to celebrate your weight loss victories. Gain insight on your macro, carb, protein, sugar, fat and overall calorie and food intake on a daily level. Stay on top of your keto, vegan, vegetarian or whole 30 diet! Change your calorie and diet habits and learn about your nutrition needs. 

LOSE IT! CALORIE COUNTER FEATURES

‚Ä¢ Barcode Scanner ‚Äì quickly scan food barcodes or search our database to track your carb, macro and calorie intake.
‚Ä¢ Snap It ‚Äì Want to know your carb count? Log food by simply taking a photo of your food. Just tap the camera icon for food tracking and calorie counting in a snap. 
‚Ä¢ Track Nutrients ‚Äì track more than just calories including macro, protein, water, carb, sugar, body measurements, sleep cycles, and more. Stay on top of your keto, vegan or vegetarian diet needs! Learn what nutrients you need along your weight loss journey.
‚Ä¢ Fitness App Syncs ‚Äì connect trackers, apps, and devices like Fitbit trackers, Misfit trackers, Garmin trackers, Withings scales, Google Fit, Healthkit, and more.
‚Ä¢ Challenges ‚Äì step up your game with fun weight loss, fruit/veggie, health and exercise challenges by yourself or with your friends.
‚Ä¢ Meal Planning & Targets ‚Äì meal targets help you calculate suggested macro, carb, protein and overall calorie intake. Customize your diet and eating for personalized weight loss!
‚Ä¢ Patterns ‚Äì learn about your food and calorie intake habits with our exclusive personal insights to identify what is hindering or helping your weight loss progress.
‚Ä¢ Recipes ‚Äì customize your diet and weight loss journey with breakfast, lunch, and dinner meals you create yourself. Find easy food recipes for your Keto diet, vegan diet, vegetarian diet, Whole 30 - or any diet!
‚Ä¢ Workout Guides - library of workouts to help guide you to weight loss success. Weight loss is more than just a diet and food tracking! Get moving and work your way to a healthy weight & healthy living.

Download Lose It! Calorie Counter today and join our community of members helping us reach our mission to mobilize the world to healthy weight loss. No matter your diet needs or weight loss goals, Lose it! Calorie Counter can help you find weight loss that fits to achieve your health goals!

comments: This app ticks all the boxes for me for a weight tracking app (I've tried many). It has a decent barcode scanner and a reasonably well curated database, option to save meals and recipes, and a breakdown of macronutrients you consumed in the free subscription. It doesn't try to solve all the world's problems and do it poorly. That's impressively hard to find! I also like the UI, it's pretty, intuitive and uncluttered.

Really love this app. I have used it for a month with no problems, but today I can't go to my goals without the app shutting down. Please fix this! Until today I would have given 5 stars. I've reported problem but haven't heard a response yet.

Bugs fixed. I'd like to add that the year subscription is totally worth it. When paired with GoogleFit I have lost 25 lbs in three months. App holds you 100% accountable when no one else can, if you cheat you cheat yourself out of weight loss. Follow your plan , exceed your goals and the weight will fall off. By the time you realize it it is already a habit and you are accounting for everything u consume. The app will inform u of the areas that need improvement.

Most nutritional information in this app is incorrect. For example, items like calories, carbohydrates and proteins are not always correct and in fact very can be far off. Where my actual carbohydrates are 180g, this app will tell me they are only 130g. This may have something to do with the fact that anyone can go in and adjust nutritional information. The app would be great otherwise but I cannot continue to use it or refer my clients because of the abundant false nutritional information.

Two updates now and calories still do not change when weight changes. I have emailed support, but I guess the engineers just don't care that their app does not work properly. Not sure what their focus is within the app, but they sure are not good a fixing things they screw up thats for sure. I given up on emailing. Seems to be a huge waste of time.

title: BMI Calculator
description:
BMI Calculator helps you to calculate your Body Mass Index (BMI) based on the relevant information on body weight, height, age and sex.
Know what your physical condition is or if you have to improve it in order to have a good health. 
It provides the accurate measurement based on the weight and height provided by user along with age.

Monitoring your body mass index regularly can give you a good idea about your condition. The information that the app provides you is based on your age, your height and your weight. All the answers are calculated with pieces of information that you provides. For example, the app can estimate if you are underweight, in good weight, overweight or obesity according to the information introduced.

Features

- Calculate your ideal weight based on your height, weight, gender and age.
- BMI calculator shows real-time results
- Accurate BMI Chart for Men and Women
- Imperial and metric measurement units are supported.
- Accurate and precise calculation
- Simple and very easy to use
- Very flexible design

Because it is a risk factor for diseases such as overweight and obesity, hypertension, heart disease and diabetes. Also, if you want to lose weight or make a diet, this application is used to find healthy weight.

title: WeightWar - Weight Loss
description:
WeightWar helps you to manage your weight and diet systematically.

It helps you to lose your weight successfully by recording your daily weight.
It provides you a variety of charts and statistics of your weight. 
Then you can check it and manage your weight yourself.

And it provides checklist feature for daily activity such as 'Workout' or 'Drinking'.
This also helps you to lose weight.

Set your target weight.
And you can see the progress of your goal at a glance.

And notification feature is provided.
You can set alarms for inputting of your weight and diet.

And you can see BMI, BMR of your body.
These features may help you achieve your great goal.

‚Ä¢ Checklist feature for daily activity

comments: This is a simple app to work and great for tracking basic weight. The reason I did not give it a 5 star is because the app says my body fat is in the 30s, I have my body fat checked regularly and it is actually 18.8%. The app allows you to type in a correct number but does not save it and goes right back to saying it's in the 30s. It also automatically gives you a calorie plan with only knowing your age and weight. I weight train 5 days a week and do cardio 3-4 days.

put in my gender (f), age (27), height (67"), weight (166lbs) and it set my goals as to lose 96lbs and a goal weight of 69lbs!?!?! Are you kidding me? I cant find anywhere how to change this "goal". and I went over what I inputted like 5 times. it has my BMI correct at 26, but for some reason its setting this crazy, unrealistic, unhealthy goal for me. Would NOT recommend this app to anyone!

title: Weight Loss Tips & Tricks
description:
There was also a time when the thought of losing weight didn't even occur in our society, people ate
what mom cooked for dinner and they went to work. The difference in that society and today's society
is that work was not behind a computer screen, but on their feet in the fields or on a warehouse floor.
People worked physically because that was the only way to work, in fact, that's why it was called
work! It was often during this time that people could eat anything they wanted because they were
burning much more calories than what they consumed.
But, like all good things, that too has passed and the technology of today's world has left us in one
condition ‚Äì an overweight one. Our life styles have changed so drastically and our comforts have
increased tenfold. As they say, every rose has its thorn and for our society our desire to have
comfortable lives and to work less has begun to show around the waistline.
The bad thing about all of this is the more weight you gain, the more dangerous it becomes.
Extra weight spells illness, whether it is in the form of diabetes or a heart condition, it's bound to
show up if you don't do something about it. You have to be proactive in weight gain and you have to
work it off until it gets to a point where you no longer have control. It's not necessarily abou

descriptionHTML:
There was also a time when the thought of losing weight didn't even occur in our society, people ate
what mom cooked for dinner and they went to work. The difference in that society and today's society
is that work was not behind a computer screen, but on their feet in the fields or on a warehouse floor.
People worked physically because that was the only way to work, in fact, that's why it was called
work! It was often during this time that people could eat anything they wanted because they were
burning much more calories than what they consumed.
But, like all good things, that too has passed and the technology of today's world has left us in one
condition ‚Äì an overweight one. Our life styles have changed so drastically and our comforts have
increased tenfold. As they say, every rose has its thorn and for our society our desire to have
comfortable lives and to work less has begun to show around the waistline.
The bad thing about all of this is the more weight you gain, the more dangerous it becomes.
Extra weight spells illness, whether it is in the form of diabetes or a heart condition, it's bound to
show up if you don't do something about it. You have to be proactive in weight gain and you have to
work it off until it gets to a point where you no longer have control. It's not necessarily abou

title: Fooducate - Eat better. Lose weight. Get healthy.
description:
Lose weight and keep it off. Eat tasty, healthy, real food. Track your calories, macros, and workouts. Get motivation from the most supportive community in the world. 

Fooducate is the only app that analyzes and recommends foods based on their ingredient quality. No more tricks by sneaky food manufacturers!

THE BEST NUTRITION & HEALTH TRACKER
+ A meal tracker and so much more
+ Track your food intake and exercise 
+ Track the quality of calories
+ Track your macros: protein, fats, carbs

HUGE FOOD DATABASE
+ Scan over 250,000 product barcodes 
+ Get a personalized nutrition grade (A, B, C, or D) for each food
+ Get suggestions for healthier foods based on what you scan

THE BEST DIET TIPS
+ Free health & diet tips from nutrition professionals
+ Free weight loss tips
+ Motivation, love & support from the community

FOODUCATE TEACHES YOU TO EAT FOR HEALTH!
Fooducate analyzes information found in product nutrition panels and ingredient lists. Scan to discover things manufacturers don't want you to notice:
- added sugars
- artificial sweeteners such as aspartame
- trans fats 
- high fructose corn syrup 
- MSG
- controversial food colorings 
- GMO - genetical modified organisms (premium feature) 
- additives and preservatives 
- and more... 

THE BEST WEIGHT LOSS APP

‚Ä¢ Featured multiple times on the Google Play store
‚Ä¢ Media praise: USAToday, NYTimes, Dr. Oz, Oprah, WSJ, ABC, FOX,. . . 
‚Ä¢ Recommended by doctors, dietitians, fitness trainers, and your friends 

PERSONALIZE FOODUCATE
- age, gender,weight, height, activity level
- desired weight loss rate
- carb control

- dietary goals (non processed foods, vegetarian)
- avoid MSG, HFCS, GMOs and other ingredients
- Gluten free and other allergens

IN-APP PURCHASES

comments: This is such a great idea, and I can see the developers are really putting their hearts and souls into this. Unfortunately, the mobile app component doesn't quite work the way I would like it to, and maybe that's just me. 1) I spent an hour exploring the features and how to do everything, and there were just way too many rabbit holes I fell into - oops, that didn't do quite what I thought it would - backtrack, start over. I would like to see more simplicity. 2) I'm disappointed you have to get the app to get the Health Tracker feature. I can see the benefit of being able to gather information on the fly without having to visit your desktop computer, but when there's a lot of typing involved (for searches and such) it would be nice to be able to manage that date from my desktop computer. 3) When I first signed up for this, I envisioned a tracking feature that, once I entered everything I ate on a given day, would give me a summary of all the nutrients included in all I ate that day. I only found calories, fats, carbs, and [some other thing I can't remember now]. You can make that a pro feature, but I did not see where you have done this. 4) I would have strongly considered the Pro version if it included a "low fat" profile.

On Android, when you click Contact Us, it gives me options to share content via other apps?? No info on how to contact the Devs about issues. Also, if I scan a barcode that's not in the system, it asks me to take 3 pictures. After I do, I get the same issue as the Contact Us button, with a pop up to share content. So I can only add food by searching for it and clicking add food at the bottom of the screen. Otherwise the app is good. The UI could be cleaned up a bit, but I'm happy with it so far.

I thought this app was a really great idea and I still think it is but it doesn't seem like anybody is really putting any work into it there's a lot of good foods out there that they're saying is bad for no good reason they're foods out there that are slightly processed or have a little bit of added sugar that are way better than a lot of other things but they're going to make you think that it's not good because it's slightly processed. processed doesn't mean bad

It wouldn't keep my manual changes to calories and target date, etc. When I went to "contact us," it kept taking me to a quick share option that didn't provide me with any email or other form of contact information. Very frustrating

Such a great app not only for tracking my food, but also for finding better options when it comes to some foods. I love that you can scan the barcode on a package (most packages) and get a letter grade and explanation for it's grade (whether it's preservatives, added sugar, etc). And as mentioned, it will offer alternatives to the scanned item so that you might be able to find a similar but healthier option. I do pay for premium now but even before that I found the app immensely helpful shopping

title: BMI Calculator
description:
This application calculates a person's body mass index (BMI), according to their weight and height. You can calculate your BMI, clear your doubts, and know if you are above your ideal weight.

- What is BMI?

BMI is an acronym for Body Mass Index.

BMI is the international standard measuring instrument for assessing the degree of obesity adopted by the World Health Organization (WHO). BMI is used as a way to compare the health of populations, or even define the prescription of medications.

Overweight and obesity, indicated by BMI, are risk factors for diseases such as hypertension, coronary artery disease, and diabetes Mellitus, in addition to other pathologies considered high risk for public health.

BMI values are independent of age and gender. Despite of this, BMI may not correspond to the same degree of fat in different populations due to the different body proportions.

Health risks associated with increased BMI should be constantly observed and interpreted, since they may be different in each population.

More information: https://123bmi.com

title: Truweight- Weight Loss, Diet plans & Immunity
description:
Want to lose weight naturally and overcome lifestyle-related diseases like Diabetes, PCOD, Thyroid, High cholesterol ? 
Want to boost your overall health and build better immunity and be more energetic in your day to day life?
Are you someone who is looking to lose weight without having to sacrifice your favourite foods? 

If the answer to any of these is yes, then you are at the right place!

Among the many calorie-centric weight loss applications out there, Truweight is a breath of fresh air. 
We offer effective and sustainable weight loss solutions that neither encourages calorie counting nor several hours of vigorous exercising. 

In fact, our unique model encourages you to EAT MORE TO LOSE MORE.  We have helped achieve weight loss goals of 40,000+ clients, and we want to help you too.

TOP FEATURES:

1. Free Health Consultation ‚Äì Get to know your complete body analysis - BMI, body age, fat %, muscle %, visceral fat and also get customised diet tips. The consultation will help you to understand your body and health a lot better.

2. Free Immunity Course - A free 45 minutes course to help you fight lethal diseases. It will help you understand the powers of your immune system and learn to boost these powers. It contains practical tips on lifestyle changes and diet that can help you build immunity.

3. 7 Day Weightloss Course ‚Äì Want to know why you are gaining weight? What you should eat and do to lose weight? Learn straight from our founders how to lose weight in this 7-day video course. 

4. Community to Lose Weight- Community can help a person achieve even the biggest goals. In our social page, you will get to interact live with our other users; know about their weight loss journey, difficulties, successes, tips, and much more.

5. Learning Tools ‚Äì Our mission is to make earth lighter, and we want to give you all the knowledge to kickstart your weight loss journey. In our learn page, find eye-opening and interesting health tips, recipes and exercise videos.  You can also download 15+ e-books on PCOS, belly fat, diabetes, cholesterol etc which are directly related to weight gain.

6. Chat with our Dietitians ‚ÄìYou can get any weight loss and health-related query answered by our dietitian. You ask and we will answer!

Awarded Two Times Winner of Times Healthcare Award for Innovative Solutions
 
Want more? 

Choose a program and become a member to unlock our Premium Features!
Premium members get customized diet plans, access to log daily meals and much more. 

Before customizing your diet plans, we take into account - your lifestyle, any health disease you are facing, your food preferences, how much alcohol you consume, how often you travel etc.

Top Features Premium Members get to enjoy:

1. Health Score: Health score will track your data and weight loss journey. Health scores are calculated based on the foods you log in and how healthy were your choices. The better the health score, the better your body is.

2. Health $ Account: Though we don‚Äôt count calories, we do have a concept called ‚ÄòHealth $‚Äô. We came up with this concept to give our clients an idea of how expensive health is. If you eat healthy foods, you will save your ‚ÄòHealth $‚Äô. If you eat unhealthy foods, you will lose your ‚ÄòHealth $‚Äô.

3. Diet Log- When you log your food each day, you earn some ‚ÄòHealth $‚Äô. It gives a measure of foods logged at the end of each day.

4. Sponsor a Meal: When you save 300 Health $, you can sponsor 10 meals for a destitute kid. This way, you eat healthy meals and at the same time provide meals for a child in need.

5. Report: You can view your monthly report of foods you have consumed (protein, sugar, carbs, etc) in the Truweight app.

Are you ready to take your 1st step towards Gaining Health and Immunity ?  To enrol in our health programs or to book free health consultation, contact us on 080-45450057 or write to us at social@truweight.in

title: BMI Calculator - Weight Tracker - Body Fat Percent
description:
Calculate your Body Mass Index (BMI) based on the relevant information on body weight, height, age and sex.

Tracking your daily weight and analyze your progress in various charts 

Also use the included handy calculators to determine your Waist-to-Height Ratio (WHtR), Body Fat Percentage and Calorie Consumption (BMR + PAL).

The Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR) Calculator estimates your basal metabolic rate‚Äîthe amount of energy expended while at rest in a neutrally temperate environment, and in a post-absorptive state (meaning that the digestive system is inactive, which requires about 12 hours of fasting). This calculator is based on the Mifflin - St Jeor equation.

WHtR Calculator is used to calculate your waist to height ratio and help you determine if your WHtR falls in a healthy range.

Included features:
‚Ä¢ BMI calculation - classified by sex and different age ranges
‚Ä¢ Local storage to track your daily weight
‚Ä¢ Analyze your weight history in various charts and visualizations to gain insights on the way to a better body image
‚Ä¢ Set a desired target weight and follow your progress
‚Ä¢ Comprehensive statistics about your weight, i.e. your average weight or difference your starting and target weight.
‚Ä¢ A weight reminder that supports you to achieve your ideal weight
‚Ä¢ Input weights in the metric or imperial unit system

Check your body stats to find your ideal weight, because overweight and obesity are risk factors for diseases such as hypertension, heart disease and diabetes. It can also be used to find your healthy weight if you want to lose weight or are on diet.

More information about the BMI is available on the website of the World Health Organization (WHO).

title: Handy Weight Loss Tracker, BMI
description:
Tired of huge apps with tens of useless functions? So we are! 

This app lets you track your body weight and your BMI. Period. 

Enjoy minimal and handy interface!

Features:
‚Ä¢ Enter your body weight easily to the weight diary with a handy numberpicker
‚Ä¢ Track your BMI just by specifing your height in profile
‚Ä¢ Backup the data of your body weight recorder to SD-card and transfer it to your new smartphone
‚Ä¢ Choose how to display your progress - as a graph or a table
‚Ä¢ Add a comment for weighing

Now you will always have your body weight and BMI diary on hand. Any time you may check your progress in weight loss that will motivate you for future success. 

Weight loss is a long term undertaking. For maximum sustainable result in your body weight loss you should lose not more than 1 kilo a week. So you definitely need a good body weight and BMI ( Body Mass Index) diary to track you progress.

Knowing you BMI is a pretty useful thing during weight loss process. With your BMI you know exactly how healthy your body weight is. 

Your new Weight and BMI tracker holds your progress in the most efficient way ‚Äì as a diary and a graphic. Any time you may see all your weight loss progress. Observing you results is the best motivation for further weight loss!
Just step on the scale every day, put your body weight into the app and watch your weight going down and your BMI moving towards healthy value.

title: Weight Loss Tracker, BMI Calculator Body Stats Log
description:
Do you want to know your body statistics and keep a weight record? Are you in search of ‚Äútrack my weight‚Äù & BMI formula calculator app? Do you want to know your body mass index and track your weight?

Well, Weight Loss Tracker, BMI Calculator & Body Stats is it! It‚Äôs a smart & comprehensive weight tracking & weight log tool that will keep you focused on your weight loss goal.

üèãÔ∏è‚ÄçWHAT IS BMI?
BMI (Body Mass Index) is an action of measuring body fat based on your height and weight that applies to both adult men and women between the ages of 18 and 65 years. Your bmi can tell you how much weight you need to lose in order to stay in shape or lose weight to go below the ‚Äúoverweight‚Äù threshold. This bmi formula and the advanced weight tracking determine your weight loss or weight gain goals!
This bmi tracker, weight tracker and macro calculator app uses the D. R. Miller bmi formula and it is designed only for people having age group 20 to 65 years old and helps you to calculate your BMI and determines the ideal weight you should gain. The data given provides you with excellent body statistics and weight tracking features so you can achieve perfect fitness and weight.

How can you calculate your BMI using our free bmi calculator app?
- Enter your weight and height
- Enter your age
- And hit calculate and save
That‚Äôs it! Then you can set your target weight goal. 

‚ú® YOUR EASY WAY TO OPTIMAL WEIGHT

title: Weight
description:
Set a healthy and realistic goal, if you‚Äôre looking to lose or gain a few pounds could be challenging. With this app, you can track your weight periodically and monitor your progress. Statistics and graphs will give you more insights, helping to reach your goals! You can set them by yourself, or ask for an advice to the app. In this case, it will take the suggested Body Mass Index (BMI), and then it will compute a possible weight and achievable date to reach it (Note: this does not substitute a professional medical advice). If you are on diet, the app could help you to collect data for your nutritionist or your dietitian.

You can associate your blood pressure and a note to each measured weight. You may also track multiple profiles, or use different profiles for different goals.

The app offers:

‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Weight tracking  
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Support for multiple separate profiles
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Custom color for different profiles
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Backup on Google Drive‚Ñ¢
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Storage and modification of the measures and dates
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Metric (meters an kilograms) and imperial (pounds, feet and inches) measurement units
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Computed Body Mass Index (BMI), Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR) using different formulas
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Statistics about weight variations and progress


This app is not meant to serve as a source of clinical guidance and is not intended to be a substitute for professional medical advice. If you are on diet, consulting a nutrition specialist may help you to define achievable and healthy goals.

title: Weight Loss Tracker - BMI Assistant
descriptionHTML:
Do you want to monitor your weight loss and your BMI?
Here is the perfect app to help you control your weight loss/gain or just maintain your ideal weight.

‚ñ∫ DIET MODE OR SIMPLE FOLLOW-UP
You use the app in diet or simple tracking mode to monitor your weight loss in a simple and intuitive way.

‚ñ∫ CUSTOM RESULTS
For personalized results, the app takes into account your height, age, gender, physique and level of activity.

‚ñ∫ CALCULATE YOUR IDEAL WEIGHT
The app allows you to calculate your ideal weight. It also allows you to calculate an ideal end date for your diet. You always have the option to enter the weight and end date you aim for to remain in control of your ideal weight.

‚ñ∫ VIEW YOUR PROGRESS EASILY
The application allows you to view your progress in the form of bmi gauge, weight table and weight chart. You can check your daily target, the weight lost, the weight remaining, the number of days spent and the number of days remaining.

‚ñ∫ CHECK YOUR LOSS OR WEIGHT GAIN
The application is suitable should you want to lose or gain weight. You control daily what you have to lose/gain to reach your ideal weight.

‚ñ∫ CALCULATE YOUR RECOMMENDED CALORIE ALLOWANCE
BMI Assistant calculates your recommended daily calorific intake, your daily energy expenditure, and your base level metabolism at rest based on your activity.

‚ñ∫ VARIOUS FEATURES
‚úì Entering your weight daily and adding comments for each weight;
‚úì BMI chart and graphical gauge;
‚úì View the tracking log;
‚úì Calculation of your ideal weight according to your gender and your physique;
‚úì Calculation of the reasonable end date for weight loss or gain;
‚úì Display of your daily target, the weight lost, the weight remaining, the number of days elapsed and the number of days remaining;
‚úì Calculation of your BMI (bmi = body mass index);
‚úì Calculation of your FMP(fmp = fat mass percentage);
‚úì Display of the average daily and weekly weight loss;
‚úì Calculation of recommended daily calorific intake;
‚úì Calculation of your daily energy expenditure;
‚úì Calculation of your base level metabolism at rest according to your activity;
‚úì Display of your weight variation in a graph;
‚úì Graph display weekly, monthly or in full;
‚úì Modification of the profile;
‚úì Follow-up mode or diet;
‚úì Multiple themes;
summary: Keep daily track of your weight loss, ideal weight, BMI and diet
recentChanges: Addition of an alert allowing you to modify your plan or determine a new goal when you have reached the end date of your plan.
comments: I tested several apps. For me, this is the best. It's easy to use without unnecessary frills. Fonts are small enough to display a lot of information on the cellphone, yet is still readable. It's easy to set past dates (e.g. birthdate) without copious scrolling. Unlike some apps, the graph displays a range of greater than 30 days; to also be able to display a custom range would be helpful. Ads are unobtrusive but aren't in premium. Also with premium, the app syncs across multiple devices.

This ap is ideal for me. I just want to track my weight and BMI, this does that in a clear and acurate way. I will be paying the small amount for an Add free version, even though the Adds aren't very intrusive. Thank you.

was looking for a small size app, with monitoring capabilities. does the job accurately. if there could be a way to extract the weight loss progression, it would be easy to share with dr n dietitian. thank you for keeping it simple!

Functionality is great and simple. It would be really helpful to have the target weightloss split out over the time you have left to your target date and also be able to have multiple targets. I can't seem to work this out if it is a function.

It would be nice if you can chose when you would like to be reminded to input your daily weight. I would prefer to be reminded in the morning while this app keeps reminding me in the middle of the day which made me turn reminder off.

title: BMI Calculator Chart
description:
Stay healthy! How do you know if your weight loss program gives you the result you want? Don‚Äôt let all your hard work go for nothing. Start calculating and tracking your BMI with this app.

This is the only BMI Calculator that you will need.

App Robot‚Äôs BMI Calculator is an app that helps calculating and tracking your Body Mass Index (BMI) with ease. 

You will instantly figure out your current BMI number with the simple to use UI. Swipe the slider to set your current height and weight, and the app will continuously calculate the BMI number for you. No typing required!

Whether you are overweight or underweight, the slider will help you figure out your weight target by simply swiping it left or right, and stop when it turns green.

Figuring out your current BMI number is the first step towards your healthier life. Save your BMI number daily with the app and monitor your progress in the analytics dashboard.

From the dashboard, you can get:
- A chart with instant view to your BMI numbers over time.
- Your current BMI state.
- Your BMI trend direction.
- A recommendation action.
- List of all of your BMI numbers.

Did that weight loss program really work? You will see it by yourself in the dashboard whether your numbers are trending up or down.

Should you lose more weight, or maintain exercise, or even need to add more weight? This app comes with a recommendation system that learns from your BMI numbers. Let the app be your cheerleader to achieve your goal.

This is the most convenient app for calculating and tracking your BMI available today. It is the best app for you whether you are on a weight loss or a weight gain program. This app is a perfect companion in your journey towards your healthier life.

Stay healthy!

Features:
- Set your height and weight with sliders and let the app automatically calculate your BMI for you.
- Continuous BMI calculation gives you an easy way to figure out your weight target.
- Save the your BMI number daily to keep track of your progress.
- Complete analytics dashboard gives you a visual access to BMI chart.
- Our analytics engine provides you with your current state, trend and recommendation action.
- Simply login with your Google account to make sure you are not losing your BMI records.

Download the app now!

This app follows CDC guidelines on BMI with the excerpt below:
Body mass index (BMI) is a person‚Äôs weight in kilograms divided by the square of height in meters. BMI is an inexpensive and easy screening method for weight category‚Äîunderweight, healthy weight, overweight, and obesity.

BMI does not measure body fat directly, but BMI is moderately correlated with more direct measures of body fat. Furthermore, BMI appears to be as strongly correlated with various metabolic and disease outcome as are these more direct measures of body fatness.

This app is suitable for adults with age 20 years or older. This app does not distinguish between male or female in the calculation.

If you like the app, please leave a 5-star rate to support us.

For any other comments or questions about the app, please send your email to support@app-robot.com.

Download the app now!

title: Family Health - BMI Calculator for Adult & Child
description:
Record the health of family members! Keep abreast of your and your family's BMI

BMI Calculator for Adult & Child is an app which can calculate your BMI (Body Mass Index) based on the relevant information on body weight, height, age and gender. With this app, you can keep abreast of your and your family's BMI, and check the body stats to find your ideal weight. It's the most professional BMI calculation tool.

- How is BMI used with children and teens?
For children and teens, BMI is not a diagnostic tool and is used to screen for potential weight and health-related issues. For example, a child may have a high BMI for their age and sex, but to determine if excess fat is a problem, a health care provider would need to perform further assessments. These assessments might include skinfold thickness measurements, evaluations of diet, physical activity, family history, and other appropriate health screenings. Recommends the use of BMI to screen for overweight and obesity in children beginning at 2 years old. 

- How is BMI used?
A high BMI can be an indicator of high body fatness. BMI can be used as a screening tool but is not diagnostic of the body fatness or health of an individual.
To determine if a high BMI is a health risk, a healthcare provider would need to perform further assessments. These assessments might include skinfold thickness measurements, evaluations of diet, physical activity, family history, and other appropriate health screenings.

- Why is BMI used to measure overweight and obesity?
BMI can be used for population assessment of overweight and obesity. Because calculation requires only height and weight, it is inexpensive and easy to use for clinicians and for the general public. BMI can be used as a screening tool for body fatness but is not diagnostic.

- Why have different BMI standards?
After an expert assessment, the World Health Organization believes that the overweight indicators of adults in Southeast Asia are lower than the world average. According to the situation of each country, the demarcation value of overweight fluctuates between 22 and 25.

Main features:
*Support BMI computing for Adults and Kids.
*Support WHO, USA, Asia, China, Hong Kong, Japan, Singapore and other countries and regions in health standards.
*Record body data and Calculate BMI.
*Add informations of family members and record  their body data by establishing a family circle.
*Write and share family's health diaries with pictures.
*Store history data by charts, including weight and height.
*Analyse data and give health advices.
*Imperial and metric measurement units are supported.
*Data Synchronization with Google Fit.
*Support Dark Mode


Criticism, praise, problems with this app? Feel free to contact us via email: st2udio@gmail.com

comments: Super organized and seems user friendly But you have to download a different app for the heart rate monitor and the steps are VERY innacurate. It logged down 3 steps just starting it and for every 1 step I did, it showed at least 5. I downloaded the basic version to see if preminum would be worth it. The two main things I wanted in an app are two that are inaccurate or unavailable.

I intent of this app is just want I needed. Unfortunately for me, the execution just didn't live up to expectations. For example, I have a watch to track my steps & the app doesn't allow you to enter them, only miles. The vital section does not contain BP. It is located in another section. The BMI calculator is not accurate, imo. There are additional issues that I have w/ the app but I believe it's due to personal preferences & needs. Overall, it's a decent app just not for me.

I hate that you have to slide to get the numbers instead of just typing it in. Also it will not allow me to enter my food intake for this date. It automatically started at January 1st and when I changed it, it still entered to Jan 1st. Even though the date on the calender was correct.

I do like the app, but it doesn't have a feature to switch to feet/inches of to fl. ounces. I also wish it could connect to google fit, fitbit, and other fitness trackers. If this is fixed then I could in good continuous give this app five stars.

Very systematically efficient app. Algorithms properly arranged. Quality Control at its peak. No chance for complain. Has used different variety of colours in an unique way. Very light-weighted app. Can be easily downloaded with low data speed. Works as an accountant of our body. Gives us the invoice of our body's physical ability. No need to buy expensive smart watches. Just download this app and enjoy!

title: Child BMI Calculator -Body Mass Index for children
description:
Ever wondered if your children have the appropriate weight? 
With this simple Body Mass Index (BMI) calculator, you can figure out if your child is at an appropriate weight for his or her height and age according to the general reading table of the World Health Organization.Free BMI calculation based on weight and height.

The BMI is a measure of body fat based on weight and height. Our medical utility application can be used for kids and adolescents from 2 to 20 years of age. BMI Calculator helps you to find the ideal weight.

Please note that as children grow, their amount of body fat changes and so will their BMI. That's why a Body Mass Index( BMI)  calculation for a child or adolescent must take into account their age and gender. Always see your doctor if you are concerned about your child's growth.

This application is completely FREE and supported by ads.

Please note that as children grow, their amount of body fat changes and so will their BMI. That's why a Body Mass Index( BMI) calculation for a child or adolescent must take into account their age and gender. Always see your doctor if you are concerned about your child's growth.

This application is completely FREE and supported by ads.
summary: Keep track of your child BMI. Free BMI calculation based on weight and height.

title: Body measurements - weight, BMI, waist, fat, pulse
description:
Simple app for daily measurements to help you with weight loss or building muscles. Store and track your data on charts.

Base measures:
- body fat, muscle, water
- blood pressure and sugar
- calf, chest, height, hips, neck, thigh, upper arm, waist, weight

Indicators:
- Body Mass Index (BMI)
- Waist to Hip Ratio (WHR)
- Waist to Height Ratio (WHtR)
- Body Adiposity Index (BAI)
- Body Fat (US Navy)
- Body Fat (YMCA)

Purchase PRO version to:
- create own measures
- create more than 3 measure groups
- create user profles within app
- remove ads

Application contains in-app advertisements.

comments: Reasonable app but doesn't allow you to set goals properly in some cases. If you try to set a blood pressure goal of 120/90, regardless of what you change it won't save properly and you end up with a goal of 80/80 or 90/90. So it's effectively useless. Uninstalled and refund requested until it works as it's supposed to!!

Great app, bought the pro version. But I'd like to see automatic backups and a dark theme. Also, there's a bug where when I type manually the values, it somehow doesn't save properly if I don't tap somewhere else first. Solve that and it's going to be a five-star.

Doesn't feel intuitive. Would be helpful with instructions. The developer responded to let me know I have to use History to add my current info. I had thought it was useless as I couldn't work out how to add any data. Every button I selected gave me one reply. "This feature is available in Pro version". Would benefit from a smple guide to say how to add a measurement. Giving this another go as it seems to be what I'm looking for. Thanks for the help.

This is exactly what I was looking for. I have a scale that measures body fat, muscle, water, bone, and weight, and I wanted an app to record these stats. I didn't want to spend a lot of money on a bluetooth scale. I just needed an app where I could directly enter the stats in myself.   The app is very intuitive and easy to use. The paid version, which I will be getting, allows you to add more measurements. I like the graphs so you can easily see your progress.   One suggestion would be to have the choice of directly typing in the numbers.
Cloud data sync will be a great addition. Seeing all the charts in a single page without drop-down is my personal preference .

title: BMI,BMR and Fat % Calculator
description:
Easy and Useful App to calculate your BMI (Body Mass Index), Waist-to-Height Ratio, Body Fat Percentage and Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR). It is very useful for your weight loss and fitness plans

‚Ä¢ Body Mass Index: is defined as the body weight divided by the square of the height. It provides a rough guide since it doesn't take into account a person build or the composition of the body weight.
‚Ä¢ Waist-to-Height Ratio: is defined as the waist circumference divided by the height. It measures abdominal obesity and therefore can be used as a better indicator of health risks than Body Mass Index.
‚Ä¢ Body Fat Percentage: is defined as the weight of fat divided by the total weight. It is estimated with the 'US Navy Circumference Method' which uses the height and circumferences of waist, neck and hip.
‚Ä¢ Basal Metabolic Rate: The BMR or Basal Metabolic Rate is the calorie requirement for your body to function when you are in complete rest. Also, the daily calorie needs for sedentary, Lightly active, Moderately active, Very active, Extra active activity level are calculated.

This App is ad supported.

‚òÖ Have Suggestions or Issues?
Email ashermobilesolutions@gmail.com and you'll get a prompt response

title: Cat‚Äôs Health ‚Äì feline BMI
descriptionHTML:
Is Your pet fat or just fluffy? This simple and unique app will help You to answer this question.
Feline obesity is becoming increasingly common. It is estimated that up to 57 percent of cats that are living in our homes are overweight or obese, defined as 30 percent above their ideal weight.
Although you may like the look of cats with a little extra fat, it's very unhealthy for them to carry excess weight. Obesity can curb natural desire for physical activity and add to several serious disorders.
Traditionally, people relied on just looking at their pets to determine if they needed to lose or gain a little weight. But there is a better and more accurate way to assess cat's body fat content- the Feline Body mass index (FBMI). Combined with the Body Condition Scoring Chart, it will give an accurate results for different breeds of cats.
This app will not only help to find out if Your pet is overweight or underweight but also show some steps You can take to make sure that pet drops/gains weight in a healthy manner.
Main features:
- Simple and friendly user interface;
- Special formulas used for assessment;
- Convenient table to store the results;
- Some useful tips to get You pet in shape.
summary: Find out feline BMI and use some tips to make Your pet healthier

comments: Installed app just of curiosity.Never really thought that my cat might be overweight.Afer using this app I've took my cat to the vet and now she's on a special diet :) thanks!

description:
Very intuitive BMI calculator.

This BMI calculator allows you to quickly calculate the ratio of body mass index - BMI. Result is calculated according to general reading table created by World Health Organization (WHO). The BMI is meant to be used as a simple means of classifying physically inactive individuals with an average body composition. BMI categories (underweight, overweight or obese) from general reading table are inappropriate for athletes, children, the elderly, and the infirm because do not take into account many factors such as frame size and muscularity. The BMI categories also fail to account for varying proportions of fat, bone, cartilage, water weight, and more. Despite this, BMI categories are regularly regarded as a satisfactory tool for measuring whether sedentary individuals' weight is in normal range. Obligatory weight loss tool for obese people.

Features:
‚Ä¢ calculation of Body Mass Index (BMI)
‚Ä¢ presenting the ideal weight range for a given height - helpful if you want to lose weight or are on diet
‚Ä¢ calculation of Body Fat percentage
‚Ä¢ calculation of Waist-to-Height ratio (WtHR)
‚Ä¢ calculation of Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR) and total daily calorie expenditure, which depends on your activity level
‚Ä¢ supports metric and imperial units

Any comments are welcome. Please notify me by e-mail about any bugs found or missing functions that you want to be included in future versions of the BMI calculator.

NOTE: if you can help me with translation into your native language do not hesitate to contact me.

title: Obesity guide
description:
Overweight and obesity are defined as abnormal or excessive accumulation of body fat that represents a health risk. They are major risk factors for a number of chronic diseases, including diabetes, cardiovascular disease and cancer.
What is obesity?
Obesity is a chronic disease and the result of an excessive accumulation of fat in the body. Overweight occurs when the body absorbs more energy (calories) than it consumes for a long time. This excess of calories is then stored as fat. According to the National Institute of Health, a 20% increase in your "ideal body mass" is the threshold at which excess weight becomes a health risk.
This problem of obesity has become obvious in our society. Indeed, the prevalence of obesity has doubled in the last two decades in virtually all industrialized and developing countries.

title: Weight Manager - Scaless
description:
Scaless is a weight management app that allows you to keep track of your weight, to create a weight loss or gain plan and to visualize your progress in a chart form. 

This app also calculates your BMI and suggests your ideal weight as your goal to reach. 

In addition to this you can also track your :
‚Ä¢ body measurements 
‚Ä¢ blood pressure
‚Ä¢ sporting activities 
‚Ä¢ cholesterol levels

Main Features: 
- Simple data entry
- Weight tracker
- Visualization of your diet plan in a simple chart format.
- Calculation of your ideal weight based on age, height, gender 
- BMI (Body Mass Index)
- Ultimate weight goal/target
- Statistics
- Imperial and metrics units.

Expanded settings panel will additionally enable:

comments: It motivates me to keep on track. I love the simplicity of measurement input and tracking. Downside: very difficult to read the screen with visual impairment as it doesn't all fit on my mobile screen and can't be scrolled across or down. I wanted to use my playstore credit to move to the pro version but can't find how to change my email/Google profile to the correct email address.
not easy to use.
Better than most others

Simple & straightforward way to track weight, measurements, & some other stuff too. I love how detailed you can be in recording‚Äã measurements‚Äã. Only downside is the full screen adds - they're quite annoying. I'd pay a couple bucks to get rid of them but can't work out how to do that!

I love this app cause it's the only one that lets me track all my body measurements and my weight. This is so important as weight alone is often not the best indicator for your progress in physical fitness. Muscle is heavier than fat. So while you may think your weight is at a frustrating plateau, you might actually just be gaining muscle and lose water and fat which will show in your measurements. A lot more motivating than most of those purely weight/BMI  based apps out there.

title: Weight loss tracker, Body measurements, BMI
description:
Are you on a weight loss diet? Want to keep a track of your weight or calculate Body Mass Index (BMI)? Keep track of your weight using the most convenient app "Weight loss tracker, Body measurements".
This BMI calculator app keeps the track of your weight and BMI from time to time.  You will be able to enter your weight on a regular basis and monitor your progress accordingly through means of statistics and graphs. You can not only view your weight log history but also view a graph to track your weight loss progress over time. Using the ‚ÄúWeight loss tracker, Body measurements‚Äù app, you can manage your fitness profile and set target weight. By setting this target, you can motivate yourself to follow a fixed weight loss diet and easily achieve your target weight. You need to support your weight loss plan with appropriate exercises for fitness. 

This weight tracker app also allows you to track multiple profiles- monitor the progress of your spouse, family members, and friends or simply create more than one profile for yourself to set partial targets and may be select best weight loss program until you reach your ultimate goal. This is one of the best free apps to help you lose weight fast.

"Weight loss tracker, Body measurements" has a great user interface and simulates the gym environment around you with a personalized weight tracking. The app is ideal for those who visit the gym for their workout exercise and want to maintain their fitness and weight. The app also calculates your Body Mass Index (BMI) and also keeps a track of your BMI over time. Get the app immediately if you are really serious about your physical fitness and your weight loss plan.

************************
APP FEATURES
************************
- Track single or multiple profiles for weight loss
- Track various body measurements i.e. Waist, Hips, Chest, Shoulders, Neck, Thighs - Left, Thighs - Right, Calves - Left, Calves - Right, Biceps - Left, Biceps - Right, Forearms - Left, Forearms - Right
- Measurement tracking in kilos, pounds, feet‚Äôs, meters, stones
- Full screen graph to see overall weight loss over time
- Includes BMI calculator feature
- Calculate the daily calorie intake for weight loss
- Calculate total body fat
- Calculate total weight loss, daily weight loss, average monthly weight loss
- Enter weights for earlier dates
- PIN lock feature for better privacy
- Export/Import option on Device/Cloud
- Export all data through email
- Resetting of all data option
- Reminder for reviewing weight loss tracker
- 100% Ad Free version can be bought through Subscriptions (Remove ads)

Download the app "Weight loss tracker, Body measurements" and have your own self-made gym atmosphere with a personalized voice of your choice. Have your own pocket weight tracker with "Weight loss tracker, Body measurements" app. Set your target and achieve your goal through the app by staying motivated all the time!

Important terms:
‚Ä¢ BMI (Body Mass Index) or Quetelet index, is a measure of relative size based on the mass and height of an individual. It provides a rough guide since the BMI doesn't take into account a person‚Äôs build or the composition of the body weight.
‚Ä¢ The body fat percentage of a human or other living being is the total mass of fat divided by total body mass; body fat includes essential body fat and storage body fat.
‚Ä¢ Calorie Consumption is mainly a sum of internal heat produced (Basal Metabolic Rate estimated by Mifflin St Jeor Equation) and external work (Physical Activity Level).

************************
SAY HELLO
************************
We are constantly working hard on making the ‚ÄúWeight loss tracker, Body measurements‚Äù app better and more helpful for you. We need your constant support to get going. Please feel free to email us for any queries/suggestions or if you just want to say hello. We would love to hear from you. If you have enjoyed any feature of the ‚ÄúWeight loss tracker, Body measurements‚Äù app, do not forget to rate us on play store.

title: Weight Loss Recipes
description:
Weight loss recipes contain a variety of dishes that helps you to lose weight and keep it off. Skipping meals is not a good idea. To lose weight you have to reduce the number of calories you consume and increase the calories you burn through exercise. Our app helps you to find healthy, delicious weight-loss and diet recipes including breakfasts, lunches, and dinners.

Workout and Diet plays an important role in losing weight. Our app has a wide variety of diet and weight loss recipes to choose from with nutritional information. You can find all sorts of diet, weight loss and sugar-free recipes from soups to main courses.

Keep up with your workouts and we give you the perfect recipes to achieve a healthy and fit body.

OUR APP EXPERIENCE

Weight loss recipes app is simple to navigate and also has multiple tutorials available on how to use.
As the recipe is a set of instructions for cooking, our app also provides nutritional information, servings, total time for preparation and recommendations so that nothing can go wrong when you‚Äôre cooking.

Theme Support

Protect your eyes from being hurt by a bright screen at night by enabling dark mode.
Make your weight watchers cooking experience more comfortable at night.

Smart Shopping List for your Weight Watchers Grocery

An organized shopping list allows the user to create ingredients list so you won‚Äôt miss any for the recipe. Users can also add items directly from recipes.
It also has offline access.

Search 1M+ Weight Loss Recipes

Apart from shopping list our app also provides a global search feature
where you can find fitness foods you looking for or discover new recipes

Collect Your Favourite Low-Calorie Dish

Use our bookmark button to save and organize your recipes in your favorite recipe list. They also have offline access.

Personal Profile

Do you have a wonderful Weight Watcher recipe that you‚Äôd like to share? We would love for you to upload it. To submit your tasty recipe all you need to create an account. In addition to that, you can also upload your tasty food photos, and leave feedback, comments, and tips over our chef community.

Native Language

Another key feature of our app is it supports multiple languages.
Currently, we offer around 13 main languages.

Recipes Finder for your Daily Routine

Recipe Finder can help you find a good cuisine based on what you have in your fridge. You can provide a list of ingredients you have and bounce ideas off recipe finder so you never end up wasting any food!

Download the free Weight Loss app today. Happy Cooking!

title: Perfect BMI - Weight tracker & BMI calculator
description:
Perfect BMI is ideal for anyone who wants to track their weight and Body Mass Index (BMI) to keep in shape on daily basis!

This app will assist you to control your weight and BMI with customizable weight goal and goal-reaching date functions. It also automatically calculates your BMI and body fat % and suggest ideal range based on your weight and height. Additionally, you can track your weight changes daily with various entries and review them effortlessly with the integrated line chart and history features. 

Keep your weight history at a glance with the following features:
‚Ä¢	Set your target weight and goal-reaching date and follow your progress
‚Ä¢	Track your daily weight with more than 1 entry per day
‚Ä¢	Current BMI and ideal range calculated automatically
‚Ä¢	Integrated body fat % and healthy range calculated based on your BMI
‚Ä¢	Keep track and analyze your weight history with the line chart and visualizations to gain insights on your progress
‚Ä¢	Review on statistics about your weight, Body Mass Index (BMI) and difference with the starting weight. 
‚Ä¢	Reminder available for tracking your weight daily
‚Ä¢	Input weights and heights in the metric or imperial unit system
‚Ä¢	Available in: English, Chinese (Traditional) and Vietnamese 
‚Ä¢	Export and back up your weight data for future reference

Track your weight and reach your desired weight today with Perfect BMI!

comments: Great little motivating App, with numerous things that I love about it. The thing I love the most, is receiving daily reminders to record your weight. If you prefer to weigh yourself weekly, just ignore the daily reminders, but personally, I like to see my daily weight loss. You record your start weight and your goal weight and you can see the % of your goal weight lost. It shows the days remaining to reach your goal weight and your average daily weight loss, a graph and your BMI. PERFECT!
Useful for keeping track of you body BMI, clean UI.

You should add more functions that can help us to exercise, ie : training interval ...etc
This simple app is helping me to keep my weight low

title: Yoga for weight loss -¬†Lose weight in 30 days plan
descriptionHTML:
Yoga for weight loss is your virtual instructor in your pocket at home. Yoga to lose weight in 30 days is a complete time-proven program based on the most effective and time-tested Hatha and Kundalini yoga slimming exercises plan, poses, and asanas.

‚≠ê It is well known that yoga is a perfect assistant and weight reducing app for men and for women for boosting metabolic processes in the body - the asanas used in each workout speeds up the metabolic processes, starts, for example, thigh slimming workout for men and gives a very good load for all muscle groups of the body. Lose weight program and exercises plan does not require any additional equipment ‚Äì just 10 free minutes and your smartphone. Everyone can do app training: it has different difficulty levels, and day by day, your results will increase! We've created 3 different programs with more than 50 different workouts - it is a complete and effective weight loss guide for everyone!

Application features:
‚úîÔ∏è 80 the most effective and time-tested static and dynamic exercises that are working on all muscle groups of the body;
‚úîÔ∏è All exercises have detailed audio, video and text instructions: the answer to the question of how to lose weight in 1 week in the app, especially for women;
‚úîÔ∏è The virtual coach will show and tell how to perform each train for getting the most effective results in loss weight plan, free from any time limits and will motivate you to work harder;
‚úîÔ∏è 3 training programs, divided by levels of difficulty, and continuing each other with more than 50 different slimming workout for women. Yoga for beginners free app offline does not require an internet connection - so you can train anywhere;
‚úîÔ∏è You can also make and create your own training<, set its duration and time for rest;
‚úîÔ∏è Notifications system ‚Äì now you will never forget to do women exercise at home to reduce weight in 30 days;
‚úîÔ∏è System of achievements and rewards. If you are looking for yoga exercises for beginners - this is right for you;
‚úîÔ∏è Breathing tips and advice - the instructor will tell you how to breathe (only in the premium app version).

üèÖ In this app, we‚Äôve selected and combined the most effective lose weight workout for women & for men. Open the app and all you need is just to follow the virtual instructor recommendations. Yoga women exercise at home to reduce weight fast will speed up metabolism processes in your body, make your muscles work and, moreover, you‚Äôll do a great body stretch.

The training system is built in such a way that they have increasing complexity. As you exercise, you improve your strengths, do effective weight loss program for women and, what is most importantly, form a habit of regular sports.
If you do not get some asanas the first time, then it‚Äôs okay. The main thing is to try and in time you will succeed! Weight loss for fat is hard for all people and everyone needs just do it. During classes, it is very important not to over-train the body, so the app contains a special training calendar. We recommend that you do 2-4 arm slimming workout per week and primarily focus on your well-being!
How to lose weight in 30 days with the help of the app: a very important element of any goal is to track your progress. We introduce a 10-step system. You record your body parameters at the beginning and set the desired body parameters. Then you do weight reducing exercise for women & for men. You just need to reach the next stage and that‚Äôs it!

üëç Yoga exercises for beginners will help you to lose weight in 30 days in the most harmonious and healthy way without side effects in the cardiovascular system. How to reduce weight in 7 days in body: as practice shows, 1 week of regular exercises is enough to start and to get first results. If you really want to do the slimming workout ‚Äì this app is right for you. Just try to do the first day of yoga for beginners for fat burn¬†and you will definitely see the results.

üòÉ Good luck!

Have only used it once so far but i love this app. Easy to follow along. Layout is easy to understand. First app in a very long time that i found with a clean logical layout. Well done. The excersizes were easy enough to do that i was not intimidated, short enough to not get bored or overwhelmed yet long enough you feel immediate results. So far overall a wonderfull app. Thank you.

I love the yoga moves and I love the way it presents everything. My only complaint is that it doesn't tell you when the individual exercise is complete so I'm stuck having to stare at my phone instead on concentrating on the exercise watching for the end so I know to stop and get into the next exercise position. I would give 5 stars if that issue was fixed.

I have used this in the past, having gone through rehabilitation of my body after not having been able to walk for a week at all to using one leg for 4 months after a femur fracture and kneecap fracture, this helped me to regain energy and flexibility and lose weight. Now years later after giving birth to a baby I am using this again. Same results, works so far, added edge i need to my routine! Thank you to the creator and all involved in this app and all related apps, great job.

The routines are workouts that challenge your abilities in a healthy way. I feel good afterwards. Doing a routine every morning for awhile will definitely contribute to weight loss long term and improve my flexibility. Also convenient, all you need is a nice quiet space and maybe a yoga mat. Looking forward to continuing to use it.

title: BMI & Ideal Weight Calculator
description:
With BMI and Ideal Body Weight Calculator you can get your Body Mass Index and Ideal Weight based on Miller formula. 

Body mass index, or BMI, is a way to estimate whether a person is at a healthy weight for his or her height. Although the measure isn't a perfect indicator of a person's overall health, it's an easy way for most people to determine whether they are underweight, normal weight, overweight or obese.

title: BMI Calculator - Body Mass Index & Food Calculator
description:
Ever wondered what your BMI is? With this free and easy to use app you can calculate just that, and find out which BMI category you belong to, using your height and weight. 

The body mass index (BMI) is a value generally used to see how healthy someone's body is, based on their weight to height ratio.

This app uses the standard formula for calculating BMI, which is mass/height2. We also count in your age and gender to give you a precise BMI value. 

You can calculate your BMI with both the metric system (kg/m2) and the imperial system (lbs/inches2). 

Below the BMI calculator is a chart presented by the World Health Organization (WHO), showing whether you‚Äôre underweight, normal, overweight, or obese.

Commonly accepted BMI ranges are underweight (under 17.5 kg/m2), normal weight (17.5 to 24), overweight (24 to 29), and obese (over 29).

As well as that, it will also tell you what is considered the right weight for your height, so you can lose/gain weight and improve your health massively.

To help you with this, we have implemented a database with many types of food.

You can easily find out the nutritional value (proteins, carbs, fat, and kcal) of your favourite meal. 

We have also prepared some interesting facts about food and diets for you.

The table of nutritional values and the facts can help you make your own diet, and help you achieve your goal weight.

title: BMI Calculator
description:
BMI Calculator offers to calculate Body Mass index, Weight to Height ratio, Body Fat Percentage, Weight Loss Percentage.
BMI Calculator helps you to know the your BMI Score and respective category i.e Underweight, Normal, Overweight, Obese, Severely Obese  or Severely Obese. You can save your BMI score and keep track of it within App. 

BMI Calculator supports both units imperial and metric units, You can easily change units.

What is BMI ?
Body Mass Index is a person's weight in kilograms divided by the square of height in meters. A high BMI can be an indicator of high body fatness.

Metric Method - The metric formula accepts height measurements in meters and weight in kilograms. 
BMI = (Weight in Kilograms)/(Height in meters * Height in meters)
Steps - 
1. Multiply your height by itself.
2. Divide your weight in kilograms by the value calculated in step 1.


Imperial (US) Method - The imperial formula accepts height measurements in inches and weight in pounds.
BMI = (Weight in Pounds * 703)/(Height in inches * Height in inches)
Steps -
1. Multiply your weight in pounds by 703.
2. Multiply your height in inches by itself
3. Divide the figure from step 1 by the figure in step 3.

How is BMI interpreted for adults?
BMI                       -        Weight Status
Below 18.5            -        Underweight
18.5 ‚Äì 24.9	      -        Normal or Healthy Weight
25.0 ‚Äì 29.9	      -        Overweight
30.0 and Above     -        Obese

How good is BMI as an indicator of body fatness?
The accuracy of BMI as an indicator of body fatness also appears to be higher in persons with higher levels of BMI and body fatness. While, a person with a very high BMI (e.g., 35 kg/m2) is very likely to have high body fat, a relatively high BMI can be the results of either high body fat or high lean body mass (muscle and bone). 

Hopes BMI Calculator helps you to stay healthy.

title: Weight Loss Bet by HealthyWage
description:
Win up to $10,000 by making a "bet" on your own weight loss, or by participating in one of our many weight loss and fitness challenges. There‚Äôs a reason we paid out millions to our participants last year - our challenges are fun, effective, and people love to win money for losing weight!

We flip on that switch for participants looking to get healthier over and over again. In fact, 63% of our participants report weight loss¬π when participating in a HealthyWage Challenge, with an average prize payout of $1269¬≤. Oh, and we DO know the science behind it. We‚Äôre kind of nerdy like that!

Check out some of the features you‚Äôll enjoy with the HealthyWage app:

- Take and post victory and before-and-after photos
- Participate with a vibrant community for support and accountability
- Keep track of your weight loss and your progress toward hitting your goal (and winning money!)
- Track your step activity throughout the day
- Create and submit your beginning and ending weigh-in verification videos
- Access your winnings to cash out or begin another challenge
- Keep an eye on your standing among other players
- Build friendships, get inspired by others success, and practice your best cheerleading skills
- Easily find and enter new challenges

There are 4 different types of HealthyWage Challenges you can join through the app. Those are:

The HealthyWager
Win up to $10,000 in an individual weight loss bet.  Set the terms using the Prize Calculator (you choose your weight loss goal, wager amount, etc.).  Play with the calculator all you like without commitment.

$10,000 Team Challenge
Teams of five compete to win cash prizes -- first prize is $10,000.

Jackpot Challenges
Individuals and teams try to achieve specific weight loss goals to earn a share of the pot.

Step Challenge
Individuals and teams connect step devices to calculate a custom goal. Achieve the step goal and earn a share of the pot! Devices available: Google Play (Android devices), Garmin and Fitbit.

HealthyWage's weight loss challenges have been featured on the Today show, Good Morning America, CNN, ABC News, NBC News, Fox News, and in The Wall Street Journal & The New York Times.

Once you experience the thrill of HealthyWage, you'll never go back to struggling on your own. Try it and see for yourself! Start a diet, bet on it, and win big! Losing weight and getting active with HealthyWage pays off in more ways than one!

¬πAs reported by HealthyWage participants from October 2019 through October 2020. Stat will be updated at least annually.
¬≤The average prize amount varies seasonally.  The average listed here includes all new bets created from October 2019 through October 2020 and will be updated periodically.

comments: ** Update..I have changed my rating since the update did correct the issue. Thank You! I like this app but it has been giving me a lot of clinches lately. I'm trying to verify my weight & record the video but it keeps giving me an error message saying that it cannot access my camera to try again later. I uninstalled & reinstalled the app & still I'm getting the same error message. How am I supposed to continue verifying my weight if the app is now allowing me to do it? This is very exhausting!

I love the program. I'm not doing good if you think about the amount of weight I've lost, but the program is great for me, because it makes me think about what I'm eating, and I've lost 15lbs and I've been trying to lose some kind of weight all my life. I might not win my prize money, but I'm winning my battle little by little and also my self esteem. Thanks I'm still in it to win it. Margaret

I have used this app 3 times to help me lose weight. I like being able to see the progress of others on the challenge. 6% is not a great amount to lose in 3 months is plenty of time. Having a little money in the pot makes it much easier for me to follow through. I have always met my goal and one more money than I put in.

I've done this twice now and they definitely paid the first time. I was skeptical at first that maybe this company would be taking my money and running. But they didnt. Only thing I wish they would change is: show us how much we paid for our challenges. They show what you won but it's hard to remember how much u paid. Specially when your doing a lot of challenges. I just want to see the profit.

title: 5 Minute Fat Loss
description:
Kick start your way to a new body with these intense 5 minute fat loss workouts designed to burn fat and lose weight

All sessions have timed rest and exercise periods to ensure workouts take no more than 5 minutes - even the busiest people should be able to find 5 minutes a day to exercise!

All workouts are designed to help you tone up, burn calories and help weight loss. Each exercise has detailed instructions and clear animations making it ideal for beginners.

Stay motivated and focused on your goals with exercise targets that vary according to your progress. 

Separate fat loss workouts for men and women to target key trouble spots.

Feel you can do more than 5 minutes?  Do 2 workout sessions back to back and feel the calories burn!

A wide range of different fat loss exercises so you can lose weight, tone up and burn fat. See what you can achieve in just 5 minutes a day

title: BMI Calculator, Ideal Weight - Body Fat Calculator
description:
BMI Calculator, Ideal Weight - Body Fat Calculator is an app that provides you different kind of calculators that helps you to find your Body Mass, Ideal weight, healthy weight, overweight, BMR(Daily Calorie intake), Body Fat ‚Äì Fat Mass & Lean Mass, Heart rate zones, and Daily Calorie burned.

This app contains following calculators :

=> Body Mass Index (BMI) Calculator:  Body mass index (BMI) is a measure of relative size based on the mass and height of an individual. It helps to identify whether weight is under weight, normal or overweight.

=> Daily Calorie Intake (BMR) Calculator:  Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR) is a measurement of the number of calories needed to perform your body's most basic (basal) functions, like breathing, circulation and cell production. Also calculates the daily calorie needed for sedentary, Light active, Moderate active, Vigorous active, Extreme active. It also shows calorie need for maintain weight, smooth weight loss, fast weight loss, and smooth weight gain.

=> Body Fat Percentage (BFP) Calculator:  is defined as the weight of fat divided by the total weight. BFP is calculated from height, circumference of neck, waist and hip. Also shows Fat mass and Lean mass.

=> Heart Rate Zones Calculator:  calculates heart rate zones using age and gender. We all have a personal resting heart rate, ‚Äúa minimum heart rate‚Äù, and a maximum heart rate. And between these values are different heart rate zones that correspond to training intensity and training benefit. 

=> Daily Calories Burned Calculator:  calculates how much your calories are burned daily based on your gender, age, weight, height and daily activities like walking, jogging, swimming etc.

BMI Calculator, Ideal Weight - Body Fat Calculator App Features :
- App Calculates BMI (Body Mass Index), BFP (Body Fat Percentage), BMR (Basal Metabolic Rate), Heart Rate Zones and Daily Calories burned.
- Supports (Kilograms) kg and (Pounds) lb weight units
- Supports metric and feet - inch length units
- No internet connection required for calculator

BMI Calculator, Ideal Weight - Body Fat Calculator terms: Standard BMI Calculator, Body Mass Index Calculator, Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR) Calculator, Daily Calorie intake Calculator, Body fat percentage (BFP) Calculator, Check Daily Calories Burned etc.
