title: My BMI: Ideal Weight and BMI Calculator
description:
With this app you can calculate your Body Mass Index in a simple way to track your weight. The BMI calculator is ideal to lose weight because thanks to the history that incorporates you can make an exhaustive monitoring of your progress and evolution.

What is this app for?

- Know your BMI result
- Discover what your ideal weight is
- Find out in which health category you are
- Save your data and evolution in a history
- Have a reference to lose weight
- Lose weight and approach your ideal weight
- Share and exchange results with friends

To maintain a healthy life is to approach the best version of yourself; that's why we have developed an app that lets you know your ideal weight and helps you lose weight through your history. The Body Mass Index is a reference data to know your health status. Thanks to the BMI Calculator you will improve your fitness. In addition, this app is available in English and 6 other languages ‚Äã‚Äãand offers the possibility of using both the international metric system (kilograms and centimeters) and the imperial system (pounds and feet).

The BMI is endorsed by the WHO (World Health Organization) and uses a mathematical formula to calculate your fitness. The ratio between your weight and height determines which of the following categories you are in:

- Underweight (mild, moderate or severe)
- Normal weight
- Overweight
- Obesity (grade I, II or III)

It is important to fight against overweight and obesity since these can be the cause of serious cardiovascular diseases. With this BMI app you will get slim and you can avoid heart disease, diabetes or hypertension among others.

We have worked hard to create this app and we hope it will be useful for you. If it has helped you, we would appreciate very much if you rate our app with 5 stars. 

If you enjoy the app, please rate us with 5 stars and leave a positive review, it's very motivating and helpful for us! For any questions, feedback or proposals please visit splash-apps.com or drop us an e-mail to feedback@splash-apps.com

title: BMI Calculator - Adult & Child
description:
This BMI Calculator your BMI (body mass index) to find out if you are:
‚àö  Underweight
‚àö  Normal Weight
‚àö  Overweight
‚àö  Obese (Class 1)
‚àö  Obese (Class 2)
‚àö  Morbidly Obese. 

ADULT BMI CALCULATOR ----------------------------------------

‚òÖ Results for ages 21 and up
‚òÖ Ideal Weight (calculated using the DR. Miller Formula)
‚òÖ Body Fat % (calculated using the British Journal of Nutrition equations from 1991)
‚òÖ Weight Classification Chart

CHILD & TEEN BMI CALCULATOR ----------------------------------------

Results for ages 2-20 are calculated using BMI, Age and Gender to create a percentile.  This percentile is then compared to other children and teens of the same age and gender, based on pre-established growth charts created by the Center for Disease Control (CDC).

‚òÖ Results for ages 2-20 years old
‚òÖ Z-Score
‚òÖ Ideal Percentile
‚òÖ Actual Percentile
‚òÖ Percentile Comparison Chart

*Our intuitive body mass index calculator will automatically re-adjust itself for 2-20 year old calculations as the AGE is entered. 

ADDITIONAL FEATURES ---------------------

In addition to calculating your body mass index, this app also includes the following features:
‚òÖ BMI Recording & Tracking (save your results to view them later)
‚òÖ Review Your Results as a List, Calendar or in a Chart
‚òÖ Light & Dark Theme Selection
‚òÖ Past Entry Editing
‚òÖ Supports Both Imperial & Metric Measurements

‚òÖ DATA IMPORT/EXPORT (new)
Export your history as a CSV file for review or transfer it to a different device. 
‚àö  Saved to your SD Card (or internal) within the ‚ÄòDocuments‚Äô folder
‚àö  Saved as a comma delimited CSV file.  
‚àö  Entry history only

Special note for devices still running on SDK Versions 18 (Jelly Bean) and below.  CSV‚Äôs will be exported to the ‚Äòdownloads‚Äô folder and you will need a file browser app installed to import.  

GOING PRO
To be upfront: there is one IAP, which is used to enable the PRO version of this app.  Upgrading to the PRO version enables editing of past entries, removes ALL ads and grants free access to future upgrades.

**All calculations are health estimates and do not take into account people less than 5 feet, muscular builds and pregnant woman.  

**This BMI calculator app is not meant to serve as a source of clinical guidance and is not intended to be a substitute for professional medical advice.

While we like to keep our BMI Calculator simple and easy to use, new features are always a plus!  If you have an idea or feature request, let us know:  support@firstcenturythinking.com

BMI weight tracker compares your weight to your height, and is calculated by dividing your weight (in kilograms) by your height (in meters squared). It gives you an idea of whether you‚Äôre 'underweight', a 'healthy' weight, 'overweight', or 'obese' for your height.
BMI and body fat calculator is one type of tool to help health professionals assess the risk for chronic disease. It is also important to understand your other risk factors.
BMI Calculator is free app that allows you to monitor BMI and percentage of fat in your body.

title: Lose weight without dieting
description:
Do you know the healthiest way to slim down?

Reading countless magazine articles, going on crash diets, or filling your body with ‚Äúmagic‚Äù diet pills is not the answer, although many people turn to those solutions. The best answer is also the easiest - Ask a nutritionist how to lose weight in a healthy way! 

His advice will most likely sound like this: "Quick diets are dangerous and unhealthy, so you must control what you eat and how much you consume! Cut out the sweets and hamburgers. Monitor yourself and eat healthy food as much as possible. Also, you need to record all your meals in a journal and count the calories!"

At this point, you might be thinking‚Ä¶Use a journal as a calorie counter? How boring! 

As millions of people will admit, after two or three days, you'll simply stop using the journal and return to your bad, overeating habits‚Ä¶

In our modern, high-tech world, there has to be another solution, right? Of Course!

The app "Lose Weight Without Dieting" is an easy-to-use calorie counter that provides you with a fun and comfortable way to lose weight! You simply record all of your meals in the app, (which is far more convenient than carrying a journal everywhere you go!) and it will tell you whether or not the meal was healthy. It will also calculate the calories, proteins, fats, and carbs. If you forget to record any meals, the app will remind you!

Furthermore, how much of your day did you spend running, walking, jumping, or swimming? Record all of your various types of physical training in the app and it will recalculate your dietary intake and make sure that your body‚Äôs caloric intake accounts for your exercise.

Don‚Äôt forget to weigh in! "Lose Weight Without Dieting" tracks your weight, as well as your bust, waist, and thigh measurements, so you can monitor your progress towards your slimmed down goals! The easy-to-read graphs will be a source of motivation and encouragement to keep working.

Even if you do not know how to eat healthy, nor which exercises are required to get in shape, our app will suggest customized nutrition and training plans that will help you lose weight in a healthy and sustainable way. All you need to do is to cook the foods we suggest and do the recommended exercises to achieve all your goals!

"Lose Weight Without Dieting" is more than just a calorie counter; this revolutionary new app will also give you countless hints and insider tricks on how to lose weight in a healthy way!

 ‚ÄúLose Weight Without Dieting‚Äù offers these unique, helpful features:
- Daily charts to track proteins, fats, carbs
- Timeline progress of your bust, waist, and hips measurements
- Water consumption tracking
- Reminders of daily intakes and water consumptions
- Writing notes, setting moods, and photo capabilities
- Taking pictures of your food so you can record it later
- Customized baseline for food and training
- Scheduling of your future meals and exercises
- Predefined weight loss plans

Along with all of these tips, tricks, and constant guidance for healthier weight loss, you also get bonuses (pearls) for frequent use of our calorie counter! These pearls will give you a discount for purchasing the ad-free version of the app! Also, if you get enough pearls, you can even remove the ad banners for free!
descriptionHTML:
Do you know the healthiest way to slim down?

Reading countless magazine articles, going on crash diets, or filling your body with ‚Äúmagic‚Äù diet pills is not the answer, although many people turn to those solutions. The best answer is also the easiest - Ask a nutritionist how to lose weight in a healthy way!

His advice will most likely sound like this: "Quick diets are dangerous and unhealthy, so you must control what you eat and how much you consume! Cut out the sweets and hamburgers. Monitor yourself and eat healthy food as much as possible. Also, you need to record all your meals in a journal and count the calories!"

At this point, you might be thinking‚Ä¶Use a journal as a calorie counter? How boring!

As millions of people will admit, after two or three days, you'll simply stop using the journal and return to your bad, overeating habits‚Ä¶

In our modern, high-tech world, there has to be another solution, right? Of Course!

The app "Lose Weight Without Dieting" is an easy-to-use calorie counter that provides you with a fun and comfortable way to lose weight! You simply record all of your meals in the app, (which is far more convenient than carrying a journal everywhere you go!) and it will tell you whether or not the meal was healthy. It will also calculate the calories, proteins, fats, and carbs. If you forget to record any meals, the app will remind you!

Furthermore, how much of your day did you spend running, walking, jumping, or swimming? Record all of your various types of physical training in the app and it will recalculate your dietary intake and make sure that your body‚Äôs caloric intake accounts for your exercise.

Don‚Äôt forget to weigh in! "Lose Weight Without Dieting" tracks your weight, as well as your bust, waist, and thigh measurements, so you can monitor your progress towards your slimmed down goals! The easy-to-read graphs will be a source of motivation and encouragement to keep working.

Even if you do not know how to eat healthy, nor which exercises are required to get in shape, our app will suggest customized nutrition and training plans that will help you lose weight in a healthy and sustainable way. All you need to do is to cook the foods we suggest and do the recommended exercises to achieve all your goals!

"Lose Weight Without Dieting" is more than just a calorie counter; this revolutionary new app will also give you countless hints and insider tricks on how to lose weight in a healthy way!

‚ÄúLose Weight Without Dieting‚Äù offers these unique, helpful features:
- Daily charts to track proteins, fats, carbs
- Timeline progress of your bust, waist, and hips measurements
- Water consumption tracking
- Reminders of daily intakes and water consumptions
- Writing notes, setting moods, and photo capabilities
- Taking pictures of your food so you can record it later
- Customized baseline for food and training
- Scheduling of your future meals and exercises
- Predefined weight loss plans

Along with all of these tips, tricks, and constant guidance for healthier weight loss, you also get bonuses (pearls) for frequent use of our calorie counter! These pearls will give you a discount for purchasing the ad-free version of the app! Also, if you get enough pearls, you can even remove the ad banners for free!
summary: Weight loss can be amazing! Eat healthy, feel awesome, achieve your dream body!

comments: The app seems decent...if you're looking for a diet. I specifically searched for a non-diet app (intuitive eating, gentle nutrition etc.), which this app claims it is, but as soon as you enter the app, it tells you you'll have to restrict calories and eat "healthy" foods in order to lose weight (not true- weight loss is about controlling insulin), then it asks you to choose a food plan (aka "diet"). If you want a diet, and a place to log food and exercise, try it out. Not a "non diet" app.
The program is very easy to use but very motivated.
There is missing year at dating, otherwise good app.
Excellent app ever. A long list of desi food specially. Those are not available in any other app!
This app is the best I hv used so far. It motivates u to do better each day. Im in luv with this app.

title: BMI Calculator
description:
1.Outline
- The BMI Calculator is an application that calculates BMI(Body Mass Index) from the height and weight. 
- If you press Calc button after the height and weight is entered, BMI, obesity classification, and obesity classification table are displayed. 
- If you press Metric button, you can enter the height and weight with cm/kg, and press Imperial button with ft,in/lbs.

2.Main specification
- You can enter the height up to 302.3cm or 9ft11in.
- You can enter the weight up to 453.1kg or 999lbs.

- Corresponding Android OS:Android OS 2.1 and more.
- Confirmed model:
* Docomo SC-02B(GALAXY S)/Android OS 2.2
* Sony Tablet SÔºèAndroid OS 4.0.3

4.About BMI
- The classification of the obesity classification by BMI follows WHO (World Health Organization) standard.

title: BMI Calculator
description:
BMI Calculator is easy, fast and impressive application that calculates Body Mass Index from the weight, height and age provided by user.

BMI Calculator helps you to know the your BMI result with BMI category i.e Underweight, Normal, Overweight, Obese, Severely Obese or Severely Obese. You can save your BMI score and keep track of it within App. BMI Calculator supports both units imperial and metric units.

Main Features

‚óè Simple and Modern User Interface.
‚óè Supprot Imperial and Metric measurement Units.
‚óè Store BMI Results History along with Gender, Age, Height, Weight.
‚óè Shows ideal Weight range.
‚óè Best App to keep track your Weight Loss.
‚óè Easily change your details like Gender, Age, Height and Weight according to preferred measurement Units.
‚óè Designed for People of all Ages.

What is BMI?
Body Mass Index is a person's weight in kilograms divided by the square of height in meters. A high BMI can be an indicator of high body fatness.

Check your body stats to find your ideal weight, because overweight and obesity are risk factors for diseases such as hypertension, heart disease and diabetes. It can also be used to find your healthy weight if you want to lose weight or are on diet.

title: BMI Calculator
description:
BMI Calculator is a free health application which allows you to calculate :
 - Body Mass Index, 
 - Waist-to-Height Ratio, 
 - Body Fat Percentage 
 - Calorie Consumption (BMR + PAL) 
 and help find your ideal weight based on age. gender and height.
 You want to successfully lose weight and evaluate the success of your diet? BMI calculator tells you how you progress. Various formulas let you evaluate your health and body fat. BMI Calculator includes statistics so that you can find out from graphical interpretations whether you are overweight, underweight or have normal weight. 

 Overview:
‚Ä¢ BMI - Body Mass Index: is defined as the body weight divided by the square of the height. 

‚Ä¢ WHtR - Waist-to-Height Ratio: is defined as the waist circumference divided by the height. It measures abdominal obesity and therefore can be used as an better indicator of health risks than BMI (Body Mass Index).

‚Ä¢ Body Fat Percentage: is defined as the weight of fat divided by the total weight. It is estimated with the 'US Navy Circumference Method' which uses the height and circumferences of waist, neck and hip.

‚Ä¢ Energie Expenditure / Calorie Consumption: is mainly a sum of internal heat produced (Basal Metabolic Rate estimated by Mifflin St Jeor Equation) and external work (Physical Activity Level).

description:
Libra tracks your daily weight changes and displays them in a beautiful interactive chart

recentChanges: Fix a crash when opening notifications
comments: Fairly easy to use but it would benefit from integration with myfitnesspal. Also the way it allows you to adjust your weight is a bit cack handed. It should default to your initial weight or the last date that you entered a weight so you don't have to spin the weight wheel multiple times because you have a large amount of weight to loose. If these are added to the next update then I would be happy to pay for the app

Love this app. Been using it since 2014. I use Wyze scale now, which records my weight automatically on the phone. I still copy the weight to Libra because the graphs are much better with the filtering function, and the way you can zoom is great. I wish there was integration with Wyze scale.
I like the app but the reminder to weigh in every morning just suddenly stopped, despite the setting still being turned on and my app being up to date. Don't understand why it suddenly stopped.

No integration with Google Fit after many years on the app store. Development has been minimal. I paid for plug-in long ago, but it no longer works with the product so I had to "donate" to get rid of adds.

Easy to use when setting goals. It is nice to see the trend line in comparison to your set goal. There are visible BMI lines on your weight trend graph to see when you pass a threshold. It is much more masculine than the Apple equivalent HappyScale and has different features, but Libra is great for weight tracking. I highly recommend this in conjunction with MyFitnessPal.

title: BMI Calculator
description:
*** Note: If anyone experience crash when opening the app after the latest update, please go to your device Settings -> Apps -> BMI Calculator and "Clear Data". It will fix the problem. ***

In our busy life, we can't be able to maintain our healthy diet or exercise schedule for a long time. So it is important to accurately measure our weight as well as a BMI (body mass index), BMR (Basal Metabolic Rate) and few other index on a regular basis. It'll remind us that we need a proper diet plan as well as exercise schedule.

This app includes the following calculators:

BMI Calculator

BMI is a value derived from the mass (weight) and height of an individual. The BMI is defined as the body mass divided by the square of the body height, and is universally expressed in units of kg/m2, resulting from mass in kilograms and height in metres.

It is also known as Quetelet index and widely used in medical field. It'll give you the exact idea of your body, fat, muscle and bones. According to that it will give you the result that you are underweight, normal weight, overweight, or obese.

Our BMI calculator is accurate and very easy to use, with options for both female & male body proportion and body type. Calculate your ideal weight based on your body's weight / height ratio and start living in a healthy body.

BMR Calculator

Your Basal Metabolic Rate(BMR) is the amount of energy you need while resting in a temperate environment when your digestive system is inactive(which requires about 12 hours of fasting). In such a state, your energy will be used only to maintain your vital organs. The BMR decreases with age and increases with muscle mass.

Calorie Calculator

The Calorie Calculator can be used to estimate the calories you need to consume each day to maintain your weight.

IBW & ABW Calculator

The Ideal Body Weight (IBW) is usually described as a weight that is assumed to be maximal healthful for an individual. As weight exceeds ideal body weight, the risks of developing serious health problems increase. Adjusted Body Weight (ABW) is used to determine the energy needs in hospitalised obese patients.

LBM Calculator

The Lean Body Mass(LBM) is a part of the body. It is normally defined to be the body weight minus the body fat. Typically lean body mass is 60-90% of the total body mass. Normally, men have higher port of lean body mass than women.

BSA Calculator

Body Surface Area(BSA) is the total surface area of a human body. In many situations, BSA is a better indicator of metabolic mass than body weight since it is less affected by abnormal body fat.

And Following trackers:

Weight Tracker

Weight tracker saves your daily weight and display your data on chart. You can see your day by day progress using weight tracker and it will show you the trend of your weight.

BMI Tracker

BMI tracker keep track of your daily BMI result when you enter the data. It will help you to keep track of your BMI using BMI graph. We will add more information in this section in our upcoming updates.

You can easily change the unit of weight to: kgs, pound, stone/pound. You can also choose your height in 3 units: cms, meter and feet/inch. This BMI app is very accurate, quick and based according to your body's proportions (weight / height ratio).

To maintain an ideal weight, BMI, you have to create proper diet plans which will give you enough calories according to Calorie Calc for your daily routine. On the other hand, you can also create your daily exercise schedule or join a gym for daily fitness. In our upcoming updates, we will include other details such as diet plans and exercise schedule so that you can find all the fitness information in a single place.

This is free BMI Calculator and other calculators. It may contain advertisement.

Coming soon
- Diet Secrets and tips
- Fitness tips
- Workout exercise

title: Obesity: Causes, Diagnosis, and Management
description:
Obesity is a medical condition in which excess body fat has accumulated to the extent that it may have a negative effect on health. People are generally considered obese when their body mass index (BMI), a measurement obtained by dividing a person's weight by the square of the person's height, is over 30 kg/m2, with the range 25‚Äì30 kg/m2 defined as overweight. Some East Asian countries use lower values. Obesity increases the likelihood of various diseases and conditions, particularly cardiovascular diseases, type 2 diabetes, obstructive sleep apnea, certain types of cancer, osteoarthritis and depression. 
Obesity is most commonly caused by a combination of excessive food intake, lack of physical activity, and genetic susceptibility. A few cases are caused primarily by genes, endocrine disorders, medications, or mental disorder. The view that obese people eat little yet gain weight due to a slow metabolism is not medically supported. On average, obese people have a greater energy expenditure than their normal counterparts due to the energy required to maintain an increased body mass. 
==========================
APP FEATURES
==========================
This exclusive app will help to understand the Obesity Guide, Obesity Disease Management & Obesity Disease causes.
Here are features that make this app better than all other Obesity Disease apps - 
-	UI of app is very user responsive and easy to navigate. 
-	Easily Change the page.
-	Data of app is collected from various research reports.
-	You can access these favorites whenever you want.
-	Share your favorite benefits with your friends and family through email, SMS, Twitter, Facebook, and WhatsApp.

All these features are available for free. 

==========================
SAY HELLO
==========================
Any medical information published on this app is not intended as a substitute for informed medical advice and you should not take any action before consulting with a healthcare professional. Our team are nonstop working hard on creation this app. Please feel free to review and email us for any questions/suggestions/complications.

title: Weight Diary
description:
Weight Diary app can help you keep an accurate account of your weight loss or gain process. Just update the data after each weighing with your body mass scale and get a detailed diary of your weight progress. Simple and intuitive interface, excellent visualization and detailed charts of your weight changes will be the best motivation for achieving your goals and will help you to be physically fit.

You can use this gain and lose weight diary app as body fat percentage tracker or as offline BMI calculator, as weight gain tracker when you start working out, as pregnancy weight gain tracker, to lose weight after baby and control post baby weight. Moreover, unlike most of the other apps the main advantage of this weight diary is the ability to create and track your own parameters that your smart scale calculated and what you really need. Just add Body Mass Index (BMI), Body Fat Percentage, Body Water Percentage, Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR), Lean Body Mass, Muscle Mass, Bone Mass, Physique Rating, Daily Caloric Intake (DCI), Metabolic Age or any other metrics you care about.

Lose Weight Diary app also can automatically calculate your body mass index (BMI) and check whether your current weight is normal, if you are underweight or overweight and what is your ideal weight. This is very easy and smart BMI calculator for women and men. This is fully offline BMI calculator and it works well without internet. You can use this smart BMI calculator in kg or lb.

With the help of weight diary you can also add, track and calculate any parameters of all of your family members. Keep track of your body weight history in one place and manage your own and everyone from your family weight with the help of the best weight loss journal.

Weight Diary free features:

- Simple weight journal
- Body fat percentage tracker
- Smart BMI calculator
- Create your own custom metrics
- Add useful and informative description to each of them
- Drag and drop fields to sort them
- Delete unused parameters or move them to archive in order to maintain history
- Analyze your daily weight loss journal on graphs and via history log
- Share your weight progress with friends on Facebook and Twitter
- Export your weight journal as a spreadsheet (.csv) file

Additional features:

- Body Size Diary
- Heart Rate and Blood Pressure Diary
- Exercise Diary
- Drink Water Reminder
- Pedometer

Surprise! Just now as a gift along with the downloading this useful weight diary and body fat percentage tracker you are getting a free trial 14 days access to all of premium features to track other important health and fitness parameters. Just try to see how easy and useful it is!

Lose Weight Diary is the perfect and very easy to use weight and body fat tracker that helps you to achieve your goal. The app supports all the most common body weight units (kg and lbs / pounds), great for smart scale owners and perfect for both men and women, for moms who wants to lose weight after baby and as pregnancy weight gain tracker, for boys and girls, for kids and teenagers, for athletes and ordinary people who are fond of sports, for bodybuilders and models.

title: Ideal Weight BMI & BMR Calorie Calculator
description:
With Ideal Weight - BMI & BMR Calorie Calculator you can calculate and evaluate your Body Mass Index (BMI) based on the relevant information on body weight, height, age and gender.

Check your body stats to find your ideal weight, because overweight and obesity are risk factors for diseases such as hypertension, heart disease and diabetes. 
It can also be used to find your healthy weight if you want to lose weight or are on a diet.

More information about BMI classification which is used by the BMI Calculator is available on the website of the World Health Organization (WHO).

Are you conscious about your health and wish to stay healthy? Then find out your ideal weight, body mass index (BMI), basal metabolic rate (BMR) and much more by downloading Ideal Weight - BMI & BMR Calorie Calculator now!

title: BMI Calculator - Plus
description:
BMI Calculator app calculates :

‚Ä¢ Body Mass Index (BMI)
‚Ä¢ Body Fat Percentage (BFP)
‚Ä¢ Ideal Weight
‚Ä¢ Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR)
‚Ä¢ Daily calorie requirement

To get your BMI, BFP, BMR and Daily calorie requirement, simply input your gender, age, height and weight. Please select either metric units or imperial units.

‚òÖ BMI is a measure of whether you're a healthy weight for your height. Specifically, the value obtained from the calculation of BMI is used to categorize whether a person is underweight, normal weight, overweight, or obese depending on what range the value falls between.

‚òÖ BFP calculation takes your gender, age, weight and height and calculates the percentage of fat in the body. The formula used is based on BMI. 

‚òÖ BMR estimates how many calories you'd burn if you were to do nothing but rest for 24 hours. It represents the minimum amount of energy needed to keep your body functioning, including breathing and keeping your heart beating.

‚òÖ The Daily calorie requirement is based on your activity level (Sedentary, Light Active, Moderately Active, Very Active, Extra Active).


APP MAIN FEATURES

‚òÖ Body Mass Index (BMI) calculator
‚òÖ Calculates your Ideal Weight
‚òÖ Body Fat Percentage (BFP) calculator
‚òÖ Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR) calculator
‚òÖ Calculates your Daily Calorie requirement 
  according to your activity level
‚òÖ Support for Metric and Imperial systems
‚òÖ Support for males and females
‚òÖ Free Download

BMI Calculator app is not applicable to children, bodybuilders or pregnant women.

Now you can reach a healthy Body Weight with BMI Calculator app.
Love BMI Calculator ? Rate us with 5 stars and recommend BMI Calculator app to others.

title: BMI Calculator - Body fat Based on Height & Weight
description:
Body Mass Index - is a measure of the ratio of a person's weight to height. This parameter helps to determine deviations from normal body weight in one direction or another. 

Excess weight is dangerous for human health, as it often leads to heart disease. Our BMI calculator (app) allows you to quickly find out how your weight is correct. To calculate body mass index, you must select your height and weight in the application.

Body mass index for women is considered normal if the indicator is in the range from 20 to 22. For men, this indicator should be from 23 to 25.

Statistics show that people who have this indicator in the 18-22 range are much healthier than those who have weight problems.

If your BMI is over 25, then this is a signal that you need to change your lifestyle. It is important to note that the formula used to calculate BMI may overestimate the obesity rate for people with athletic builds since the calculations do not include muscle mass.

At the very beginning, the BMI calculation was developed for sociological research, so it is not correct to make a medical diagnosis using these calculations.

However, the availability and simplicity of the calculation made this calculator very popular among the population. If the index exceeds 30, then this is likely to indicate obesity.

It should be understood that body mass index is not suitable for making a diagnosis, but it can help as control when trying out a new fitness program or diet.

The BMI calculator will determine the starting point and allow you to track changes in body weight.

BMI calculation formula:

The formula does not take into account the sex and age of the person, despite the fact that the BMI of men is higher than the BMI of women, and the BMI is higher in middle-aged people, and in children and the elderly, this indicator is lower.

Values ‚Äã‚Äãtable:

Interpretation of BMI indicators, in accordance with the recommendations of the World Health Organization (WHO)
* 16 or less: Severe underweight
* 16-18.5: Insufficient (deficiency) body weight
* 18.5-25: Normal
* 25-30: Overweight (pre-obesity)
* 30-35 Obesity First Degree
* 35-40 Obesity of the second degree
* 40 or more: Third-degree obesity (morbid)

Additional Information:
* The results should be used only as a guide and should not replace medical advice.

## If you like our app, please leave a ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ review! ##

However, the availability and simplicity of the calculation made this calculator very popular among the population. If the index exceeds 30, then this is likely to indicate obesity.

It should be understood that body mass index is not suitable for making a diagnosis, but it can help as control when trying out a new fitness program or diet.

The BMI calculator will determine the starting point and allow you to track changes in body weight.

BMI calculation formula:

The formula does not take into account the sex and age of the person, despite the fact that the BMI of men is higher than the BMI of women, and the BMI is higher in middle-aged people, and in children and the elderly, this indicator is lower.

Values ‚Äã‚Äãtable:

Interpretation of BMI indicators, in accordance with the recommendations of the World Health Organization (WHO)
* 16 or less: Severe underweight
* 16-18.5: Insufficient (deficiency) body weight
* 18.5-25: Normal
* 25-30: Overweight (pre-obesity)
* 30-35 Obesity First Degree
* 35-40 Obesity of the second degree
* 40 or more: Third-degree obesity (morbid)

Additional Information:
* The results should be used only as a guide and should not replace medical advice.

## If you like our app, please leave a ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ review! ##
summary: Body Mass Index - is a measure of the ratio of a person's weight to height.

title: Weight Loss Fitness at Home by Verv
description:
Weight Loss Fitness at Home by Verv is the best way to lose weight fast with home workout plan. It‚Äôs the fitness app, designed to help you lose weight at home, get fit and make your daily workout routine effective and enjoyable. Get your personal fitness plan of short and easy 7-minute home workouts, support your fitness motivation with workout mixes and manage your own workout schedule. Useful tips will help you learn how to lose weight at home fast and burn calories. Calorie counter and activity tracker will keep you informed about your fitness progress. Download this weight loss app, work out at home, lose weight and slim down in just 6 weeks! 

The app is Wear OS compatible. Your phone and your smartwatch are supposed to be paired for this, since Wear OS device won‚Äôt run separately from the app. Handle your training with just one touch - start the app, manage workouts and log your weight right from the wrist.

=== SMART WORKOUT PLAN ===

- FITNESS EXERCISES FOR TROUBLE ZONES. Apart from doing the cardio and full body workout, focus on your trouble zone. Ab workouts will help you lose belly fat and get the six pack abs, leg workouts ‚Äì toned legs and hips, with the arm workouts you‚Äôll be able to get lean arms.
- TRAINING PLAN BASED ON YOUR PERSONAL PARAMETERS AND GOALS: get home workouts which work the best for you and your weight loss.
- REAL-TIME PLAN ADJUSTMENTS according to your feedback and fitness progress (powered by Verv's Personal Fitness Platform Artificial Intelligence)
- MANAGE YOUR WORKOUT SCHEDULE and select number of fitness workouts per week.

=== SHORT AND EASY GUIDED WORKOUTS ===

- FITNESS WORKOUT SESSIONS FROM ONLY 6 MIN A DAY: workout at home and save your time.
- VIDEO AND AUDIO SUPPORT: get guided by your fitness trainer. 
- 70+ FITNESS EXERCISES for women and men: squats, plank, abdominal crunch, push ups, burpee etc. Lose weight with a great variety of fitness exercises!

=== FITNESS MOTIVATION ===

- WORKOUT MUSIC to keep you energized during the workout.
- SMART REMINDERS to keep you informed about upcoming fitness workouts.
- DETAILED WEIGHT LOSS PROGRESS STATS: track your weight and see how you lose it step by step. 
- DETAILED TRAINING STATS: check how many calories per day you‚Äôve burned and how long you‚Äôve been training, with an activity tracker and a calorie counter.
- USEFUL TIPS to inspire you for healthy living and help you learn how to lose weight and shape your body.

Weight Loss Fitness by Verv is synchronized with Google Fit, so you can export data about exercises from your app to Google Fit, and import fitness data and weight and body measurements from Google Fit to Weight Loss Fitness by Verv.

title: BMI Calculator üçé Body Mass Index
description:
This application will help you to monitor your weight and to reach your ideal weight.

It allows you to get your body mass index, your body fat percentage and even your Ideal Weight

How to use it?

All units of measurement are available 

For your height such as centimeter units or feet and inches units, 
For your weight you can use kg units or pounds units and even pound + stone 

First enter these 4 parameters: chose your gender, type your age, weight, height 
And then you will see 3 important information: Your Body mass index, Ideal Weight, and Body FAT rate.

What's the purpose of this application?

By monitoring your weight it will help you to reach your ideal weight target and above all to be healthy

This is the indispensable tool for those who want to take care of their health in order to avoid obesity which is health risk that might cause high blood pressure, stroke, diabetes, cancer, osteoarthritis and many others diseases. It's the same with anorexia
that might cause many troubles such as anemia, heart problems, bone loss, gastrointestinal problems, kidney problems.

Hence it's time for you to be healty by monitoring your weight specially if you are occuring a diet or if you need to increase your weight, so that you will know if your weight is normal and if not you will know what you need to do for keeping your body healthy and you will feel better in avoiding overweight, obesity or underweight.

title: BMI Calculator
description:
Calculate your BMI (Body Mass Index), Waist-to-Height Ratio, Body Fat Percentage and Calorie Consumption (BMR + PAL) to find your ideal weight based on age and gender by using this app.

It allows following important calculations for your health:

‚Ä¢ Body Mass Index (BMI): is defined as the body weight divided by the square of the height. It provides a rough guide since it doesn't take into account a persons build or the composition of the body weight.

‚Ä¢ Waist-to-Height Ratio: is defined as the waist circumference divided by the height. It measures abdominal obesity and therefore can be used as an better indicator of health risks than Body Mass Index.

‚Ä¢ Body Fat Percentage: is defined as the weight of fat divided by the total weight. It is estimated with the 'US Navy Circumference Method' which uses the height and circumferences of waist, neck and hip.

‚Ä¢ Calorie Consumption: is mainly a sum of internal heat produced (Basal Metabolic Rate estimated by Mifflin St Jeor Equation) and external work (Physical Activity Level).

BMI Calculator is a free and easy to use application which allows you to track your regular Body Mass Index and other health related calculations to stay fit and healthy.

People who want to calculate their fat, this BMI calculator does have Body Fat Percentage section as well by which you can maintain your body without fat. Also it gives you the facility to check the waist to hight ratio which indicates how healthy and fit you are.

By using the calorie consumption calculator option of this BMI calculator app one can easily find out how much calorie is required for consumptions.

BMI calculator is very easy to use and calculates all the available parameter based on proper age group for better results.

Best designed with standard material design guidelines and supports all the screens size for all the available Android devices. Also, special support for tablets including landscape mode is also there in this BMI Calculator app.

Please feel to write us your suggestions and feedback to octabeanssoftware@gmail.com which can help us to improve our products.

Also if you like our this app, then don't forget to rate us 5 stars to show your support.

title: BMI Calculator & Weight Loss Tracker
description:
Looking for your healthy weight range?
Trying to lose weight or evaluate the success of your diet?
We have taken all the hassle out of calculating, assessing and monitoring your BMI so you will be able to identify when you‚Äôre in your ideal range and when you might need to take positive action towards achieving your goals, whether you are looking to lose or gain weight or maintain your current health & fitness.
With an easy to use layout and design this tracker can be the ultimate tool in achieving your goals to a healthier you, making your weight loss part of your daily routine.

What is a BMI Calculator?
BMI stands for Body Mass Index and it is a simple index of weight-for-height that is calculated based on relevant information on body weight, height, sex and age and is commonly used to classify underweight, overweight and obesity. Being overweight or underweight can carry risk factors for many medical conditions, reaching your ideal weight and maintaining it can reduce these risks giving you a better quality of life.
This calculator will provide highly accurate results taking the guess work out of the equation and ensuring you can always rely on your current assessment.
Weight and height can be assessed in either imperial or metric measurements so this app can be used by anyone regardless of which measurement units you use.
Stay motivated by tracking your daily weight and analyze your progress in the user history charts and statistics.
This calculator and fitness tracker can be used by anyone ages 18 or above to provide accurate BMI calculations to get you towards your weight loss goals and with our weekly / monthly reminder‚Äôs feature, where here to help keep you on track!

How to use:
1.Simply select a user or use the guest feature to be brought to the BMI assessment page.
2.Here you will be asked to enter your current weight using either metric or imperial measurements, if you are using the guest feature you will also need to input the users height. (After you have created a profile these will be saved for you.)
3.Once your details have been entered you can click ‚ÄúCheck BMI‚Äù and your result will be displayed on screen and will be assessed using the World Health Organization‚Äôs (WHO) internationally accepted BMI classifications, providing you with detailed results on which group your height to weight ratio falls into and more details about what these results mean.
4.If you would like to keep track of your BMI or weight loss / gain save your results so you can check back on your progress later using our statistics and graphs, and don‚Äôt worry if you forget to log your progress regularly, with our scheduled reminder‚Äôs feature  we‚Äôve always got your back!

Enjoy the best BMI calculator and weight tracker. This application‚Äôs features include:
* Easy to use
* Body weight & BMI tracker
* Multiple Users supported
* Assists with weight loss / fitness goals
* Refreshing and user friendly UI
* Accurate results
* Both imperial and metric units supported
* Weekly / monthly reminders
* Available in 66 languages
* Small application size
* High quality graphics

title: Calorie Counter - Asken Diet
description:
If you are looking to lose weight, tone up, get healthy, change your habits, or start a new diet, but don‚Äôt know how, Asken Diet has everything you need to better understand your diet and nutritional needs. Log your meals and receive personalized meal advice from our team of dietitians and nutritionists. Asken Diet takes your goal weight and health data to create a plan to become a healthier you. Join millions like you who are learning how to adjust their diet and lifestyle habits. We support weight loss, weight gain, and weight maintenance goals.

KEY FEATURES
"Best diet app ever since it encourages healthy eating habits"
"Awesome! Helps me eat better. It tracks vitamin & minerals my diet lacks"
"Fun way to keep me healthy"

Our AI dietitian provides real scientific advice curated from our team of hundreds of dietitians and nutritionists. The dietitian will monitor your meals and provide you with actionable advice to hit your target weight goals.

Over time, Asken Diet learns your diet habits and adjusts advice so that it remains helpful and uniquely tailored to you and your diet and body weight goals.

KEY FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Track All Nutrients - Count calories, fat, protein, carbs, fiber, vitamins, and more
‚Ä¢ Water tracking - Log water in oz or ml
‚Ä¢ Food Insights - Learn exactly what is in the foods you are eating
‚Ä¢ Personalized Feedback - Get nutritional advice specifically written for you
‚Ä¢ Food Database - Our database includes millions of foods. Create your own too
‚Ä¢ Meal Photo Analysis (beta) - Snap a photo of your meal to log it all at once
‚Ä¢ Bar code Scanner - Simply scan bar codes to log foods
‚Ä¢ Calorie Counter - Asken Diet automatically calculates calories in your foods and meals
‚Ä¢ Body Function Tracking - Menstrual cycles and bowel movements can be tracked

HOW IT WORKS
Getting started is easy. Our digital dietitian will ask you about yourself and your health goals. It works around your weight goals to provide nutrition and diet advice based on the food and exercise you log. Free members get daily nutritional advice after logging three daily meals. Premium members get dietary advice after each meal.

SET GOALS AND GET SUPPORT TO HIT THEM
Whether you want to push hard or take your time to hit your ideal body weight or even body fat percentage, our app will set your daily goals for calories taken in and calories burned. As you log your food and track exercises, your personal nutritionist will adjust your feedback each day after monitoring your data. You‚Äôll get the best advice unique to you to keep you motivated to lose weight or gain weight all while having fun dieting!

TRACKING FOOD IS EASY
A growing database of millions of foods curated from US & Canadian food sources. Users can create their own food items and our team of nutritionists will research those user-generated foods to add any missing nutritional data.

NUTRITIONAL INSIGHTS
Looking for more than just calorie counting to get out of a weight loss rut? Asken Diet will chart your nutrition data across 15 different nutrients and food groups. This gives you the most detailed picture of your nutritional intake and your A.I. dietitian gives you insights on where you can make improvements to your diet.

CONNECT APPS AND DEVICES
Connect with Google Fit, Fitbit & Strava apps to easily track calories burned. Outdoor activities, chores, dancing and almost any activity that gets you up and burning calories can be tracked with the app. As you log your exercise, your A.I. dietitian will adjust the daily advice and nutritional feedback so you have the clearest picture of your current health and diet.

MORE TO COME
We are hard at work designing new features like:
- Healthy recipes to try based on your current diet plan and weight goals 
- Community features & blog to get support from others on your weight loss
- Dietary or food culture customization

‚Ä¢ Got a question? 
Open the app > Menu button > Help
descriptionHTML:
If you are looking to lose weight, tone up, get healthy, change your habits, or start a new diet, but don‚Äôt know how, Asken Diet has everything you need to better understand your diet and nutritional needs. Log your meals and receive personalized meal advice from our team of dietitians and nutritionists. Asken Diet takes your goal weight and health data to create a plan to become a healthier you. Join millions like you who are learning how to adjust their diet and lifestyle habits. We support weight loss, weight gain, and weight maintenance goals.

KEY FEATURES
"Best diet app ever since it encourages healthy eating habits"
"Awesome! Helps me eat better. It tracks vitamin & minerals my diet lacks"
"Fun way to keep me healthy"

Our AI dietitian provides real scientific advice curated from our team of hundreds of dietitians and nutritionists. The dietitian will monitor your meals and provide you with actionable advice to hit your target weight goals.

Over time, Asken Diet learns your diet habits and adjusts advice so that it remains helpful and uniquely tailored to you and your diet and body weight goals.

KEY FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Track All Nutrients - Count calories, fat, protein, carbs, fiber, vitamins, and more
‚Ä¢ Water tracking - Log water in oz or ml
‚Ä¢ Food Insights - Learn exactly what is in the foods you are eating
‚Ä¢ Personalized Feedback - Get nutritional advice specifically written for you
‚Ä¢ Food Database - Our database includes millions of foods. Create your own too
‚Ä¢ Meal Photo Analysis (beta) - Snap a photo of your meal to log it all at once
‚Ä¢ Bar code Scanner - Simply scan bar codes to log foods
‚Ä¢ Calorie Counter - Asken Diet automatically calculates calories in your foods and meals
‚Ä¢ Body Function Tracking - Menstrual cycles and bowel movements can be tracked

HOW IT WORKS
Getting started is easy. Our digital dietitian will ask you about yourself and your health goals. It works around your weight goals to provide nutrition and diet advice based on the food and exercise you log. Free members get daily nutritional advice after logging three daily meals. Premium members get dietary advice after each meal.

SET GOALS AND GET SUPPORT TO HIT THEM
Whether you want to push hard or take your time to hit your ideal body weight or even body fat percentage, our app will set your daily goals for calories taken in and calories burned. As you log your food and track exercises, your personal nutritionist will adjust your feedback each day after monitoring your data. You‚Äôll get the best advice unique to you to keep you motivated to lose weight or gain weight all while having fun dieting!

TRACKING FOOD IS EASY
A growing database of millions of foods curated from US & Canadian food sources. Users can create their own food items and our team of nutritionists will research those user-generated foods to add any missing nutritional data.

NUTRITIONAL INSIGHTS
Looking for more than just calorie counting to get out of a weight loss rut? Asken Diet will chart your nutrition data across 15 different nutrients and food groups. This gives you the most detailed picture of your nutritional intake and your A.I. dietitian gives you insights on where you can make improvements to your diet.

CONNECT APPS AND DEVICES
Connect with Google Fit, Fitbit & Strava apps to easily track calories burned. Outdoor activities, chores, dancing and almost any activity that gets you up and burning calories can be tracked with the app. As you log your exercise, your A.I. dietitian will adjust the daily advice and nutritional feedback so you have the clearest picture of your current health and diet.

MORE TO COME
We are hard at work designing new features like:
- Healthy recipes to try based on your current diet plan and weight goals
- Community features & blog to get support from others on your weight loss
- Dietary or food culture customization

‚Ä¢ Got a question?
Open the app > Menu button > Help
summary: Asken Diet is a nutritional advice and personal diet app to help manage weight.

Hi everyone! We've just squashed some bugs. That's all. :)

comments: I didnt know why i couldnt gain weight since i am currently 20lbs under a healthy bmi. I started using this calculator, it help me realize what i was eating was low in calories and how to do it healthily. My fiance now uses it too to pay more attention to his sugar intake. But you can use it for nearly anything. I like being able to look at my progress.

I have never left a review on an app before, but this one has improved my life so much I just had to :D It's the most user friendly calorie counter I've found, and I've stuck with it for the past three months. It does all your calculations for you, and gives you really good advice every day. It's super easy to plug in your meals and see how you did/how you're doing. I'm using the free version, and it's still extremely helpful with NO payment :3 I recommend this app to anyone :D

This app is easy to use and very accurate. But please make a weight GAIN version. People these days who need to lose weight already have plenty of ways to do it and plenty of people to go to. But gaining weight is not only harder than losing it, it's also WAY harder to find help with it.
I've only started using this app but so far I'm impressed. Eating healthy and losing weight is difficult for me but this app is a great guide to track progress.
So far its very easy to follow, free and provides good advice. I think if you upgrade they provide more advice.

title: BMI Calculator
description:
BMI Calculator & Weight Loss Tracker to calculate bmi (Body Mass Index) and track your weight loss if you want to lose weight or are on diet. BMI chart to show saved BMI data and track weight loss. 

* English BMI and Metric BMI are supported.
* The BMI Calculator can calculate your BMI base on pounds and feet/inches and Kilograms (kg) and centimeter (CM)
‚Ä¢ BMI - Body Mass Index is the body weight divided by the square of the height. It is just an rough guide. The Body Mass Index does not take into account a persons build or the composition of the body weight.
‚Ä¢ BMI table to show the normal BMI as well as underweight and overweight BMI values.
‚Ä¢ Ability to save BMI history and show BMI chart.
‚Ä¢ If you are on diet, track your weight loss easily by saving your BMI and weight data.

______________________________
How to use the BMI Calculator
1. You only need to enter your weight in pounds and height in feet and inches, and click the calculate button. (The weight in KG and height in CM will be generated automatically which you can ignore)

2. You have the option to measure your BMI by KG/CM. In that case, just enter your weight in KG and height in CM, and click the calculate button. (The weight in pounds, and height in ft/in will be generated automatically and that you can ignore)

comments: I am using the paid version and I love it! I love the reminders and the lessons. I especially love the recipes and the fact that you have a TON of vegetarian options. The only reason I rated it 4 stars is that recipes get removed! I plan my meals a week in advance and I went today to prepare one and the 3 of the recipes are gone! There also isn't an option to download a .pdf to save for later. Please fix this and i will rate 5 stars!

Great app. I've experimented with IF in the past, with great success. However, with COVID and working from home, it's a lot easier to slip up and eat whenever you want to. This app pops up periodically reminding me that I need to drink water. It's nice to have a reminder, which should prevent me from mindlessly eating when I'm not scheduled to. My first foray into IF was about 2 years ago, and I lost 85lbs in total. I'm not quite where I was before, but I'm still dealing with about 50 extra lbs. This app is highly recommended, as long as you use it as intended.

Great app, takes a little learning. I was initially confused by the words encouraging me to 'End Fasting' when I was only hours into current fast. This resulted in a few badly timed fast records, but the ability to edit fasting start and end times saved me. I often forget to record my water intake, despite the much appreciated reminders from the app. The retroactive edit ability for water intake does not allow me to click on a day and edit. No response when I try to select a day's water record.

Easy and Convenient app. I love that I can see my progress so easily!! I wish I could connect to my community though. It disappeared as quickly as it appeared???? I also wish I could communicate with my fasting buddies, at minimum send them an emoji or something. I use the paid version so I'm not sure what I'm getting that's any different than the free version... I don't use the recipes or the tools, I just use the trackers. All in all I'm happy I have the app though to stay on track.

Love this app. I'm using the free version. There are enough features to get you started on IF. You enter basic info about yourself & they suggest a plan. You can modify the IF hours. Cool feature shows start/stop times. During fast you can see at a glance how long you've fasted/and time left. Reminders to drink water w/place to log amount. Didn't rate 5 stars because I wear an off brand fitness tracker (not listed on app) so steps are not recorded & no way to manually enter steps taken.

comments: Was ok app other than telling me I'm obese at 180lbs. But then it want full access to my location which I'm not granting. Now ut is just a digital scale because app won't work without location permission. Not even allowing location while using app. Needs to be fixed.

Overall I'm happy with the app/scale. The issues are that it won't sync with my fitbit app (it did once and never again, even after disconnecting and connecting again several times). I'll have random days where my BFR jumps 5% in one day. And another annoying thing is that every second time I use it, it alerts me to make sure I'm on the right profile because the measurements are significantly different. This happens when my weight is less than half a pound different, but not 5% BFR different

App constantly accessing contacts? Why? Just found the app accessing my contacts every hour for the past few days. Why exactly do you need that permission? extremely not happy with this, as it immediately suggests the app should not be trusted, which then calls into question a company that would ask for that persmission when it clearly does not need it .. its not going to be calling nor texting people on my behalf. Slippery slope Shenzhen ...
Straight forward app that tracks health data with linked Bluetooth digital scales. Does exactly what it claims.

Great app and scale, but it would be perfect if I could see and compare the values from the previous days. That is, in History tab, place the figures over previous bar charts/curves. It allows us to see values of previous days.

title: Lifesum - Diet Plan, Macro Calculator & Food Diary
description:
Diet plan, food diary, macro calculator, calorie counter and healthy recipes, all in one convenient place. Get healthy and feel great with Lifesum!

Looking to try a keto, fasting, paleo or sugar free diet? We have the perfect diet plans for any goal. Need a health tracker to stay in check? Fear not. We've got an intuitive food diary, macro calculator and tons of nutritional guidance.

Meal planner and macro tracker - TOP Lifesum features:
‚óè        Diet plan & diet tips for any goal - lose weight and eat healthy
‚óè        Keto, fasting, paleo, sugar detox and more diets & plans
‚óè        Calorie counter & food tracker with barcode scanner for easy logging
‚óè        Macro calculator - keeps tabs on daily macros, nutrition & calories
‚óè        Food planner - eat healthy food from delicious recipes for any plan
‚óè        Health tracker - stay on top of fitness and health

WEIGHT LOSS AND DIET PLAN
Lose weight with a personalized diet plan. Take our test to discover which food planner is the most suitable based on schedule and lifestyle. From fasting, paleo to sugar free diets and everything in between, we have the right plan to achieve any weight loss goal.

RECIPES AND MEAL PLANNER
Healthy recipes to support all meal plans. Stuck in a diet rut? Explore tasty keto recipes, beat cravings with a no sugar meal plan or search for paleo food lists and snacks. 

CALORIE COUNTER AND FOOD PLANNER
Calorie counter and food tracker functions provide an overview of daily nutritional values. Did a workout today? Go premium and sync Lifesum with FitBit, Runkeeper, Moves and other fitness apps.

FOOD DIARY AND MACRO TRACKER
Macros mythbusting. It's easy with our macro tracker - reach the right type of energy consumption with the macro calculator. Simply scan barcodes for macros and nutritional information, or enter manually.

Join 40 million users on the journey to better health and discover how tracking small habits can make a big difference in becoming happier and healthier.

Download Lifesum now and improve your health today! Also benefit from daily feedback to stay focused and motivated when working towards weight loss goals.

Lifesum integrates with Google Fit and S Health allowing users to export nutrition and exercise data from Lifesum to Google Fit and S Health, and import fitness data, weight and body measurements back to Lifesum.

For extended features such as specialized diets and detailed nutrition information, and to sync with fitness apps such as Moves, Nokia Health, FitBit, Jawbone, Endomondo and Runkeeper, get the Lifesum Premium membership.

Stay golden!
Lifesum crew
comments: Apart from the occasional incorrect listing in the food database, this is the best calorie counting app I've found. Easily the best looking UI, with a clean uncluttered layout, and great features. Had a small hiccup where changing phones caused the app to lose my premium subscription, but the developer sorted it out quickly. Would be 5 stars but for the database errors. In fairness, I have never found a similar app that didn't have the same problem.

It's been pretty good so far. I've noticed my girlfriends app she uses that cost $2.99 one time has less of a library of foods already in the database. The recipes are nice and it syncs with a lot of the other health apps. My main complaint is the inability to set my own calorie and macro goals. If this is fixed, I would consider extending my subscription when it is up.

I have used other apps including Weight Watchers. This app is as user friendly as any I have used including a scanning option for tracking food. What makes this different is this app let's you see the nutrients in the food you eat. I thought I ate a lot of protein daily, but it turns out I was wrong. I wanted to include more carbs in my diet and this app has helped me to do that and to discover healthy carbs to add daily. I appreciate the reminders through the day.

Barcode scanner is super quick and has almost everything I've ever scanned, have used the app for a couple years now in a couple of ways (weight loss, maintenance, muscle building gains) and the only thing I can say I miss from this app is a pregnancy option to help stay on track with how many calories you should be eating for positive healthy weight gain during each trimester. Every other aspect of the app is awesome.

I am very disappointed about the latest update released yesterday, the new interface is just to ruin the effect, I don't understand why put all the food logs into each meal so that we have to perform 1 extra click to see the details? I will adjust the quantity quite often, now I have to think in which meal to find my food again and have to give an extra unnecessary click to edit it.

title: Healthy Weight, BMI Calculator
description:
Looking for how to lose weight fast? If you are obsessed about getting the ideal weight, then I congratulate you, you have found the best way to control your body fat percentage.
Healthy Weight, BMI Calculator is a free application that allows you to calculate your body mass index BMI and monitor your body fat percentage, based on your body weight, height, age and sex using Miller's formula. Now you can calculate your body mass index to find your ideal weight.
To track your daily weight loss, you can use the integrated weight loss tracker and analyze your progress using your BMI charts and statistics. Log your results and evaluate your diet and workout success.
This BMI calculator supports imperial and metric units. You can alternate between kg or lbs, feet inches or meters in just one click.

- Overview of Healthy Weight, BMI Calculator App - 

‚Ä¢ A simple and intuitive interface.
‚Ä¢ BMI calculation in just one click.
‚Ä¢ An easy way to input your sex, age, size and weight values.
‚Ä¢ Ideal weight estimation, classified by sex and different age ranges.
‚Ä¢ Local storage to track your daily weight loss, analyze your BMI history to better understand your body mass evolution.

The obesity and overweight are the principal risk factors for diseases such as hypertension, heart disease and diabetes. Track your body fat with BMI Calculator, find your ideal weight and stay healthy.

title: Weight Loss Tracker - RecStyle
description:
** Let's diet cleverly when we have an appetite! ** 
It‚Äôs easy to use. 
Just enter your values once a day. 


You can continue because it's simple! 
Now is the time to diet and lose body fat healthily! 
RecStyle will provide strong support for your beautiful figure and your health. 


** Various functions to provide strong support for your diet! ** 

* You can easily customize the items you want to manage! 
With RecStyle you can add items indispensible for dieting, such as 'weight' and 'body fat', and you can also manage your 'muscle mass', useful for muscle training. 
In addition, you can easily add 'waist', 'BMI', 'all types of stamps (overate, exercise, drank too much, constipation, poor health, menstruating)', and 'text notes' with one touch from the input screen. 


* A detailed graph display that's easy to understand! 
When you've entered values such as your weight and body fat, try turning your device sideways. 
It will automatically change to a graph display, where you can check the change in your values as well as stamps and notes you've entered previously. 
In addition, you can check the average value for each 'week' or 'month' with the buttons on the upper left of the screen. 


* Stop forgetting to input with daily notifications! 
If you set the time that you usually weigh yourself, it will send a notification to stop you forgetting to input. 
In addition, every Sunday it will report the average change in weight for the week, allowing you to understand the progress of your dieting. 


* 5 colors to choose from! 
You can change the color to suit your tastes or your mood for that day, from five different colors: black, white, orange, green and pink. You can tackle your weight recording any time with a fresh attitude. 


* Of course it is also complete with basic functionality! 
Its basic functionality is also complete, such as a 'lock function' to protect the important weight management data that you don't want other people to know about, a 'target value display' on the graph display (it is possible to set the target value for 'weight', 'body fat', 'muscle mass' and 'waist') and much more. 


** All these functions are free! And there are no advertisements at all! ** 
This is for all those who want to manage their weight, whether for diet or for muscle training.

comments: I tried so many apps and this one is simply the best - simple, can track different things, stamp system very helpful. I only wish for a bit more analysis - like seeing an all-time graph with all data points instead of averages, and a filter too see on which days I put the "alcohol" stamp to see what effect it has on my weight.

Only one minor flaw The app works perfectly, it let's you track daily your total weight, muscle mass, fat mass, waist, and add notes daily. It creates a graphic which you can visualize daily, weekly or monthly for each value. In muscle and fat mass it let's you input the values in percentage or kg (if it's metric), the issue here is that if you've been tracking your fat in kg, and you want to change it to percentage, the values remain the same and you have to change them manually and viceversa

I enjoy using this app because it allows me to log my daily stats for weight, body fat, muscle, waist circumstance & additional notes. There are daily reminders to keep logging my stats & a graph (landscape view only) for comparison between days, weeks & months. Overall, I'd recommend this app to anyone trying to keep track of reaching a specified goal for your fitness journey or a healthier lifestyle.

Veey good application. Easy to use, does not crash, no adds,.., and it gives you daily, weekly and monthly statistics of the values entered (weight, musc %, fat %) If i cuold add something to the app it would be the chance to log the visceral fat % and adding pictures to track the progress.
its good, and easy to monitor. I finally be able achieve my target by using this app

comments: I like your app but it's very limited and one thing that could really help it is to have the option of scanning barcodes of your food like can be done with the myfitnessapp. Theres alot of good and bad with that app but the good outweighs the bad which...isnt the case with this app. Sorry hate be a buzz kill but it definitely needs a major remodel.

Not easy to use. You can't copy items from one meal to another. You can't create your own recipes to make it easier to track meals. It has been crashing when I try to add in my weight so I can't track progress in the program. Overall very disappointed.

Only lets you record macros, need $$pro$$ version to record micros, what a shame. liked the layout and all but charging extra to record micros is greedy. Coding in the extra micros is not difficult nor time consuming, shame on the app developers.

The app itself is great but the database of food is extremely limited. I have to create my custom food all the time especially when 99% the scanner can't find the food even those are common in the local supermarket
This app has wide range of food entrees, which makes it easy to track. I also like the tracking of water, nutrients and log exercise and steps.

comments: All I wanted was a food diary to add up calories. I found it knows how many calories in restaurant foods, brand name items in my pantry, even homemade stuff! I told it how much weight I wanted to lose and it gave me how many calories a day to shoot for. Easy! Then it suggested I add a little activity, which it has a complete table of excercises and calorie burn. I can even add in vitamins! Best free app on my phone! 9 pounds off in 3 wks, and before I couldn't seem to lose anything. Try it!

Started using this again and it is driving me nuts. Why can't EVERY item have the option of weight!!! Why cups??? Weight!! Then having created a meal and scanned all bar codes and weighed every item there was no where to say it's a meal for 4. So I get all 4 meals added for my dinner. And no way to edit it. Obviously I have not created my meal correctly but I shouldn't have that option. I could go on but I won't. So frustrating as could be very good

It's free and easy to use. Great way of tracking the energy that goes in (calories) and energy that goes out (exercise) and showing you what difference you need to be able to lose/sustain/gain weight. It scans most foods so quick and simple. I haven't yet for how to add a recipe (maybe due to lack of time and looking!?) I have recommended this app to people that want to lose weight.

Fantastic app for tracking calories! It's so easy to either scan a barcode, look up a food, or create one. Great planning tools as well. Premium is worth it if, say, you want to track more specific stuff or change your macro percentages. Two (display) features I want added are: 1. Ability to simply change the order (drag/drop) of foods logged because sometimes I'll log what I plan to eat, then add stuff that ruins the order. 2. Ability to organize the home screen (being able to drag widgets).

This app is so easy to use. I find that during this time of covid19 scare it works for me. I even went for the extended plan where I paid for the year and can't believe how great it is. My daughter inlaw also is on it. So far she has out done me. We're both on our final 18lbs to go. Now the race is on. I recommend very much the free version but I know once you get used to it you will want to try the extended. Now that i highly recommend.

title: BMI 3D - Body Mass Index and body fat in 3D
description:
BMI3D calculates the Body Mass Index (BMI) and displays it with human 3D models. Since the BMI makes no statement about the body fat percentage, a corresponding fat calculation is integrated. This is based on measured values of approx. 6000 people.

In the before/after view, a desired body fat reduction can be anticipated. The app shows the desired BMI, body fat percentage and also changed body measurements after a corresponding weight loss.

For an exact body fat calculation only waist, hip and neck circumference are needed. These values are taken easily with a measuring tape. The Pro version uses this data to calculate your exact and precise body fat.

comments: It's really fun to mess around, but it gets bmis wrong. My bmi is around 25.61. When I put in my measurements it says I have a bmi of 57. Also I tried, and even the smallest person with the lowest weight would get you about 35. Which is obese. And if you look at the image, they're thinner than a stick. If the bmi was correct, then this would definitely earn 5 stars! Overall, good job! Edit: I have realised this problem only occurs on the imperial system, but the bmi is the same for both systems

I like the fact that I can see my body shape without my face and skin tone. It helps me focus more on my weight and goals related to it. I wish that they had shoulder, bust, arm, and thigh measures though because it would be even more accurate to how I look. Even if they don't contribute to the calculations it'd be nice to have.
Why are there limits on the numbers? I can't manually put numbers in and I cant make it go lower or higher than what you have. I was excited for this app. So letdown. Remove the limits

Forcing you to use the free trial just to put in body measurements turned me off. I dont like putting credit card info for "free" trials because I know most businesses do this hoping many will forget to cancel, and that is how they make money ( like that gym membership that doesn't get used). Sorry, not worth it so uninstalling.

Honestly i cant even begin to use this even with pro. It assumes my starting waist size is 60cm higher than it is, my hips 40cm larger, neck 10cm larger. It says to go pro to make it more accurate but it just made me immensely frustrated because i want an app like this i just want one that actually allows customization of the 3d model with my actual measurements. Also i think a section adding in for chest would be helpful for others like me who carry a lot of weight in their chests (cnd 34F)

title: Body Weight Chart
description:
Record your body weight and check it with chart! You can control your BMI with this application.
This app can work with Google Fit . By connecting Body Weight Chart and Google Fit, allows you to check your fitness data from multiple devices.
This app also make backup on SD-Card for cell-phone upgrade.

Body mass index (BMI) is a simple index of weight-for-height that is commonly used to classify overweight and obesity in adults. It is defined as a person's weight in kilograms divided by the square of his height in meters (kg/m2).
For adults, WHO defines overweight and obesity as follows:

overweight is a BMI greater than or equal to 25; and
obesity is a BMI greater than or equal to 30.
BMI provides the most useful population-level measure of overweight and obesity as it is the same for both sexes and for all ages of adults. However, it should be considered a rough guide because it may not correspond to the same degree of fatness in different individuals.
(from WHO website Obesity and overweight )

title: BMI Calculator and Ideal Weight
description:
With this application, you can calculate your BMI and ideal weight. You just have to put your age, gender, height and weight.

Height can be set in centimeters or feets

Weight can be set in Kg or Lb

The BMI is an attempt to quantify the amount of tissue mass (muscle, fat, and bone) in an individual, and then categorize that person as underweight, normal weight, overweight, or obese based on that value.
