title: BariatricPal
description:
Weight loss surgery can be a powerful tool for fighting obesity, and BariatricPal can help you take full advantage. Let the app accompany you on your weight loss surgery journey to improve weight loss and enjoy better success. 


BariatricPal has the world‚Äôs top online weight loss surgery community, personal goal-setting and tracking, and important diet and other information to help you take charge of your diet and health. 


The World‚Äôs Premier Weight Loss Surgery Social Platform: 

‚Ä¢ A supportive, positive environment for weight loss surgery patients and for those who are considering or preparing for weight loss surgery to fight obesity. 

‚Ä¢ A comprehensive informational section so you can learn about the entire weight loss journey at a glance. 

‚Ä¢ BariatricPal is recommended by surgeons nationwide 

‚Ä¢ Large surgeon directory with members‚Äô authentic ratings and reviews 

‚Ä¢ A unified voice for fighting obesity through weight loss surgery, with many discussion forums dedicated to all types of weight loss surgery. 

‚Ä¢ Bariatric Pal has separate sub-forums for the major bariatric surgery procedures: Gastric Sleeve (VSG or vertical sleeve gastrectomy), Lap Band (laparoscopic adjustable gastric band or Lap-Band), Roux-en-Y Gastric Bypass (RNY) and Duodenal Switch (DS).


Mobile Social Networking: 

‚Ä¢ Lose more weight when you have the support you need. 

‚Ä¢ Hundreds of thousands of members can use personal experience to answer your questions about diet, side effects, coping strategies and surgeons‚Äô instructions. 

‚Ä¢ BariatricPal app provides full access to the forums and the other BariatricPal.com content, so what you need is at your fingertips. 

‚Ä¢ Connect with your best weight loss surgery friends through private messaging and chat rooms. 


Stay Motivated by Personalizing and Sharing Your Journey!: 

‚Ä¢Develop your personal profile so others can get to know you 

‚Ä¢Update your status, upload photos and maintain a blog. 

‚Ä¢Set and track weight loss and measurement goals 

‚Ä¢Choose whether to keep your profile, blog, photos and other information private or make it public. 


Support for Your Weight Loss Surgery Diet: 

‚Ä¢ Lose more weight when you have your diet details in your smartphone with BariatricPal. At any time, you can log your meals, check the food lists for good options and ask community members for their ideas. 

‚Ä¢ Food lists and meal plans for each stage of the weight loss surgery diet progression to solid foods. 

‚Ä¢ The BariatricPal information section has tips for getting enough protein and fluids each day. 

‚Ä¢ Forums for weight loss surgery patients to share recipes, menus, meal plans, food ideas and encouragement 

‚Ä¢ Additional specific guidelines for LAP BAND, Gastric Bypass, Gastric Sleeve, Gastric Plication and Duodenal Switch patients 


Complete Information Section: 

‚Ä¢ Information on types of bariatric surgery procedures, including the adjustable gastric band (lap-band), vertical sleeve gastrectomy (VSG or gastric sleeve), Roux-en-Y gastric bypass, sleeve plication (greater curvature plication) and duodenal switch. 

‚Ä¢ Risks and benefits of each type of weight loss surgery 

‚Ä¢ Tips on choosing a procedure, selecting a surgeon and paying for surgery 

‚Ä¢ Step-by-step guidance for the post-surgery diet progression from liquids to pureed and then solid foods, to support faster recovery from surgery 

‚Ä¢ Weight loss surgery diet guidelines, food lists and sample meal plans so you know what and how much to eat 

‚Ä¢ Information on protein and other nutrient requirements 

‚Ä¢ Strategies to reduce complications and side effects 

‚Ä¢ Exercise strategies and tips 

‚Ä¢ Living well after bariatric surgery: your support system, body contouring (plastic) surgery and nutritional supplements to take.

This application has different criteria to calculate the Burnt Calorie. E.g. Age, Sex, Height, Width of a particular Person. 

Body Mass Index (BMI) : calculate your Body Mass Index (BMI) based on the relevant information on body weight, height, age and sex.

Calories Burned : calculate calories burned base on daily activities like running, swimming, jogging to check your calories burned daily

Daily Calorie Intake : calculate Daily calorie intake base on your body parameters and activity levels like sedentary, light, moderate, vigorous or extreme active

Body Fat Percentage : is defined as the weight of fat divided by the total weight. It is estimated with the height and circumferences of waist, neck and hip.

Heart Rate Zones : calculates a person's heart rate zones using age and gender.

- Body Mass Index shows your ideal weight, healthy weight and overweight.
- BMI calculation shows real-time results
- Calculate calories burned base on daily activities 
- Calculate Daily calorie intake base on your body parameters and activity levels 
- Body Fat Percentage calculator 
- Calculates heart rate zones base on your age and gender
- Supports metric and ft + in length units
- Supports kg and lb pounds
- Result categories into Underweight, normal, overweight, obese and morbidly obese.

USAGE :Easy BMI Calculator, Calories Burned Calculator,  Body Mass Index Calculator, Daily Calorie Intake, Standard BMI Calculator, Body Fat Percentage, Body Fat Calculator, Heart Rate Zone calculator etc.

title: Body Measurement App: Weight Watchers & Fit Index
description:
"Body Measurement App: Weight Watchers & Fit Index" is a medical calculator mobile application to calculate body mass index (BMI), body surface area (BSA), and ideal body weight (IBW). Body mass index (BMI) is a simple index of weight-for-height. Body surface area (BSA) is the external surface area of the human body given in square meters. "Body Measurement App: Weight Watchers & Fit Index" app also able to calculate ideal weight for your body (IBW).

Why should you choose "Body Measurement App: Weight Watchers & Fit Index"?
üî∏ Simple and very easy to use.
üî∏ Accurate and precise calculation.
üî∏ Both standard and metric measures can be used for the weight calculation.
üî∏ Calculation and interpretation of body mass index (BMI).
üî∏ Calculation of body surface area (BSA) with 9 possible formulas.
üî∏ Calculation of ideal body weight (IBW) with 4 possible formulas.
üî∏ It is totally free. Download now!

Body mass index (BMI) is commonly used to classify normal weight, underweight, overweight, and obesity in adults. Body mass index (BMI) is significantly correlated with body fat. Body surface area (BSA) is a better indicator of metabolic mass than body weight because it is less affected by abnormal adipose mass. There are 9 formulas used to calculate body surface area (BSA) in this application. The calculation of ideal body weight (IBW) depends on your height and gender. "Body Measurement App: Weight Watchers & Fit Index" application has 5 most commonly used formulas to calculate ideal body weight (IBW).

For more info contact us at:
www.imedical-apps.com

title: BMI Calculator
description:
BMI gives you an idea of whether you‚Äôre 'underweight', a 'healthy' weight, 'overweight', or 'obese' for your height. BMI is one type of tool to help health professionals assess the risk for chronic disease. 

It compares your weight to your height, and is calculated by dividing your weight (in kilograms) by your height (in metres squared).

There is a difference in calculating the BMI of adults from that of children and adolescents. Unlike adults', the children's BMI should be compared with the percentile for age and sex.

This app offers you a chance to calculate BMI for both sex and all age groups.

BMI gives you an idea of whether you‚Äôre 'underweight', a 'healthy' weight, 'overweight', or 'obese' for your height. BMI is one type of tool to help health professionals assess the risk for chronic disease.

It compares your weight to your height, and is calculated by dividing your weight (in kilograms) by your height (in metres squared).

There is a difference in calculating the BMI of adults from that of children and adolescents. Unlike adults', the children's BMI should be compared with the percentile for age and sex.

This app offers you a chance to calculate BMI for both sex and all age groups.
summary: You want to know if you're overweight ? Check it out on this app.

title: BMI Calculator
description:
Calculates your 
Body Mass Index (BMI)
Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR)
Body Fat Calculation (BFC)
Harris Benedict Equation (HBE)
Information tab to explain each calculator.

Body Mass Index (BMI):
BMI (Body Mass Index) is a measurement of body fat based on height and weight that applies to both men and women between the ages of 18 and 65 years.

BMI can be used to indicate if you are overweight, obese, underweight or normal. A healthy BMI score is between 20 and 25. A score below 20 indicates that you may be underweight; a value above 25 indicates that you may be overweight.

Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR):
You use energy no matter what you're doing, even when sleeping. The BMR Calculator will calculate your Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR); the number of calories you'd burn if you stayed in bed all day.

If you've noticed that every year, it becomes harder to eat whatever you want and stay slim, you've also learnt that your BMR decreases as you age. Likewise, depriving yourself of food in hopes of losing weight also decreases your BMR, a foil to your intentions. However, a regular routine of cardiovascular exercise can increase your BMR, improving your health and fitness when your body's ability to burn energy gradually slows down.

Body Fat Calculation (BFC):
How much Body Fat are you carrying? Find out if you are in the healthy range. This Body Fat calculator is based on a formula developed by the US Navy.

First, your body fat percentage is simply the percentage of fat your body contains. If you weigh 140 pounds and are 10% fat, it means that your body consists of 14 pounds fat and 126 pounds lean body mass (bone, muscle, organ tissue, blood,...).

A certain amount of fat is essential to bodily functions. Fat regulates body temperature, cushions and insulates organs and tissues and is the main form of the body's energy storage. Check out this Body Fat Chart which describes fat ranges and their associated categories.


Harris Benedict Equation (HBE):
The Harris Benedict Equation is a formula that uses your BMR and then applies an activity factor to determine your total daily energy expenditure (calories). The only factor omitted by the Harris Benedict Equation is lean body mass. Remember, leaner bodies need more calories than less leaner ones. Therefore, this equation will be very accurate in all but the very muscular (will under-estimate calorie needs) and the very fat (will over-estimate calorie needs).

First, determine your BMR using our BMR Calculator or our BMR Formula.

Please remember, however, that this is only one of many possible ways to assess your weight. If you have any concerns about your weight, please discuss them with your physician, who is in a position, unlike this BMI calculator, to address your specific individual situation.

Great Resources:
http://www.shakesandsmoothies.com
http://www.healthfitnessenergy.com

title: morbid obesity
description:
Obesity traditionally has been defined as a weight at least 20% above the weight corresponding to the lowest death rate for individuals of a specific height, gender, and age (ideal weight).
Obesity is most commonly caused by a combination of excessive food intake, lack of physical activity, and genetic susceptibility.[1][4] A few cases are caused primarily by genes, endocrine disorders, medications, or mental illness.

recentChanges: Bug fixes and improvements
comments: I've been using the scale and app for over a year. It was great until recently. Now, the app never syncs with scale. I'll have the app open, right next to me and nothing. I try to drag down to see if I can get it to refresh, nothing. What's the point of having a fancy scale if you can't get the info??? Also, doesn't stay connected to Fitbit. Always having to resync. Fix it please!

It's great data points. Would love to give it 5 stars the only issue I have with this app is the lack of "edit options" and the difficulty in setting manual data like measurements and dates and times. Would be much better to not have to scroll so much. I'm confused on some of the stats and would love a link to a short YouTube video explaining what the term literally means, how it's used to help me in goal setting and why I should care for the term and it's values according to my health.

Great app. One thing missing though, is the ability to take and link photos with each weigh in, similar to MyFitnessPal app. It would be great to be able to save a photo with each weight measurement and then compare or see a timeline over a period of time. Otherwise, very happy with the scale and the app.

The first display as you get off the scale is beautifully laid out and very easy to read. The trend page is confusing bc you have red to. Go to the measurements page to add as any info. Should be able to get there from the trends page too by clicking the items but at least you can get there. Still exploring around but I love having the information.

I've seen this suggestion a couple times before, but the thing holding me back from giving 5 stars is the manual input for weight. I have two years worth of weight I wanna input. First issue is, as another user mentioned, how tedious it is to scroll through each date since the month and year is attached to the day. Please separate out the year, month, and day. This is most important. Second would be if there was some better interface to add multiple manual weight inputs at once. 5star when fixed

description:

You'll get a new workout every day.  

‚úì Guides you through a full 20-minute, full-body workout
‚úì No equipment necessary
‚úì Diabetic friendly: helps lower blood-sugar levels
‚úì Obesity friendly: some workouts can be seated
‚úì Senior citizen friendly: safe, non-explosive movements
‚úì Designed for anyone, even if you have limited mobility

Beginner's Workout works with physical therapists to create this safe, fun and effective routines that can be done without any equipment. These exercises are safe for people of various ages, weights, and levels of fitness.

You'll be given the choice between the Monthly Membership, Six Month Membership, or the Annual Membership. Price may vary by location. Choose a plan before you start your 7-day free trial. This was my first evening in over a year of trying to increase my physical activity level by exercising. I have some physical ailments that I exasperate by pushing myself to exercise beyond my comfort level, but the exercises in this app were simple and accommodated the beginner. Also, I'm learning to stop/modify if an exercise causes a painful strain. The animation, the descriptions and the exercise demonstrations made it easy to follow and keep up. description:
* In this BMI Calculator app you can check your BMI.
* And you can see your healthy weight according to your height.

What is BMI?

Body mass index (BMI) is used to determine whether you are in an ideal weight range for your height.

It gives you an idea of whether you‚Äôre "underweight", a "healthy weight", "overweight", or "obese" for your height. BMI is one type of tool to help health professionals assess the risk for chronic disease.

comments: Disappointed. The app is useless. And Google does not refund unless you request it immediately vs other apps that offer 30days guarantee. The plans are chaotic, they do not adapt based on feedback and input, and coach feature is worthless. It can be used only as basic tracker, but there are other options that work better and with reminders.

UI is actually quite... unclean, like not really minimalist, and not really inforgraphic. Especially for first page, sections separated quite bad. If you follow the circle you should add the statements ( insulin up down, keto, autophagy...) onto the circle directly and touch icons for more information. Also the circle is boring, even i reversed it, nothing happened and such an eyesore to see the time elapsed but the circle still run remaining.

I really love the update to the Coach, but now I'm having issues with not getting the notifications. They were working fine last week. I've had to reinstall the app, losing my progress. Hopefully this is the last time I'll have to do that. I really love this app

My notifications aren't working since the latest update. I made sure notifications were enabled in my settings. I turned them all off & back on in the app too. I don't want to have to install a separate water reminder app or set alarms for when my fasts start & end!

I would like a refund. This is the most useless app ever. It doesn't even show on your apps screen. You have to go to Google store to open every time. Just refund my money. I downloaded last night and am requesting my refund back onto card. Nit happy.....Leda Green

title: BMI Calculator: weight loss
description:
Do you take care of your health ? Do you exercise ? Do you control your weight? You trying loss weight ?
This BMI calculator is perfect for you - nice, fast and easy to use !!!
 
What is BMI ? - Body Mass Index:
Body weight divided by the square of height. BMI shows the ratio of weight to height, which does not take into account the individual characteristics, such as muscles.

If you are not sure, your weight or waist are the correct, use of the app and check.
Enter your age, height and weight or waist.

BMI calculator shows you:
- calculate your BMI,
- determine that your weight is normal (or indicate underweight, obesity, etc.),
- indicate the perfect BMI and weight for your age

Using our app BMI calculator, you can also check out:
- is your waist perfect ? - indicator waist / height
- level of body fat,
- burning calories and energy consumption,

This app supports various units of measure: imperial and metric.

Stay fit and healthy !!!

title: BMI Calculator - BMR Weight Health Calculator
description:
Whether your weight is high or low, It is always necessary to keep the weight in according to the height. So you needs to know height weight ratio. Every man is not proportional to other people with its height, Someone are balanced, some are thin, some are thick, some are thicker or more slim. So we need to know how much weight is balanced with our height. So there is only one issue of balance between the height and weight with height and weight chart. With this ideal weight calculator, you can easily measure your weight with your BMI.

This body mass index calculator (BMI calculator) compares your weight to your height, and is calculated by dividing your weight (in kilograms) by your height (in meters squared). It gives you an idea of whether you‚Äôre 'underweight', a 'healthy' weight, 'overweight', or 'obese' for your height.Then it provides you health tips to gain ideal health. It also provides you proper knowledge about health insurance.

It also helps you to determines your daily calorie needs to maintain weight. The calorie calculator is use to calculate your BMR - Basal Metabolic Rate. The daily calorie needs calculator takes into account the activity level, so the BMR is then updated to actual calorie needs based on activity level.

It calculates the body fat percent and lean muscle mass using caliper or tape, estimate daily calorie needs (BMR) and a desired heart rate for a workout. Make a quantitative mark of your fitness shape. Analyze your body health and performance, get fit and be healthy. Thats why its also called fitness calculator.

title: BMI Weight Calculator
description:
Calculate your BMI (Body Mass Index) and find out your ideal weight. BMI is a good way to check if you're a healthy weight, based on your height.
- Measurement units in Metric and Imperial
- Visualization of your weight and BMI on the dial
- Find out your ideal weight range
- Calculates BMI for ages 5+
- Shows weight ranges according to the World Health Organisation guidelines

Info:
The Body Mass Index is a way of seeing if your weight is appropriate for your height. Inaccuracies can occur if you're an athlete or very muscular as this can give you a higher BMI even if you have a healthy level of body fat. Also this app is not appropriate for women who are pregnant or breastfeeding, or people who are very frail.

title: BMI Calculator
description:
BMI calculator is a measure of body fat based on height and weight that applies to adult men and women.
This is a simple and accurate bmicalculator.
bmi calculator app free download,BMI calculator, bmi calculator for indian,bmi app,bmi calculator for men,bmi calculator for kids
BMI Calculator is a useful measure of overweight and obesity. It is calculated from your height and weight. BMI is an estimate of body fat and a good gauge of your risk for diseases that can occur with more body fat.

Although BMI can be used for most men and women, it does have some limits:
It may overestimate body fat in athletes and others who have a muscular build.
It may underestimate body fat in older persons and others who have lost muscle.
Use the BMI Calculator or BMI Tables to estimate your body fat. 
For people who are considered obese (BMI greater than or equal to 30) or those who are overweight (BMI of 25 to 29.9) and have two or more risk factors, it is recommended that you lose weight. Even a small weight loss (between 5 and 10 percent of your current weight) will help lower your risk of developing diseases associated with obesity. People who are overweight, do not have a high waist measurement, and have fewer than two risk factors may need to prevent further weight gain rather than lose weight.
Talk to your doctor to see whether you are at an increased risk and whether you should lose weight. Your doctor will evaluate your BMI, waist measurement, and other risk factors for heart disease.
The good news is even a small weight loss (between 5 and 10 percent of your current weight) will help lower your risk of developing those diseases.

Depending on your BMI number, you will be classified as:

Underweight (BMI less than 18.5)
Healthy weight (BMIs 18.5 to 24.9)
Overweight (BMIs 25 to 29.9)
Obese (BMI 30 and over)
If your BMI is less than 18.5, you are underweight. Health risks associated with being underweight include osteoporosis, infertility, and impaired immune functioning. Underweight may also indicate an eating disorder or other underlying illness.

If your BMI is 18.5 ‚Äì 24.9, it is a healthy range. This may lower your risk for developing weight-related health problems.


If your BMI is 25 or higher, you are at greater risk of developing diabetes, heart disease and some types of cancer. The higher your BMI number (over 25) is, the greater your risk of developing these conditions.

How is the BMI calculated?

The BMI is calculated using your height and weight. The BMI formula is list below. BMI can be calculated using either metric or imperial measures (the results will be the same).

Metric Units
kilograms (kg) and meters (m)	
Weight in kg
(Height in meters)2
Imperial (British) Units
pounds (lbs) and inches (in)	
Weight in pounds x 703
(Height in inches)2
Limitations

BMI is a handy tool, but it is not right for everyone. It may not accurately assess health risks in:

Muscular athletes
People under age 18 who have not reached full growth
Pregnant or lactating women
Adults over age 65

What should I do if my BMI is not within the healthy weight range?

If your number falls in the ‚Äúoverweight‚Äù or ‚Äúobese‚Äù BMI range, try to lose weight by making lifestyle changes. Start by eating smaller food portions and increasing your activity level. For information on healthy eating, talk to a registered dietitian. Find a registered dietitian in your area.

People with very low or very high BMIs tend to have the greater health risks. For example, if your BMI falls into the normal weight category, you will still have a higher risk of health problems if you smoke cigarettes, do not participate in regular physical activity and unhealthy foods with excessive fat and sugar.

Therefore it is quite clear that BMI is a very useful tool at your disposal to check and know whether your are healthy or not and take necessary steps to stay fit and fine.

title: WW Body Analysis Scale Tracker
description:
The WW smart bathroom scale app is a companion app to Conair's smart bathroom scales. Easily track your weight, body fat, body water, bone mass, and BMI (Body Mass Index). See everything at a glance on the dashboard, or go in depth with graphs and charts.

Automatically sync your weight to the WW¬Æ app if you are a subscriber, or sync your weight to Google Fit and allow your favorite health and fitness apps to access your data and make tracking quick and easy!

Our scales allow up to 9 users to measure and display:
- Weight
- Body fat in %
- Body water (hydration) in %
- Muscle Mass in %
- Bone mass in %
- Body Mass Index (BMI)

Simply open the app, tap ‚ÄúConnect to Scale‚Äù and step on ‚Äì the scale syncs all data to your app and you can review by day, by week, by month or by year. Having all your measurement results at your fingertips helps make it easier to get where you want to be!

comments: Somewhat useless app due to connection issues with the scale. It was great only for a few weeks. It disconnects itself and then you can't get it reconnected after trying multiple things. Now I have to spend extra money to buy a new scale that will connect directly through the regular WW app.

This app is useless. It won't connect to the scale because every time it asks for permission to turn Bluetooth on and off, I select "yes" and it turns off Bluetooth then gets stuck in a loop where it keeps requesting the same permission and I keep selecting "yes". I tried multiple restarts and reinstalls to no avail. Don't waste your time.

It used to be great. I had this scale and App for about 2 years and loved it. Loved that in app I could see progress. Loved that it synced to WW app which is why I invested $59.00 on a scale. Suddenly this morning it won't connect to Bluetooth and sync to my app. I followed all the trouble shooting prompts. Uninstalled app and reinstalled now I can't even get into the app. It won't allow me to log on. Apparently they updated this rendering it entirely useless. Conair/WW need to get it together

I purchased this particular scale by Conair because of ours ability to connect to the WW app. I purchased the scale on April 17, 2020 and I've only been able to connect to my app 2 times. Each time I try to connect to Bluetooth I get an error message. Wish I had read these reviews before purchasing this scale. It's useless and I'm sending it back.

Okay, I take it back. I got lucky that it worked once. I'm not sure though if its all the apps fault. The scale has its issues too. I'm user 3 on the scale and my wife is 2 & son is 4. User 3&4 are no longer visible to weigh in with. Sending the scale back and getting rid of app. I bought the scale for the WW and Bluetooth features.

title: BMI Calculator
description:
With this app, you can calculate and track your Body Mass Index, Basal Metabolic Rate, Body Fat Percentage, Waist-to-Height Ratio, and Waist-to-Hip ratio to find and reach your ideal weight based on age and gender.

APP FEATURES

‚òÖ BMI calculation for everyone 1 years and older.
‚òÖ Metric and imperial systems are supported.
‚òÖ Automatic saving of last entered values.
‚òÖ Simply clear all entered fields value.


INFO:

‚òÖ BMI - Body Mass Index: is defined as the bodyweight divided by the square of the height. It provides a rough guide since the BMI doesn't take into account a persons build or the composition of the body weight.

‚òÖ BMR - Basal Metabolic Rate: is the amount of energy expended while at rest in a neutrally temperate environment, in the post-absorptive state (meaning that the digestive system is inactive, which requires about twelve hours of fasting).

    This calculator will determine how many calories you burn each day based on your age, gender, height, weight and current level of activity. When selecting your activity level use:

   ‚Ä¢ Sedentary (little or no exercise)
   ‚Ä¢ Lightly Active (light exercise/sports 1-3 days/week)
   ‚Ä¢ Moderately Active (moderate exercise/sports 3-5 days/week)
   ‚Ä¢ Vigorously Active (hard exercise/sports 6-7 days a week)
   ‚Ä¢ Extremely Active (very hard exercise/sports & physical job or 2x training)

     This is referred to as your basal metabolic rate or BMR calculation and tells you: How Many Calories Do I Burn a Day?

‚òÖ BFP - Body Fat Percentage: of a human or other living being is the total mass of fat divided by total body mass; body fat includes essential body fat and storage body fat. Essential body fat is necessary to maintain life and reproductive functions. The percentage of essential body fat for women is greater than that for men, due to the demands of childbearing and other hormonal functions. The percentage of essential fat is 2‚Äì5% in men, and 10‚Äì13% in women (referenced through NASM).

‚òÖ WHtR - Waist-to-Height Ratio: also called waist-to-stature ratio (WSR), is defined as the waist circumference divided by the height. It measures abdominal obesity and therefore can be used as a better indicator of health risks than BMI (Body Mass Index).

‚òÖ WHR - Waist-to-Hip Ratio: is the ratio of the circumference of the waist to that of the hips. This is calculated as waist measurement divided by hip measurement (W √∑ H). The WHR has been used as an indicator or measure of health, and the risk of developing serious health conditions. WHR correlates with fertility (with different optimal values for males and females).

 More information about BMI, WHtR and WHR classification which is used by this calculator is available on the World Health Organization (WHO) website.

Please rate us with ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ if you like our app!

Compliment, problems or criticism with this app? Please contact us via email: app.golemtech@gmail.com

Please give us feedback & ratings for support.
                        Thanks.

Free base app features:
* Food tracker
* Weight tracker
* Supports new & old systems
* Food calculators
* Activity calculators
* Daily allowance calculators
* Favorites
* Widgets

Subscription features:

comments: This could be super useful, but it isn't because accessing the database requires a subscription. Having a subscription requires having an account on the Forum, and form registration has been disabled. I've written to the developer several times and got no response. I would love to use the features of this app, but it seems to have been abandoned! Maybe this will catch the developer's attention. If I can get a subscription and access all the features, I might change this to a 5-star review!
This may work for other people, but I found it strangely hard to use. You can save "favorites", but there is no way to just add something you eat from your favorites to your day.

I've been using this app off and on since 2006. I lost 138lbs in just over a year, and I couldn't have done it without this app! It is very simple, has a built in food calculator and is very user friendly.
Easy to use..you need to take the time to put in nutrition info on foods you eat, but if you save to favorites you wont have to put info in again.
I absolutely love this app! I have downloaded it a couple times, in different devices and it is always a joy to interact with. Highly recommended!

title: Bariatric IQ
description:
"Bariatric IQ is a specially designed app for patients preparing for or after weight loss surgeries such as gastric bypass, gastric sleeve, gastric band, and gastric plication. 

Bariatric IQ lets you:
- Track your weight
- Create beautiful before after pictures
- Read our specially selected bariatric recipes
- Know if you are getting enough of each essential nutrient
- Find places to eat nearby which are suitable for bariatric patients
- Track your diet and get useful feedback on it
- Add the same products to your menu list and shopping list
- Know which particular product belongs to which bariatric nutrition pyramid level
- Get in touch with a respectable bariatric dietitian, bariatric or plastic surgeon
- Get useful motivational and educational messages
- Join communities and participate in forums with other people before or after obesity surgery
- Read dozens of useful articles related to obesity surgery

You‚Äôll be able to do this and much more, our app is constantly updated with new features

Bariatric IQ team consists of professionals working in this field for more than a decade and is determined to make this app the most comprehensive and useful tool for all pre and post bariatric patients around the world."

title: OKOK¬∑International
description:
OKOK Healthcare Management, an application for use with the smart Bluetooth scale, records and manages your body weight measurement results. With this APP, you can use the Bluetooth scale to check and manage various health indices for body weight, body fat, body water, muscle and etc. Though mainly used for body weight control, this APP utilizing your health indices also give you advice on everyday sport, food and sleep.

More information about this OKOK Healthcare Management APP our services provided and can be found at www.tookok.cn

summary: An application for use with the smart Bluetooth scale.
recentChanges: fix bugs
comments: Too much ads, I like the app in that it's strait forward and easy to use and understand, but now when I open the app, there is a BIG AD that's like IN YOUR FACE, that's truly uncool. I like this app enough that I'd pay for a pro version without any ads if the price was right. (Hint hint, maybe one for the suggestion box to the dev's). If not for the ads, I'd give this 4 and half stars

OK but the ad on entry gets tedious and annoying. Some additions would be welcomed- like the option to add blood pressure, pulse rate and irregular rythym markers. It would put most of the common health measurements in one handy place and I would think diabetics would benefit from blood sugar level too. But overall it does the things that are needed for this kind of app and connection seems reliable, so thanks. But please consider extending its functionality as described above.

The app finally works, but when I try to change something, like target weight, picture or add another user, there's an error message: "you don't have a network connection". Tried wifi and mobile data, restart, cleaning cache. Still doesn't work.

Terrible big ad at startup and small ads in app itself. Have to disconnect from internet to get rid of the ads... Scale doesn't feel that strong, but app is great. Connect easily and quick. Give a lot of data. Supports multiple users, even guest. Generates graphs and contains a small help of every measured item.

Earlier my biggest concerm with the app was the fact that the app which main feature was connecting to the scale via bluetooth was demanding permission to know phone's geolocation. Today the application updated and now it simply crashes immediately after startup. Keep up the good work, guys

title: MedM Weight
description:
MedM Weight is a simple and friendly weight diary aiming to motivate you and help in weight management, sticking to a diet and living healthier life.

- Absolute World Leader in number of connected Smart Weight Scales;
- Fastest and easiest manual data entry;
- Fully functional offline without any registrations;
- Available for all smartphones and tablets;
- Backup and share your data via MedM Health Cloud.

MedM Weight features automatic data upload from compatible meters and convenient manual entry from any legacy meter. 

You need just a few seconds to add your measurement results (manually or automatically). You can then add tags and upload to the cloud if you prefer, or just keep your data on your smartphone or tablet.

Powerful historical and trend analysis tools enable you to discover patterns and adjust your behavior.

Compatible connected meter brands include A&D, Omron, Lifesense, Fora, Taidoc, ChoiceMMed, iChoice, Contec, Tanita, BeetsBlu and many others - try if your meter works. And remember - any meter can be used in manual mode, and it is still so much better than paper records!

MedM Connected scales:
A&D UA-321, A&D UC-351PBT-Ci, A&D UC-352BLE, A&D UC-911BT, Beets Blue LS203, Contec WT100, Contec WT100BLE, iChoice S1, HMM SmartLab Scale W, Fora W310B, Fora Test N'GO Scale 550, Omron HBF-206IT, TaiDoc TD-2551, TaiDoc TD-2555, Tanita BC-590BT, Tanita HD-351BT, Tanita BF-2000 ANT+ and many others.

The whole list of MedM Connected devices is available on our web site:
https://www.medm.com/sensors/

MedM apps and services are available for all mobile platforms: Android, iOS, Windows Phone. 

Being connected to MedM Health Cloud you can access, backup, and share your data with your family, friends, and physicians.

MedM - Enabling Connected Health!

title: Simple BMI Calculator
description:
An app that calculates the Body Mass Index (BMI) using the standard formula in which bmi = weight(kg) / [height(m)]^2 for adults.

BMI is commonly used in order to measure the deviation of the person's weight from the normal weight taking into account the person's height. The following weight categories are considered:
- Very severely underweight, when BMI < 15	
- Severely underweight, when 15 <= BMI < 16
- Underweight, when 16 <= BMI < 18.5
- Normal (healthy weight), when 18.5 <= BMI < 25
- Overweight, when 25  <= BMI < 30
- Obese Class I (Moderately obese), when 30 <= BMI < 35
- Obese Class II (Severely obese), when 35 <= BMI < 40
- Obese Class III (Very severely obese), when BMI >= 40

Simple BMI Calculator app weight categories do not apply for children.

title: Fitbod Workout & Fitness Plans
description:
Get stronger, lose weight or gain muscle mass with Fitbod! When you hit your gym or living room, Fitbod's innovative training algorithm will guide you through the right sets, reps, ‚Äãand weight to reach your fitness goals.

‚óÜ A personalized plan designed to push your limits:

To build your custom-fit workout, Fitbod‚Äôs powerful technology understands your strength-training ability, studies your past workouts and adapts to your available gym equipment. 

Between workouts, your training plan will maximize fitness gains by intelligently varying intensity (weight) and volume (sets/reps) between sessions. No muscle group is left behind in your personalized training plan.

‚óÜ Grasp and master new strength-building exercises:

Fitbod keeps your gym sessions fresh and fun by mixing up your workouts with new exercises and maximizing the use of your available equipment. 

For beginner strength-trainers, find the confidence to try new resistance exercises and gym equipment. Learn the correct movements from over 400 HD Demonstration Videos

‚óÜ Attain strength-training achievements as you reach your personal exercise records.

Heroic performances happen all the time, and we wanted to recognize them by showcasing your personal bests as Fitbod Achievements.

‚óÜ Get workouts that match General Conditioning, Strength-Training, Muscle Tone, Bodybuilding, Powerlifting or Olympic Weightlifting.

‚óÜ View your workout impact on a body heat map.

‚óÜ Calories burned for each workout.

WHY IT WORKS:
Fitbod has been fine-tuned by certified personal trainers to bring the best-practices of strength-training to you. These best practices include:

‚óÜ Individualization - Superior results are achieved by tailoring the workout program to your unique body, experience, environment and goals.

‚óÜ Balance - Muscles improve when working in concert with the entire muscular system. Overworking some sets of muscle while underworking others can negatively impact results. Fitbod designs well-balanced workout routines.

‚óÜ Variation - Mixing up muscle groups, exercises, sets, reps and weight over time serves to strengthen the musculoskeletal system and keep the body sharp.

Privacy Policy: www.fitbod.me/privacy.html
Terms of Use: www.fitbod.me/terms.html
Support: http://fitbod.me/support

Join the Fitbod Community:
Instagram: instagram.com/fitbodapp/
Twitter: twitter.com/fitbodApp
Facebook: facebook.com/fitbodapp

recentChanges: - Added support for changing rest times for exercises before starting the workout.
comments: The app is easy to use, and provides copious workout regimens that can easily be altered to match your personal needs based on exercise comfort level and equipment access. Best geared towards people with a little experience(you should consult a personal trainer if you don't have experience anyways). My only complaint would be that timed exercises like planks can't currently use the same in app timer that is utilized for rest between sets, or at least I haven't figured that one out yet.

5 Stars to 1 Star. I purchased this subscription and have an issue with account recovery. I purchased a new phone and submitted a request to recover my account and there is a 72 hour wait time in which I'm on day 4 with no response. I requested a refund and google notified me that they are unable to provide one. I do not recommend this app for fitness goals or a subscription for the issue above. You lose your phone or get a new one they will not recover your account info.

Overall I like the app and the ease of use. I wish it was easier to change dates for workouts. If you forget to "finish workout" it caries all those exercises over to the next day. Also if you are loading your own workout it would be helpful to be able to load them in advance as opposed to the day of the workout.

Good for where it is thus far. Needs same features as iOS. Like that it builds routines for you and that you can add what equip you already have. Needs the ability to say what weights you have, but how many. would also like the ability for the program to show.me what weights I need to add to my bar so I don't have to think. Lastly, need to be able save workouts you've completed for future workouts.

I really like actual 'guts' of the app. Nice selection of exercises. Good video and instructions. It increments the workouts as you go along. The muscle recovery is very handy. The GUI needs work. I would like to be able to see the muscle recovery percentages on the graphic showing the muscles. The android app needs as much love as the IOS. Please provide some integration with Google Fit or Samsung Health. It would also be nice to have a button to regenerate your next workout.

title: SimpleWeight - Recording Diet
description:
SimpleWeight is a very simple yet powerful weight control tool. 

Many people try many diet methods and fail because it is hard to continue.

With SimpleWeight, all you need to do is to measure your weight daily and type in. It shows the record in a graph along with your target weight.

Knowing your weight and its trend is the first and the most important step for taking it under control.

This app makes this step very simple & fun!
Simplicity leas to Continuity!
Continuity leads to the Result!

Some of the feature of the app are:

- Simple & easy-to-use user interface

- Record body fat % as well as the body weight and see them in a graph!

- BMI calculation and indication for daily data. Overweight area is indicated in yellow/red color in the graph.

- Scrollable and zoomable graph to explore your past record.

- Make notes about what you had and/or how much exercise you did, etc. for each record.

- Make notes about events that affect weight changes, which appears on the graph!

- Post on Twitter to share your progress with your friends.

- Import/Export data from/to the online server. Automatic export for protecting your data from any accident is also available.

- Passcode Lock to protect your privacy.


********************** Caution **********************
This app is intended for a healthy adult to reduce/manage their body weight. This app is not intended to give a medical advice nor does not guarantee that you succeed in achieving your target weight. If you are seeing a doctor or have any disorder, consult with your doctor on your weight management.

Unreasonable dieting or exercising could damage your health. Try to do proper exercise for your condition and have well balanced diet.
******************************************************

It's very simple and easy to continue, and seeing the progress of weight control is fun!

Have a nice & simple weight control with SimpleWeight!

* If you found any problems, or have any questions or feature request, please contact us from the contact form:

http://www.simpleweight.net/en/contact/

title: Weight loss plan
description:
7 days of diet plan in Telugu
This is a very tough diet
Diet with fruits and vegetables
But the cost-effective diet

The degree to which a person is overweight is generally described by the body mass index (BMI). Overweight is defined as a BMI of 25 or more, thus it includes pre-obesity defined as a BMI between 25 and 30 and obesity as defined by a BMI of 30 or more.

The body mass index (BMI) is a measure of a person's weight taking into account their height. It is given by the following formula: BMI equals a person's weight (mass) in kilograms divided by the square of the person's height in meters. The units, therefore, are kg/m2 but BMI measures are typically used and written without units.

While the negative health outcomes associated with obesity are accepted within the medical community, the health implications of the overweight category are more controversial. The generally accepted view is that being overweight causes similar health problems to obesity, but to a lesser degree. A 2016 review estimated that the risk of death increases by seven percent among overweight people with a BMI of 25 to 27.5 and 20 percent among overweight people with a BMI of 27.5 to 30.

The Framingham heart study found that being overweight at age 40 reduced life expectancy by three years.
Being overweight also increases the risk of oligospermia and azoospermia in men.

Every time your heart beats, it pumps blood through your arteries to the rest of your body. Blood pressure is how hard your blood pushes against the walls of your arteries. High blood pressure (hypertension) usually has no symptoms, but it may cause serious problems, such as heart disease, stroke, and kidney failure.

A blood pressure of 120/80 mm Hg (often referred to as "120 over 80") is considered normal. If the top number (systolic blood pressure) is consistently 140 or higher or the bottom number (diastolic blood pressure) is 90 or higher, you are considered to have high blood pressure.

diet plan
one week diet plan
7 days diet plan
weight loss plan

 true weight calculator has
Age
In theory, age shouldn't be a determinant of an IBW figure from middle age onwards because the height of a human generally stays constant and does not go through the growth in height apparent in young ages. It is actually expected for human males and females to lose 1.5 and 2 inches in height respectively by age 70. Therefore, the only variables acting on body weight are muscle mass and body fat, and the many different factors associated with the two, such as illness, diet, and exercise. However, it is important to remember that as people age, lean muscle mass decreases and accumulation of excess body fat is easier. This is a natural process of human biology over a lifespan, though actions can be taken to thwart it such as controlling for important variables such as diet, exercise, stress, and sleep.
true weight calculator has Gender
Generally, females weigh less than males even though they are prone to carry more body fat.. The physical, genetic makeup of a male body naturally has more muscle mass, which is heavier than fat. Not only that, but women are less dense (physically); they have lower bone density. Last but not least, males tend to be taller than females.
true weight calculator has Height
Height becomes the main factor in an IBW figure. Obviously, the taller the person, the more muscle mass and body fat required to fill it out, resulting in more weight. A male at a similar height to a female should weigh about 10-20% heavier.

title: Pacer Pedometer: Walking, Running, Step Challenges
description:
The Pacer App: ‚ÄúWalking & Running Pedometer for Health & Weight‚Äù syncs steps & calories w/ MyFitnessPal and Fitbit! Track your step, walking & weight loss with this free health counter. Lose weight and track walk distance and calories burned using 24/7 step counting from our pedometer, step counter & health tracker app.

Download the Pedometer app for free to turn your phone into your personal health and weight loss tracker! Lose weight with calorie burning guided fitness plans, step counting and activity tracking. Join our health, fitness and walking community and get fit and active!

How Pacer works:
-Just download, open and start walking. Our free step counter app will track your steps automatically if your phone is with you
-‚ÄúTrends:‚Äù Track your complete activity history (steps, calorie count, etc.)
-‚ÄúExplore:‚Äù Groups & challenges
-‚ÄúMe:‚Äù Track weight, habits and more. Sync w/ MyFitnessPal & Fitbit.
-‚ÄúPlan:‚Äù Daily exercise plans for your health goals

For Better Accuracy:
1. Go to "Pedometer Preferences" and adjust the Pedometer mode if the step counter is not accurately tracking steps
2. Add our app to your cleaning tool‚Äôs "ignore" list so the step tracker doesn't get shut down
3. No two people walk the same. Adjust step counter sensitivity if needed to improve walking tracker accuracy

Important Note:
Some phones just can‚Äôt count steps if the screen is off or locked. We try hard to support as many phones as we can. If these steps don‚Äôt solve your problem, your device could be the issue. Email our support and we‚Äôll work hard get your step counting back on track.

Just Download and Go
-No wristband or additional tracker hardware required. Count your steps with just your phone ‚Ä¶ and our counter is free!
-No website login needed. Just download our walking app to start counting steps and tracking calories burned.

Complete Fitness & Steps Tracking
-Built-in pedometer tracks your steps as you walk. The step counter works whether your phone is in your hand, pocket or purse
-Count steps, calories, distance and active time
-GPS activity tracker tracks outdoor fitness activities on a map
-Works with MyFitnessPal and Fitbit. Pedometer syncs activity data to MyFitnessPal and Fitbit creating the ultimate weight loss tool and step counter app
-All of these tracking features are free! True free step counting.

Powerful Fitness Plans
-Daily exercise plans designed by pro trainers to improve health, lose weight and stay active
-Exercise plans for all activity levels and health goals
-Step by step audio and video guided workouts

Groups and Events ‚Äì Motivation
-Create walking groups to burn calories together with friends & family
-Compete in events for motivation to walk and lose weight

Track your Health and Fitness Data
-Track your steps, activity and calorie burn. Make every step count and lose more weight
-Sync our tracker with apps like MyFitnessPal and FitBit for total step counting data and tracking

Create Healthy Habits
-One-tap tools to build health and fitness habits and beat weight loss goals
-Reach your goal: Walk more, Lose weight, or Improve health!

Other Key Features:
-The best pedometer for any phone
-Accurate steps & activity tracking
-Weight loss, BMI tracking and calorie burn counter
-Daily fitness plans for any health goal ‚Äì lose weight, walk more or improve health
-Trends displays daily steps, calories and weight
-Auto-sync steps and calories to MyFitnessPal or Fitbit

Count on Pacer Pedometer for the best free walk tracker. Try Pacer Pedometer first before you buy a Fitbit or other tracker! Pacer syncs with MyFitnessPal and other step counter apps for all of your health and step data in one tracking app. 

Syncing Pacer with Fitbit:
1.Set up your Fitbit App
2.In Pacer, tap: Me -> Data & Settings -> Apps & Devices and tap ‚ÄúFitbit‚Äù to connect
3.Log into both your Pacer and Fitbit accounts and authorize Pacer to write data to Fitbit
4.Your Fitbit is now connected to Pacer

title: BFitt - Body Fat & BMI Calculator
description:
With this applications you can calculate your body mass index, body fat percent and caloric intake per day according to your goals, besides you can save all your measurements to keep track of your progress.

- The application works with the metric system.


Concepts:

- Body Mass Index: It offers an indicator for the relationship between weight and height but without taking into account individual factors such as muscle.

- Percentage of body fat: Calculated with the so-called "circumference method" that uses the height and circumference of the waist, neck and hips.

- Caloric Consumption: It is the sum of the internal heat produced (Basal Metabolism Index) and the external work (Physical Activity Level). The application shows the different caloric quantities that are required according to the goal: maintain weight, lose weight or gain weight.

recentChanges:

comments: Works great. Takes a bit of time to learn to navigate the app. Surprised at the number of vegan recipes available. Some food were incorrectly inputted so I sent a report and also updated what I have. I wish you could update the info yourself. Also, I wish there was more flexibility with the intermitten fasting time. Overall, happy and hopeful it will help me achieve my weight loss goal.

I've been using this app for quite a few years and it is pretty decent. However, I was quite disappointed that the search option for one's own foods was removed; now one has to scroll endlessly until they find the food they are looking for. Furthermore, I would suggest adding a meal prep feature where one inputs the nutrition details for what one eats, but then the actual calories and stuff is only added to the daily counter once it has been eaten(a check off system).

I really love how many options of food there are, I can always find the exact thing I've eaten on here and how much I had. The only thing I don't really like is the feature connecting the app with a step counter app like Google fit, it doesn't really seem to work properly and update my steps so I've started just adding them in manually. Aside from that it does all I need.

When you search food it doesn't have as many options as I would like, such as restaurants. It might have one calorie count for something and the one below it is completely different. It's hard to know what's right or wrong. You can add them in but I don't want to do that every time so I feel like I am guessing. I wish it would have things set as peice or amount. It reminds you frequently to log info and encourages you which I like, and has a lot of meal options. The meal calorie count is nice.

I'm using it to track my dietary supplements, it's pretty straight forward, and you can add your own foods (like your mom's recipe and stuff). I wish I could be more precise with the measurements (Adding Vitamin D in milligrams is pretty useless, for example) and that it accepted more nutrients (my supplement has a ton of vitamins and minerals, and it would be nice to track those. I wish I knew an app that could approximately the micronutrients content of my mom's recipe too...)

title: Lose Belly Fat in 1 Week
description:
Stomach Exercises for Women
How to reduce belly fat for women? This stomach exercises app helps women to flatten their abdominal part and get Six-Pack with Core Exercises & Abdomen exercises. It offers Best Abs Fitness Exercises and Daily Ab Workout for those who want to a get flat stomach and get rid of belly fat.

Belly fat, or visceral fat, is an especially harmful type of fat that sits around your organs. The first week of belly fat loss are the most important, because changes to diet and exercise can result in relatively large weight loss in a short time. Learn the truth about how the body stores and removes belly fat, then adjust your lifestyle for maximum fat reduction.

How To Lose Belly Fat in 1 Week is a free Android application recommended if you are one of those people who are looking for exercices at home to lose weight quickly. This exerices is one of the most appreciated weight loss exercices at the moment.

The question of how to lose stomach fat in a week cannot be overstated, sure some people may doubt it, but losing belly fat in a week is easily doable and has been done before. not forgetting that some good habits and a proper nutrition such as Jogging, running, cycling, brisk walking, swimming ,and low calorie diets, is necessary, not only to loose belly fat within a specific time , but to maintain the health of the entire body.

fat belly exercises completely prevented people from re-gaining abdominal fat after weight loss, so implying that exercise is particularly important during weight maintenance not to mention that Exercise also leads to reduced inflammation, blood sugar levels and all the other metabolic abnormalities that are associated with central obesity.

title: BMI Calculator and Weight Tracker
description:
BMI ? 

BMI-Weight Tracker is an app designed to monitor weight, body measurements, calculate BMI, Body Fat Percent, Waist to Hip Ratio and Ideal weight, This weight loss tracker will assist you in weight control and helps you to lose weight or reach your weight goal. The app also includes a BMI Calculator which calculates your BMI and your ideal weight. You can also define your own personal target weight.


Getting the ideal weight can be tricky 
Check your body stats to find your ideal weight With this BMI Calculator you can calculate and evaluate your Body Mass Index (BMI) based on the relevant information on body weight, height, age and sex, because overweight and obesity are risk factors for diseases such as hypertension. It can also be used to find your healthy weight if you want to lose weight or are on diet.


Features:
- Weight tracker to help you achive your goals
- Calculate the BMI value along with your ideal body weight.
- Determine your daily caloric needs and lose fat effectively.
- Body fat percentage calculator suitable for men and women
- Clear and easy interface
- Tracking weight, BMI and Body Fat Percent
- Body measurements
- Waist to Hip Ratio
- Ideal weight
- Track your daily weight
- Integrated BMI Calculator
- Set a desired weight and follow your progress
- Optional the app will remind you to track your weight in our diary
- Interactive charts to view your weight curve
- Summary of progress
- Widget
- Metric or Imperial units
- Reminder to input your weight
- Log your weight and evaluate the success of your diet.


More information about BMI classification which is used by the BMI Calculator is available on the website of the World Health Organization (WHO).

title: BMR & BMI Calculator
description:
If you want to lose weight its important that you lose weight technically. so you can calculate that how much weight you will get or lose after particular time period

For this you must know your body's BMR and BMI 

BMR is number of calories our body burns in a day while doing different activites like resting, breathing, walking & sleeping etc

BMR and BMI app will calculate your body's BMR and provide important information about calories wheather you want to gain or lose weight 

BMR and BMI app also provides a calculation meter where you can calculate number of calories you should take according to your target weather you want to lose weight or gain weight 

BMI is calculated by dividing person's weight with his/her height

If BMI is below 16 BMR and BMI app will show Severe Thinness
If BMI is 16 to 17 BMR and BMI app will show Moderate Thinness
If BMI is 17 to 18.5 BMR and BMI app will show Mild Thinness
If BMI is 18.5 to 25 BMR and BMI app will show Normal
If BMI is 25 to 30 BMR and BMI app will show Overweight
If BMI is 30 to 35 BMR and BMI app will show Obese Class I
If BMI is 35 to 40 BMR and BMI app will show Obese Class II
If BMI is greater then 40 BMR and BMI app will show Obese Class III

In BMR and BMI app we have graph representation for showing BMI with different color representation 

In BMR and BMI app we provide calories calculation for some basic units of weight gain and lose. 

In BMR and BMI app user is also able to calculate number of calories he / she should in order to get or lose weight

title: Simple BMI
description:
An application to calculate a person's Body Mass Index (BMI). BMI is a measure of body fat and is commonly used within the health industry to determine whether your weight is healthy. 

Use the application to calculate your BMI and determine if you are Underweight, Normal, Overweight or Obese.

title: BMI & Health Calculator
description:
Are You Worried About your BMI ???

Calculate your BMI and BMR now and stay fit.

Understand what is BMI Calculator.


BMI is Body Mass Index. You can drive your BMI from the weight and height of an individual. An individual can be categorised as underweight, normal weight or obese based on BMI value. For categorisation commonly accepted BMI ranges are defined.

Here are commonly accepted BMI ranges
- Underweight = under 18.5
- Normal weight = 18.5 to 25
- Overweight = 25 to 30
- Obese >= 30

BMIs under 20.0 and over 25.0 have been associated with higher all-cause mortality These ranges of BMI vary based on factors such as region and age, and are sometimes further divided into subcategories such as severely underweight or very severely obese. To see the values of subcategories of BMI you can follow the table below.

What is BMR?

Basal Metabolic Rate is the number of calories required to keep your body functioning at rest. BMR is also known as your body‚Äôs metabolism; therefore, any increase to your metabolic weight, such as exercise, will increase your BMR. To get your BMR, simply input your height, gender, age and weight below. Once you‚Äôve determined your BMR, you can begin to monitor how many calories a day you need to maintain or lose weight

In this app, you can calculate your BMI and BMR which helps you to track how healthy you are. This app is free to use

Features of this App

- Calculate BMI and BMR 
- Daily Health Tips Free To Use 
- Track  daily required calories intake
-BP Charting

Upcoming Features
- Blood Sugar Charting

title: BMI Calculator -  Fat level Weight Loss, Gain, Fit
description:
Doctor use BMI Number to judge illness.

Body fat level is a major factor to tell about our health issues risk. But how do we know whether our body fat level is normal or not. Here is a solution for this problem. 

BMI Calculator  is a tool which calculates your Body Mass Index i.e. BMI according to height and weight. It tells you about the category of fat level you fall in. 

The categories of fat level are as follows:

1. Underweight      :    Need to gain weight.
2. Normal Weight  :    Healthy weight
3. Overweight         :    Need to reduce weight
4. Obese                  :    Need to reduce weight rigorously. 

It calculates Body Mass Index (BMI) in two formats:
1.Metric    :   Considers height in meters and weight in kg for BMI calculation.
2. English  :  Considers height in inches and weight in lbs(pound) for BMI calculation.

Use BMI calculator to know your body fat level and beware of health risks.

Weight, BMI Tracker: (BMI: Body Mass Index)
Every day, you can review and analyze the body, BMI, weight to track to your desired weight.
- Helps you track the index related to body weight as: weight, BMI, lose, ideal weight, losing weight, targeting weight;
- Allows you to calculate the index of the body such as: calculate to reach weight, weight diary, keeping weight, normal weight, success index, and suited weight;
- Monitor your weight using an efficient interactive chart: 
- Help you to achieve your ideal weight. 
- Easy see the weight loss and the gain on the chart.

 ‚ÄúWeight, BMI Tracker‚Äù app brings you the daily your information :
- Monitor BMI, body, weight: Previous weight, current weight, and the weight you want to achieve detailed parameters
- import your weight daily or weekly for review advice on the results when you do anything.
- Estimation and evaluation of BMI, body, weight over the chart
- Based on the BMI, body, weight and then apps calculate and analysis chart fit you are overweight, or underweight or normal weight standards.
- Weight Loss tracker: Current height you want your weight gain is how much?
- Allows you to diet for the purpose of weight loss or weight gain

Main Features (Weight, BMI Tracker) :
- Weight tracker with option to track the BMI, body, weight based on age, height, body
- Calculates BMI (Body Mass Index) 
- Calculates body and percentage body fat
- Uses chart to shows your overall weight loss progress over time.
- Remind your weight to increase or decrease
- May be represented in between Lb (LBM, pound) and kg (kilogram), Cm(centimeter) and ft(feet)
- Input data (weight, age, body, height) into the database. 
- Setting for configurations initial app.  

‚ÄúWeight, BMI Tracker‚Äù recommend the amount of time necessary to achieve that goal based on weight, height, body, and fat, gender and current age.   Besides, the application allows you to save ‚ÄúWeight log‚Äù:
- The loss or the gain between two day/month.
- Information‚Äôs on the weight: BMI, Body Fat %, note and rate (sport and diet).
Download this app free today! 
Thanks you for download and use ‚ÄúWeight, BMI Tracker‚Äù.¬†

title: Weight Calorie Watch
description:
Are you underweight, of normal weight, overweight, obese or grossly obese? 

What should your daily Calorie (food) requirement be?

What should your daily Calorie intake be if you want to loss or gain weight?

Do you want to monitor your daily Calorie intake, or monitor how much you have lost through exercise?

This suite of apps is designed for these purposes.

One fundamental aspect of good health is to maintain a normal body weight. Today, lifestyle diseases like diabetes, high blood pressure and heart diseases are the main causes of ill health. An abnormal weight plays a crucial role in these diseases. Further, it also contributes to many other health problems such as irregular periods in women and infertility in both men and women.

This app helps you to monitor your weight, your body mass index and know what your requirement is if you want to maintain, lose or gain weight. It also helps you keep track of your daily intake and expenditure (by exercise). 

Special care is taken to keep it simple. You should only need to spend a few minutes of your time on this 
app. 

This app is an essential mobile health app for every adult.

comments: Keeps things simple, which is great.  Needs to save height so it does not have to be manually inputted each time.  Graphs need to be more detailed. Also, the fact that the graph resizes based on weight history is good, but the way it was done does not look very good.  Password is useless as an option, horrible as a requirement.. If someone is on my phone we already have a bigger problem than how much I weigh. The only thing I need want a second password for after you get past my lockscreen is my banking apps.

Nice app, does exactly what i want in its basic design. It would be great if it could also display 7 and 30 day averages for your daily expenditure along with the yearly and overall averages as well. Also, having the expenditure numbers display in red or green, depending on a negative expenditure or a positive expenditure would be a great add as well. Thx.
I love this app /it's complete and user friendly
Hi  it needs to add a brief list of different food list calories to your app
The program is very helpful. It provides the essential calculation and information in a simple way.

title: Withings Health Mate
description:
Whether you‚Äôre looking to lose weight, get more active, monitor blood pressure, or even sleep better, Health Mate unleashes the power of Withings health devices, backed by a decade of expertise. In the app you‚Äôll find health data that is easy to understand, personalized, and fully leverageable by you and your doctor. 

With Health Mate, be empowered to take action‚Äîand start mastering your vitals.

TRACK YOUR VITALS

WEIGHT & BODY COMPOSITION MONITORING
Reach your weight goals with advanced insights including weight, weight trends, BMI & body composition.

ACTIVITY & SPORT MONITORING
Automatically track your daily activity and workout sessions with in-depth insights including steps, heart rate, multisport tracking, connected GPS & Fitness Level assessment. 

SLEEP ANALYSIS / BREATHING DISTURBANCES DETECTION
Improve your nights with sleep-lab worthy results (sleep cycles, sleep score, heart rate, snoring & more) and uncover breathing disturbances.

HYPERTENSION MANAGEMENT
Monitor hypertension from the comfort of your home with medically-accurate systolic and diastolic blood pressure results, plus reports you can share with your doctor to monitor the efficacy of treatment.


...WITH A SIMPLE & SMART APP

EASY TO USE
Only one app for all Withings products for a holistic view of your health, in the palm of your hands. 

EASY TO UNDERSTAND
All the results are displayed clearly with normality ranges & color-coded feedback to know exactly where you stand. 

TAILORED HEALTH INSIGHTS
Knowing your data is good, but knowing how to interpret it is better. Health Mate has now a voice and will highlight particularly relevant data for your health and enrich your experience with a science-based interpretation of this data.

SHAREABLE REPORTS FOR YOUR DOCTORS
Easily share data with healthcare professionals including blood pressure, weight trends, temperatures & more. Get also access to a full health report that can be shared to your practician via PDF.

THE COMPANION TO Google Fit & YOUR FAVORITE APPS
Health Mate and Google Fit work seamlessly together, so you can retrieve all your health data in one place for easier health tracking.  Health Mate is also compatible with 100+ top health & fitness apps including Strava, MyFitnessPal and Runkeeper.


ABOUT WITHINGS

WITHINGS creates devices embedded in easy-to-use everyday objects that connect to a unique app and act as powerful daily health check-ups, as well as tools to help master long-term health goals. Our team of engineers, doctors, and health professionals invents the world‚Äôs most efficient devices to help track and analyze anyone‚Äôs vitals, via a decade of expertise.

comments: Installed this app on my Android phone then paired successfully with my new ScanWatch without problems. Then the app completely stopped working. Now all I get is the error message that it's not responding. Reinstalled the app twice no difference. Had to install it on my Android tablet (not ideal) but at least it now works. Great watch but not a very proficient app.

Doesn't sync with samsung galaxy watch for steps or heart rate. Cannot manually enter steps either. Primarily syncs with withings gear. So I only use it to track my weight with my withings scale. Also the scale is strange in that it can't do math. For example if you weigh 190 on Monday and 189.5 on Tuesday it will say you lost .4 pounds.

Can't connect Steel HR. Reinstalled the app, factory reset the watch but nothing. It searches for the watch but doesn't find it. Bluetooth is on, watch is active. It just doesn't connect. Edit: connected the watch to an iPhone which worked fine. Reset everything and tried again on my android (moto g6) and it worked. The watch is great, the app is fine. Wish it had more features and flexibility but it's fine.

Update: I made a new account Withings account with an Outlook email address. Changing from 1* to 2* since I can now at least try out the device. Original: Unable to login. I enter my gmail and password, hit login, and it progresses to a page asking for name, gender, etc. However I can't enter my name or gender because a new pop up shows asking if I want to login with Google or email. Can't back out of pop up. Trying to progress with Google or email again leads to app crashing.

Relevant information provided however inaccurate on linked apps like Samsung Health it does not transfer and record the data from the linked app efficiently or effectively. Misses between 200 to 300 steps, confuses workouts recorded and causes some workouts to be overriden in recording if you add your own workout. Needs some bugs like that fixed so it transfers and records accurate data from linked apps. Othereise I use it daily and like to see progression and results. Thanks.

title: Fatbyte Body fat-lean analyzer
description:
The contactless body composition analysis
Fat Byte performs body composition estimates and much more by one digital image from your smartphone. It‚Äôs a valuable tool for monitoring your body fat, and to perform anthropometry to help refining body composition and  well-being.
Fat  estimates were validated confronting Fat-Bit to DXA examination (Dual Energy X-ray Absorptiometry) in a group of subjects with BMI 18 -33.

The current lifestyle of many in the World has led to marked changes in the body composition of a high percentage of its citizens where way too  many people are obese. It is now recognized that BMI is a relatively poor measure of body composition and dependence on it for determining intervention strategies can be misleading. 
The use of personal health assessment in weight management is a burgeoning approach in management of overweight and obesity. An attraction of this preventive approach is the privacy and convenience of performing these activities at home.

This App allow users that can range from individuals, community health workers, sportspersons and medical professionals to obtain an accurate and rapid measure of body composition including fat mass using a mobile phone with our patented software.
The principle relies on obtaining a digital image of the subject taken laterally against a homogenous light coloured background- The software then converts the image into a two fundamental colour image from the eyes to the ankle.The raw image together with the subject‚Äôs, age, height, weight and gender is acquired either  by  built in camera  or uploaded from  memory  into the phone App and the software after conditioning the image,  gives an accurate estimate of body fat. 
The software has been validated by comparing the data obtained from a range of subjects of differing body composition (BMI 18 >33) using the photo application with figures obtained using 2 different reference methods of dual energy X-ray absorptiometry and underwater weighing the first one to construct and the second to  validate the fat estimating equation. The squared correlation coefficient between the two techniques was r 2 > 0.95 indicating that photo technique could be applied with confidence to a wide range of clinical and non-clinical applications.(1)
A European patent application has been made (2),  and it has been extended world-wide (PCT)

1 .De Lorenzo et al  Is Digital Image Acquisition (DIP) a Valid New Tool for Preoperative Body Composition Assessment? a Validation by Dual-energy X-ray Absorptiometry Obesity Surgery 16,560-566

2. European Patent Pending (N¬∞ 15425037-7-/EP15425037)

title: Simple BMI Calculator
description:
- Accepts inputs in imperial and metric formats including kgs, lbs, ft-inches, cms and    mtrs.
- Calculator presents the BMI (Body Mass Index) value and identifies appropriate weight categories.   
- Calculates and displays percentile values for children aged 2 ‚Äì 20 years. 
- Uses clinical growth charts developed by the National Center for Health Statistics and the National Center for    Chronic Disease Prevention and Health Promotion to perform percentile calculations.
- Based upon the BMI values, adults will be categorized as underweight, normal weight, overweight, or as having class    I, II or III obesity. 
- Based upon the BMI values, children will be categorized as underweight, normal weight, overweight or obese.
- This calculator is not applicable or appropriate for children below 2 years. 
 
This calculator is strictly for informational purposes only. If you have any medical concerns, please seek help from a qualified medical professional.

title: BMI & BMR calculator : Weight loss diet plan
description:
EON studio is presenting you a healthy app BMI & BMR calculator : Weight loss diet plan . Download this app and have a healthy life.
BMI Calculator
BMI (Body Mass Index) is a metric for measuring the human body fat based on weight, height and age of the person. Presenting BMI & BMR Calculator: Weight Loss Diet Plan app for BMI calculation by entering your age, height and weight. It is important to know your BMI as your health depends upon the fact that either you are underweight or overweight. The app is easy to use for all genders of all ages.


BMR Calculator
BMR or Basal Metabolic Rate is the measurement of the number of calories which a human body requires to be functional in resting position. BMR also tells you about your body metabolism. Any change in your diet, exercise, body movement, etc. can alter your BMR. Use our BMI & BMR Calculator: Weight Loss Diet Plan to measure your BMR by adding age, weight, gender and height. With the BMR calculated, know of your daily calorie needs and use the customized diet plan in the app based on the information you provide

Exclusive Features:
‚Ä¢    BMI Calculation
‚Ä¢    BMR Calculation
‚Ä¢    Daily Diet plan for weight loss
‚Ä¢    History of steps calculation for making a weekly/monthly record
‚Ä¢    Number of calories required on daily basis
‚Ä¢    Premier version available free of cost, just download and use
‚Ä¢    Colorful and easy to understand UI
