title: LiveNutriFit Weight Loss Coach
description:
LiveNutriFit is a Preventive and Integrative Healthcare Organization, with main focus on Lifestyle Modification, Nutrition Optimization and Functional Fitness under strict evidence based Medical Protocols. LiveNutriFit is committed to Empowering People to Eradicate Metabolic Diseases for Longevity.

We are an organization operating under the leadership of our CMD- Dr Anjali Hooda Sangwan (MBBS, MD) one of the most renowned Obesity, Metabolic Medicine and Clinical Nutrition Specialist in India and USA. Dr Anjali is MD in Internal Medicine from Lincoln Medical Center (affiliate of Weill Cornell Medical College) New York, USA. She has done her Fellowship in Obesity Medicine and Clinical Nutrition from Geisinger Health System, Danville,USA. Dr Anjali is assisted by her team of Doctors, Nutritionists & Dieticians.

Our Chief Fitness Trainer is Satyajit Chourasia ‚Äú Satya ‚Äú who is India‚Äôs No 1 Celebrity Fitness Consultant and has worked with Bollywood stars Aamir Khan, Hritik Roshan, Saif Ali Khan, Rani Mukherjee to name a few. Satya is the brain behind LiveNutriFits functional fitness exercises which are easy to do and which provide the best and sustainable results.

The Management Team collectively has over 50 years of experience and comprises of professionals from IIT & IIM who have extensive international exposure working with Top organizations like Johnson & Johnson, Baxter, Pfizer, World Bank, IBM & Samsung.

descriptionHTML:
Are you a beginner to yoga? yoga workouts for beginners! Yoga daily workout App is a guide to yoga poses for beginners and advanced. Yoga classes for complete beginners include all basic asanas, Yoga poses, sequences, terminology to keep you healthy and feel great.

Yoga for life

Yoga for Life health secret or gentle yoga class for all fitness levels offers Stretch, Yoga Workouts, meditation and fitness plan for young woman and men. Try this hybrid yoga, a complete Beginner Yoga series & most important yoga poses for beginners.

Yoga workout at home

Just follow the yoga instruction of daily yoga fitness plans app and practice daily for 30 minutes a day. You can hang it up in home, office, or anywhere it is that you love to practice!

Those who start out with yoga try these basic yoga poses which offer yoga fitness plans to train different parts of our body

The Yoga Workouts ‚Äì Build Strong Upper Body

A Good yoga flow which is easy and contains poses like Easy Seated Pose, Neck Stretches. This yoga workouts are very simple, relaxing for a total body and helps you to focus, relax your mind, build strength and increase flexibility in the body

Yoga for weight loss free for women

Want to use yoga for weight loss? Begin your workout journey with Daily yoga for life workouts app, there are many yoga asanas that will help you burn fat, lose weight, increase body flexibility and build strength.

Special Features

Yoga for tone belly, happy back and core strength
Yoga for good health, sleep with good postures
Breathing Exercises and yoga workouts for fat burning
30-minute fat burning yoga¬†and Yoga for beginners
Yoga for healthy heart and height increase for women
Daily yoga workout for healthy life and tone the body

Gym - Practice Yoga
Youth prefers the YOGA and going to the gym or other fitness activities, they give more preference to yoga and body weight training, by following ancient practice to improve your social-emotional skills.

Practice simple yoga exercises get relieved from Stress, Mental Relaxation, disorders related to heart, eye, belly fat etc.

If you love yoga Download most professional free yoga app for Android.
summary: Yoga workout plan for beginners, daily yoga fitness plan for Health & belly fat
recentChanges: + Introduced new features in yoga for beginners app.
comments: Its awesome, I found how many forms are there in yoga, even for beginners. Its nice to calculate that we are not that fit as we feel. We always need improvement and this app help us to improve ourselves without straining our body and mind. Its quick, helpful and in long run,its beneficial. I love this app.

I think it's a great game you should download it it really help me right now I've finished day one and the wrist workout oh I help me alot cuz my right wrist use to make the crack sound when I spin it and now it totally fine. I use to stress alot with that wrist and now l'm clam thank you plz make more games like this and also... I've been looking for a yoga app for a long to and now l've found it.

I like this app and I am using it at the present.But, there are some yogasanas which are told wrong like I saw in PAVANASANA....and also the 3-D figures don't show the proper manner of doing the asanas which sometimes puts us in doubt what to do.. Also...at the time of relaxation, benefits of the upcoming exercise should be shown, that will be helpful for us ....thanq üôèüôè

This app was awesome until they gave it 3d models that made the poses way more confusing. Deleting the app and looking for a easier to understand version. Seriously what's the point of having 3D models if they don't clearly illustrate the actions?
Not at all satisfied with the app! The timing is too fast that the beginners are unable to go with flow , does not show the position before the counting.

title: BMI Calculator
description:
Calculate your BMI is a free application that allows us to know your body mass index (BMI) and shows you that weight level you are, just enter your height and weight.

What is BMI?

It is a measure of association between the mass and height of an individual designed by the Belgian statistician Adolphe Quetelet, so also known as Quetelet index.

"Calculate your BMI" Features

‚òÖ Show your BMI and weight level.
‚òÖ Units in metric and imperial system.
‚òÖ Change units easily.
‚òÖ Quick & easy.

title: Ideal weight & Optimal fat %
descriptionHTML:
This program will help You to find out an Ideal weight and Optimal fat percentage by calculating Body Mass Index (BMI) and percentage of body fat. Calculations are made considering your somatotype, that allows You to get more accurate results. You'll be able to find out in what shape You are and to assess the overall health status. The results are shown in special table, which gives the ability to track Your progress.

Here's some features of this app:
- User-friendly and modern interface;
- Ability to calculate the "ideal weight" based on Your body type;
- You're able to calculate not only the percentage of fat, but also-lean body mass, as well as the weight of the skeleton and muscles;
- High accuracy in calculation of all indicators;
- The possibility to keep a tabular diary of Your progress;
- Presentation of the results in a convenient format of pie charts and graphs;
- Plotting of selected indicators for different time intervals.
summary: Find out Your ideal weight and optimal fat %.
recentChanges:
- Upgraded interface & great new style;
- Added handy graphs & calculations of progress for different time frames;
- Improved and extended table of the results;
- Added pie chart of the body structure.

title: How to increase body weight
description:
Like people who want to lose weight, increasing weight is not an easy and trivial matter for people with below normal weight. Very humane if people who are thin or lacking body if you want a fat body or at least have a solid body filled, fat body when seen the eyes will look healthy and attractive.

A leading nutritionist says that there are 2 cases that are the most difficult to handle. First, overweight people who want to achieve ideal body weight by losing weight. And secondly, very thin people who want to achieve ideal body weight by gaining weight. Weight gain requires a strong commitment from yourself. Surely you already know that gaining weight is not just eating more, consuming more sugar and limiting activity.

Gaining weight does have its challenges to be able to do it quickly and effectively. So here we will explain step by step how to increase body weight to help you get the ideal body weight in a healthy way. What we mean by an ideal body is that you have a body weight that matches your height, because having an ideal body weight is something that everyone covets.

Having an ideal body can also give a more attractive impression and make you feel a healthier body because you don't have problems with your weight, so you will easily get a sense of self-confidence that is quite high. Hopefully useful and can help you in your efforts to increase your weight, according to your expectations. Thanks.

title: Daily Yoga - Yoga Fitness Plans
description:
We‚Äôre here for you! Daily Yoga opens a Free Collection for you to provide 6 programs and 13 sessions free to everyone, plus the up to 80% Special Off of subscription. We hope to help users to stay safe and keep positive during the uncertain time!

If you're a beginner to yoga, Daily Yoga App provides various guided classes to help you learn the basics before diving into more advanced classes and flows, and if you're advanced‚Äîthere are plenty of the world - class teachers you want to follow with.		

Featured as ‚ÄúWorks with Google Fit‚Äù,‚ÄúTop Developer‚Äù,‚ÄúClear Your MindÔºå Engage Your Body‚Äù, ‚ÄúKeep Calm & Carry On‚Äù in Google Play, 
Voted as‚Äù Best Yoga App‚Äù of the year 2016-2019 by Healthline, 
Awarded by The Wall Street Journal as the ‚Äú5 Addictive Fitness Apps‚Äù.

Various Classes Fit Your Goal‚Ä®
Daily Yoga offers 500+ asanas, 70+ yoga programs, 500+ guided yoga, pilates, meditation sessions plus the largest yoga pose library for man and woman that suit yogis from beginner to advanced. Not only helps you stay with yoga every day, but also provides health benefits for both your mind and body.

Follow the World-Class Master
Altogether 20 yoga masters who are globally respected or the initiator of yoga styles focus on yoga for weight loss, beginner to advanced, better sleep & full relax. Aim to make it easier & convenient to yoga workout and provide programs that align with your current goals. All sessions are taught in English. 

Motivated by Community
The community in Daily Yoga App brings yogis from all over the world closer to one another. Yogis gather here to discuss their practicing experience under the topics, tag and encourage each other to finish the challenge, follow the Yoga Tips to improve their techniques, prepare the weight-control meals according to the selected recipes. Never feel lonely, and become more limber with other motivated yogis around you.

Create Private Yoga Plan
Don‚Äôt like to choose  the default plan? You can create yours. Private Yoga plan is a cycle of 7 days. Set the workout days and rest days according to your own schedule. Then you can combine yoga sessions to each workout day according to your need. If you know your body well, please give it a try to make your workout more efficient.

Adjust to Your Habits¬†
Multiple choices for session duration varied from 5 - 70 minutes to fit your schedule, and 7 languages available worldwide (English, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, Chinese, German, French). Support for Dark Mode to help to prevent eye strain.

Track Your Activity
Personal data from various devices can be tracked in App. With smart watch, you can track your exercise duration and calories burned and heart rate to contribute to your activity rings and meet your daily goals.

While you are waiting for the update to install, try this easy abdominal breathing: draw your abdomen inward to stabilise your core. As you inhale, bring your fingertips to touch in front of the belly. As you exhale, open your hands out to the sides. Inhale the future, exhale the past. Have fun with it!‚Ä®

Find out even more at http://www.dailyyoga.com;

Email: support@dailyyoga.com
Instagram: @DailyYogaApp
Facebook: facebook.com/DailyYogaApp

Privacy Policy: http://www.dailyyoga.com/privacy.html 
Terms of Service: http://www.dailyyoga.com/terms.html

recentChanges:
You can enjoy the new Smart Coach now, with 7 categories and over 400 sessions waiting for serving your personal preference.
1. SCHEDULE supports the retake of missed sessions in history now. Try and get more circles.
2. Another upgrade! Tap the screen to check the pose list while exercising. It's much easier to browse and switch poses now.
3. New Courses in November: Winter Energy Flow-Intermediate Element Yoga, Easy Morning Yoga.
Monthly Golden Day, Thanksgiving, and Black Friday are coming!
comments: I keep using the app often. However, it has many bugs to be fixed. The smart coach shows sessions I did as not done. The time is off by a day so I cannot start my training at the correct day. The contact link connects to a share experience link instead. So how to contact you directly? Navigation through the app is not intuitive and it is congested with a lot of ballast. I'd appreciate very much a simplified version that is more straightforward to use.

Smart Coach was available for silver members. Now they have changed it only for gold members. It is like changing the game rules during the game. May be they will take away other things!!! Very poor taste of business. Although I love the app, I am thinking of switching to the other app just for this reason. Lack of business ethics, and in a yoga app. Another issue with the program. Now they have created a schedule to schedule a program. But there is no reschedule option for the missed days. üò≠

The programs and variety are good, but the app is bad. Buggy, and the material you want to get to - ie sessions - is difficult to get to. Constant ads and notifications you can't turn off, even with the Gold subscription, and the support staff's response is either ignoring criticism or suggesting you delete your account. Would suggest looking elsewhere.

This is the best yoga app I have ever tried and worth every penny if you choose to become a gold member. I tested it for a while now. I get usually bored easily with the same routine and this provides loads of options including levels, specific needs, length, time of day, goals,... The list is long and easy to organize with favorites and home page featured workouts. I will be renewing my subscription for sure!

This was my very first time trying yoga, and this was my first session... as a beginner I think it went pretty well. Could really feel my muscles stretching on some of those poses. But I was afraid I wasn't going to hear what the pose was correctly so I tried to keep my phone within eyesight so I could watch the instructor, but I think once I get the hang of it I won't need to look at my phone anymore and I can concentrate more on my poses.

title: Personal BMI Calculator
description:
The personnel BMI Calculator is developed to identify one's age, current weight(kg), height(in meters) to calculate his/her BMI. Using a special formula, the assessment of one's BMI is identified by its seven(7) categories; Severely Underweight, Underweight, Normal, Acceptable, Obese Class 1, Obese Class 2 and Obese Class 3.

This application is updating and measuring the exact BMI of an individual.

title: BMI Calculator
description:
BMI Calculator calculates your BMI based on your height and weight and helps you figure out if you are at a healthy weight for your height using a comprehensive chart. Also, the simple interface allows you to easily and quickly use the app.

Features:
- calculates BMI (Body Mass Index)
- categorizes your weight into either underweight, healthy weight, overweight, obese or morbidly obese

title: BMI Calculator & Weight Logger
description:
With BMI Calculator & Weight Logger you can calculate your Body Mass Index, Waist-to-Height Ratio, Body Fat Percentage and Calorie Consumption to find your ideal weight based on age and gender.

You can also use this app to keep track of waight lost, perfect if you are in a fitness training scenario.
It can also be used to find your healthy weight if you want to lose weight or want to start a diet.


Why should you choose "BMI Calculator & Weight Logger"?
- Available in 2 languages (English, Romanian)
- Simple and very easy to use.
- Accurate and precise caculation.
- BMI (Body Mass INdex) Calculation for everyone 8 years and older
- Ideal Weight Range Calculation
- BMR (Basal Metabolic Rate) Calculation
- WtHR (Waist-to-Height) Calculation
- BFP (Body Fat Percentage) Calculation
- Metric and imperial systems are supported
- History of weight displayed as list and chart
- It is totally free! Download now!

Info:
- BMI - Calculate Your Body Mass Index. Body mass index (BMI) is a measure of body fat based on height and weight that applies to adult men and women. Enter your weight and height using standard or metric measures.

- BMR - The amount of energy (in the form of calories) that the body needs to function while resting for 24 hours is known as the basal metabolic rate, or BMR. This number of calories reflects how much energy your body requires to support vital body functions if, hypothetically, you were resting in bed for an entire day.

- WHtR - Waist-to-Height Ratio: is defined as the waist circumference divided by the height. It measures abdominal obesity and therefore can be used as an better indicator of health risks than BMI (Body Mass Index).

- Body Fat Percentage: is defined as the weight of fat divided by the total weight. It is estimated with the 'US Navy Circumference Method' which uses the height and circumferences of waist, neck and hip.

- Energie Expenditure / Calorie Consumption: is mainly a sum of internal heat produced (Basal Metabolic Rate estimated by Mifflin St Jeor Equation) and external work (Physical Activity Level).

Weight Chart and list so you can analyze your weight activity

comments: Used this apps for a couple of years and the latest updates are a backward step. The UI no longer displays the interval time but been replaced with an incremental number for those who can't count sets. I use to enter the weight for my next set during the interval however the keyboard won't appear while the interval timer is on. Also none of the graphics for the exercises display anymore which has caused me confusion. I hope the latest updates are reconsidered

Been using this app since the early days. I love the ongoing support but it wouldnt hurt for devs to stick to one UI and stop moving things around every other update. The latest update to intervals is just lazy. The timer auto-starts even if you dont want/need it and is always logged. A better approach would be to disable the time+logging if interval is set to 0, otherwise there is a x second delay before timer starts. Also the ability to set the main page under excerise history would be great.

Nice app an community. There must be a bug with the points earned: with the latest versions my sessions are not counted anylonger (and I do train every day almost...) Would be nice to get it resolved (I am in the contest, and it gives motivation ;) Overall, is a very good develooment, kudos to the team.

It's a good app, but it can be hard to use. I also couldn't find a way to contact them from the app and I feel like if you're going to charge people money you have to put a way to contact you if they have a problem or question. My husband just wants to know if there is a weekly report for reps like the other stats, but it makes me nervous that if something goes wrong I can't find a way to contact them about it.

Great app!!! Have been using for years. Really enjoy the improvements made over the years. Unfortunately, body stats page/functions have been very buggy and don't even work the last few updates. Weight doesn't record. Graph has goal weight posted way off in future. Weight no longer sync's w Google Fit. Could be 5star app. -2stars until fixed.

title: The Healthy Mummy
description:
The NUMBER one diet and eating plan, at home workout and fitness program used by 100.000's of mums over the world - which encourages body positivity and is rated 5 stars
The Healthy Mummy health, weight loss and diet plan is realistic, family friendly, budget friendly and offers you a personal workout plan and meal planner that is 100% achievable.
We are made for mums by mums - we get what it is like after having children and there is NO other program like this. No matter what your goals are - whether they be stomach goals, strength goals, workout goals or diet goals - we will help you to reach them.
You will NEVER need to use another health, food or fitness app again. It's time to picture your health goals right now as with us supporting you - you are going to reach them.
Our 28 Day Weight Loss Challenges run monthly and will have you feeling healthy and body confident without feeling deprived. We are here to ensure that you succeed.
We offer over 4000+ delicious recipes and diet plans, constant support and over 450 fast and effective video workouts from our expert team of female fitness trainers and nutritionists who have all been in the SAME position as you.
We also offer you a calorie tracker, a meal planner, a workout planner - which gives you a personal workout and a body coach
Join for Instant access to our all our Fitness Programs and full Healthy Mummy app
New amazing nutritionist Recipe plan every week with over 4,000 budget and family friendly recipes
Ongoing support and motivation to help you reach you health goals
Daily at home workout videos to keep you fit with our at home trainer
The Healthy Mummy app integrates with the Apple Health app. You can choose to sync The Healthy Mummy app with the Health app so that activity minutes and steps that you do every day are automatically recorded.
Never get bored! We keep it fresh with a new theme for every 28 Day Challenge, including new recipes and new workouts so you never get stuck in a rut again!
Risk free! No lock-in contracts, so you can cancel at any time.
The Healthy Mummy app requires an auto-renewing subscription - but you can cancel at any time
Subscription payment will be charged to your credit card through your iTunes account once your subscription purchase is completed. The subscription renews automatically unless cancelled at least 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period. There is no increase in price when renewing.
You can manage your subscription and disable auto-renewal in your Account Settings after purchase. Once purchased, refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term.
Read our full Terms of Service 
https://www.healthymummy.com/terms-conditions/ 
and our Privacy Policy at 
https://www.healthymummy.com/privacy-policy/

comments: I had the old app when I was on maternity leave with my first child and it was great. Unfortunately the new app is really clunky,, it freezes constantly, takes ages to update any changes to the weekly menu and has the wrong amount of ingredients for serving size. It will say 1 serve but then the amount of ingredients will be for 4 serves. I have to up the amount of serves then decrease it again to get the right info. It's just a really buggy app but has the potential to be great.

Needs a bit more work. freezes, records workouts then they disappear from your daily records other times after the work out it doesn't come up to record your workout. A little frustrating at times to keep an accurate record. Recording food is a little behind, would be nice if it remembers your food from previous to record quicker and don't have to type each day

Was a great app, just a few issues now, have to log in everytime I go on it, now everytime I do log in it won't let me log any water or food until I have clicked on the diamond rewards blinking thing, i have read it all once, I shouldn't have to go into it every time before logging anything, also my fitbit keeps un-sincing from the app now..

Well I have only being using this healthy mummy app for about 3 days and I am loving it so is my partner we didn't really no something could be so easy and simple to use and follow the healthy mummy recipes and all the information you get on the side is amazing there's been a lot of work put into this and you can see it I would give it a rating at 100 stars if there was any and this app just makes it so much more easier because you can save your favorite recipes to. Thanks healthy mummy.

It is awesome for the recipe ideas which is mainly what I got it for, but it logs me out often and my previous tracking and "diamond awards" resets back to zero and it can't be a bit discouraging seeing everything reset. If you want this for Recipe ideas I recommend getting it but definitely has some bugs to work out

title: BMI Calculator
description:
BMI Calculator through easily Calculate your Body Mass Index (BMI) and you know you are in underweight, in normal weight or overweight. based on the relevant information on body weight, height, age and sex.

BMI Calculator will offer to you various Calculator for track your Fitness daily and manage your ideal weight and stay Healthy!

Are you in your right weight? Check it easily with this app. It will calculate your Body Mass Index (BMI) and will let you know if you are underweight, in good weight or overweight.

Just swipe your finger over the measure tapes to enter your weight and height and get the BMI value and also your ideal weight range.

This BMI calculator supports imperial and metric units,and you can alternate in just one click between kg or lbs and feet/inches or meters.

Very usable BMI calculator and the only one in the market that doesn't require you to press the the button every time you want to calculate a new value.

key feature of this app:

Fitness Calculator
Fitness Calculator provide you Body Mass Index (BMI) Calculator, Sprint Calculator, Waist To Hip Ratio Calculator.

Fitness Calculator help you to Maintain your weight and get your ideal weight.

Lifting Calculator

Lifting Calculator  help you to manage your gym exercise and Gym Workout for getting your ideal body.

Cardio Calculator

Cardio Calculator help you to check your Cardiovascular Fitness.

Nutrition Calculator help you to building, maintaining and repairing muscles, skin, blood and other issues.

Stay motivated by tracking your daily weight and analyze your progress.

title: RP Diet Coach
description:
Get in the best shape of your life by planning what you eat with a diet coach in your pocket. Designed by top PhDs and Registered Dietitians to transform your body, the RP Diet Coach will help you look and perform your best. 
 
What You Get:

 ‚Ä¢ Personalized macro breakdowns based on your body and fitness goals.
 ‚Ä¢ Meal timing recommendations that will help you maximize results, decrease hunger, and maintain muscle. 
 ‚Ä¢ Diet filters including Dairy-Free, Vegetarian, Vegan, Paleo, Gluten-Free, Grain-Free, and Low FODMAP.
 ‚Ä¢ Smart scheduling accommodates all schedules - including night shift and intermittent fasting.
 ‚Ä¢ Meal prep made easy with our automatic shopping list made from your food choices.
 ‚Ä¢ Weekly diet review - recommends changes to your diet based on your progress and goals.
 ‚Ä¢ Food database of over 750,000 foods and constantly growing.
 ‚Ä¢ Barcode scanner and restaurant search - mostly US, but more international foods coming soon!
 
How It Works:

 ‚Ä¢ Enter your info and choose your fitness goal: lose fat, gain muscle, or maintain your weight.
 ‚Ä¢ You choose your foods - the app tells you how much and when to eat.
 ‚Ä¢ Every week, review your progress and the app will recommend an updated plan for the next week.
 ‚Ä¢ Get results!
 
 
With thousands of 5-star reviews (world-wide) and a free 14-day trial, now's the time to get on the right path to finally reach your health and fitness goals!
 
Who We Are:

RP is a group of leading sport scientists, dietitians, and coaches with a proven track record of amazing results with hundreds of thousands of members across the world, including countless pounds lost. After years of diet and nutrition coaching, we've used the data and results from this to create the cutting-edge algorithm that powers the RP Diet Coach App.
  
If you purchase a RP Diet Coach subscription, please note billing and charges are done through your Google Play account and auto-renewed based on your subscription term. At the end of the term, unless auto-renewable subscriptions are disabled, your subscription will automatically renew in your Google Play account. You will be charged for the regular price of your subscription within 24 hours prior to the end of the current term. Your subscription can be managed or cancelled in your Google Play Account Settings.

Privacy Policy:
https://renaissanceperiodization.com/rp-diet-app/privacy-policy

Terms of Service:
https://renaissanceperiodization.com/rp-diet-app/terms-of-use

comments: It's a great program that provides results even if you don't have 100% adherence! (Though much better results if you do, of course). The update that just came out in Oct. 2020 has caused some growing pains as new features are integrated and kinks are ironed out, but the dev team seems to be working hard to fix issues asap. I see no reason for the hissy fits some people are throwing about slight delays in waiting for the app stores to approve the updates. Very glad I got this app!

I loved the old version but the new version I just downloaded on the 10/22/20 is very confusing. For example it says I go to bed at 2100 and wake up to eat at 2330? I am having a really hard time with this.
App has again been updated and is working as it should.

So I'm paying $15 / month for a diet app that won't let me start a fat loss diet. Their support desks solution was wait for the update after next! Thanks for being patient! Translation: you're a sucker
Please add mini cut cycle. Also the day is starting from midnight and the last meal is carrying over to the next day. That's kind of weird.

title: Perfect weight
description:
Do you have an ideal weight? Checks with this free application for anyone 7 years or more.
Perfect weight is a free BMI calculator. It will calculate your Body Mass Index (BMI) and will let you
whether you are underweight, in good weight or overweight.


Enter your weight and height and get the BMI value and also your ideal weight.

The main features of this application:

- Very User-friendly interface.
- Easy to use even for novices.
- An easy way to input height and weight values.
- The estimated ideal weight.

NB:
Body Mass Index (BMI) is a simple index of weight-for-height that is commonly used to classify underweight,
overweight and obesity.

descriptionHTML:
Do you have an ideal weight? Checks with this free application for anyone 7 years or more.
Perfect weight is a free BMI calculator. It will calculate your Body Mass Index (BMI) and will let you
whether you are underweight, in good weight or overweight.


Enter your weight and height and get the BMI value and also your ideal weight.

The main features of this application:

- Very User-friendly interface.
- Easy to use even for novices.
- An easy way to input height and weight values.
- The estimated ideal weight.

NB:
Body Mass Index (BMI) is a simple index of weight-for-height that is commonly used to classify underweight,
overweight and obesity.

More information, please click on this link:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Body_mass_index
